60a4(mdo sde): sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dag par bsrung ba dang / yi dam brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pas mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bla ma la bsu bskyal dang chos nyan pa gtsug lag khang dang /
60a5(mdo sde): mchod rten bsgrub pa la phu dud byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan rtsibs stong dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad la ma brnyas pas rting pa yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
60a6(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrungs pas sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa dang / bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas phyag dang zhabs dra bas sor mo bar 'brel ba mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
60a7(mdo sde): gos bzang po sbyin pa byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung bzhim po dang / gtsang ma dang nyams su bde ba byin pas bdun shin tu
60b1(mdo sde): mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la thos par dga' ba ri dgas e r+ya ya'i byin pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi g.yo mtshang sbed cing bcabs pas/
60b2(mdo sde): gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba bcu bsgoms pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te/
60b3(mdo sde): sems can la rtag tu bstan pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs byas pas/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'i mtshan dang ldan
60b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi gtsug lag khang ngam mchod rten sgrub pa'i grogs byed par mos pa dang / slong ba rnaMs la bdog pa med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang pos pus mo'i lha nga la bslebs pa'i
60b5(mdo sde): mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgrub pa dang / srog gi rim gro byas pas sku che zhing drang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / na ba rnams kyi rtsi sman dang /
60b6(mdo sde): rim gro dang / nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pas/ ro bro ba'i mchog thob pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yun ring po nas tshig bkyal pa spangs shing / dus su smra bas seng ge'i 'gram
60b7(mdo sde): pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par snyoms pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtsod pa rnams bsdum
61a1(mdo sde): pa la dga' bas tshems thag bzang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rin po che'i sbyin pa byas pas tshems mnyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang ngag yid
61a2(mdo sde): yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa bsdams pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams la
61a3(mdo sde): rtag tu tshig 'jam po smra bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / byams pa'i sems bsgoms te/ rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byed pa'i mtshan dang ldan par
61a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / sems thag pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsgrubs pas pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan la bsod nams dang yon tan yod pa rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pas
61a5(mdo sde): zhal mdzod bus brgyan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul bzhin du rim gro dang btsun par byas pas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'i
61a6(mdo sde): mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos bstan pa la mos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / stan dang / gos dang / khang bzang gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog
61a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi gtam tshogs te smra ba spangs pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyim pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /
61b1(mdo sde): mkhan po dang / bla ma rnams kyis bstan pa'i tshig yang dag par blangs pa dang bzung ba mngon du spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang
61b2(mdo sde): yon tan dpag tu med pa bsgrubs pas zhabs legs par thob pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bskul bas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mtshan dang
61b3(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dpag med pa'i yon tan bsgrubs na/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis de lta bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// zhes
61b4(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gis brtags na gang yang dngos
61b5(mdo sde): po dang mtshan mar ma grub ste/ ma mchis la de bzhin gshegs pa la brtags na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam de ma lags na/ ci'i slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrub ces gsungs/ dkon mchog/
61b6(mdo sde): gsum dang / bden pa bzhi dang / phung po lnga dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams la bdag gis brtags na'ang phyi nang gi rgyu 'bras
61b7(mdo sde): kun stong nyid do/ / mtshan ma ma mchis/ smon pa ma mchis/ skye zhing 'byung ba'ang ma mthong / 'gag cing nub pa'ang ma mthong / sgyu ma dang 'dra ba/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba/ 'bar ba dang 'dra ba
62a1(mdo sde): thag ma dang 'drab/ chab kyi zla ba dang 'dra ba/ rus sla gyi sku dang 'drab/ ri bong gir dang 'drab/ nam mnga'i me tog dang 'dra ba/ mog sham gyi bu dang 'drab/ gzugs
62a2(mdo sde): brnyan gyi gos gyon zhing / sgyu ma'i glang po che la 'tshal ba dang 'dra ba/ mchis pa'ang 'dra ba/ ma mchis pa'ang 'dra ba/ de dag ni mchis pa dang ma mchis pa/ mchis pa'ang ma lags/ ma mchis pa'ang/
62a3(mdo sde): ma lags/ rtag pa ma lags/ chad pa ma lags/ skye ba ma lags/ 'gag pa ma lags/ nang du ma lags/ slad rol ma lags/ mthong ba ma lags/ shes pa ma lags/ dper na nam
62a4(mdo sde): mkha' dang 'dra ba la/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ngas ni spyod lam de dag spyad ces gsungs/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gis brtags na/ bdag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog ma
62a5(mdo sde): lags/ gso ba ma lags/ skyes bu ma lags/ gang zag ma lags/ shed can ma lags/ shed bdag ma lags/ byed pa po la sogs pa ma lags/ mig ma lags/ gzugs
62a6(mdo sde): ma lags/ mig dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ rna ba ma lags/ sgra ma lags/ rna ba dang sgra'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ sna ma lags/ dri ma lags/ sna
62a7(mdo sde): dang dri'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ lce ma lags/ ro mi lags/ lce dang ro'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ lus ma logs/ reg bya ma lags/ lus dang reg bya'i mtshan gyid
62b1(mdo sde): spyod yul ma lags/ yid ma lags/ chos ma lags/ yid dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ rnam par shes pa ma lags/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags
62b2(mdo sde): gzugs ma lags/ sdug bsngal ma lags/ gzugs dang sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ bdag gi ma lags/ 'gro ba ma lags/ gzugs can ma lags/
62b3(mdo sde): phung po ma lags/ bden pa ma lags/ brdzun pa ma lags/ bsdus pa ma lags/ gtor ba ma lags/ 'byung ba ma lags/ 'jug pa ma lags te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
62b4(mdo sde): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin te/ phar bzhud pa ma lags/ tshur byon pa ma lags/ bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang mi mnga'/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'ang/
62b5(mdo sde): mi mnga'/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyang mi mnga'/ gcig pa'ang ma lags/ tha dad pa'ang ma lags/ 'das pa'ang ma lags/ ma byon pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags/
62b6(mdo sde): dri ma can ma lags/ yongs su dag pa ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag la sogs pa'ang ma lags/ rtag pa ma lags/ chad pam
62b7(mdo sde): lags/ skye ba ma mchis/ 'gag pa ma mchis/ bsgom du ma mchis/ spyod du ma mchis/ dor du ma mchis/ blang du ma mchis/ mtha' las 'das pa yun du zhugs pa la/ gang gi slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrubs
63a1(mdo sde): zhes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legs so legs/
63a2(mdo sde): so// rigs kyi bu khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ yun ring po nas theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don chub par shes te/
63a3(mdo sde): chos so cog kun kyang stong pa nyid du mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i mtha' las 'das te/ kun du gnas par yang shes pas/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che
63a4(mdo sde): baiDU R+Ya'i nor bu shin tu dang ba/ gsal ba/ 'dam rdzab kyi nang du lo stong gi bar du bzhag kyang / rang bzhin yong gis dag pas phyir phyung na'ang snga mkho bzhin te/ khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid
63a5(mdo sde): mngon par rtogs la rang bzhin rnam par dag pas khyed rnams da ltar khams gsum na/ snyigs ma can lnga'i 'dam rdzab tu gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang sems can gyi don byas kyis kyang 'dam rdzab
63a6(mdo sde): kyis ma gos pas na/ don 'di lta bu dag 'dri nus pa yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod yang nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ chos so cog thams cad yang dag par na dngos po med de/ yi ge yod pa'i phyir chos yod
63a7(mdo sde): ces bshad/ chos kyi nang du yi ge med la/ yi ge'i nang du'ang chos med do// kun tu spel ba'i phyir yi ger bstan to// yi ge'i nang du ni byang chub kyang med/ byang chub kyi nang du ni yi ge'ang med mod kyi/
63b1(mdo sde): don dam par ni yi ge med kyang kun rdzob tu yi ge yod par bshad pas/ sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang yi ge las gud na mi rnyed do// rigs kyi bu khyod zer ba'ang bden te//
63b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la zad pa med/ skye ba med/ mi sgom/ mi spyod/ sgom spyod rnams dang bral ba/ yang dag pa'i chos la mi 'jug/ de las ldog cing 'gyur ba'ang ma yin/ skye ba gcig gi
63b3(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi gnas su'ang ma skyes/ de las babs te yum gyi lhums su'ang ma gnas/ chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pas/ nga ni skye rga na 'chi las 'das so zhes kyang ma byas/ phyogs
63b4(mdo sde): bzhir gom pa bdun bdun yang ma bor/ / nga ni 'jig rten bla na med pa btsun pa yin no zhes kyang ma brjod/ grong khyer mchog tu na'ang bzang mo dang yang martse na/ 'jig rten bya ba yig rtsis la sogs pa'ang ma
63b5(mdo sde): bslabs/ stobs dang 'phong rtsal yang ma sbran to// sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ rgan po mngon sum du bstan pa ni lus la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o// nad pa mngon sum du
63b6(mdo sde): bstan pa ni tshe la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o/ / shi ba'i mtshan ma mngon sum du bstan pa ni/ 'dod chags dang nga dang ngar 'dzin pa rnams bkag pa'o// dge slong mngon sum du bstan pa ni/ sems can/
63b7(mdo sde): rnams tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi lus su mi smon par 'jig rten las 'das pa/ bla na med pa'i chos la brtson par bsgrub pa bya ba'o// grong khyer mchog nas phyung ste/ shegs pa ni khams gsum gyi
64a1(mdo sde): btson ra las thar pa dang / 'bras bu ma yin pa rnams bstan pa'o// slar gzigs pa ni byams sdang mi mnga' bar bstan pa'o// der phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis spun ma/
64a2(mdo sde): bar brgyan cing / sems can gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du bya ba'o// dbu skra bregs pa dang / rgyan rnams spangs pa dang / NA tsan ta ka zhabs 'bring dad pa can la slar bsrung ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad
64a3(mdo sde): dang bral bar bstan pa'o/ / kha spu bregs pas chos thams cad la mi chags rnam par bstan pa'o// ka sha dur smrig gyon pas sems can gdul bar bstan pa'o// drang srong u ta ka dang ma ran
64a4(mdo sde): dal chos 'dri rtag bya ba ni rang ging rgyal gyi sems 'dzem par bstan pa'o/ / lo drug gi bar du dka' thub spyad pa ni mu stegs 'dul ba'o// zhal bas blangs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'azang ba
64a5(mdo sde): rtswa swa ti blangs pa ni chog shes par bstan pa'o/ / rtswa bting ba'i steng du bzhugs pa ni nyam rangs dang g.yel ba rnams 'joms par bstan pa'o// lha klu kun gyis bstod cing bsngags pa dang bsnyen bkur
64a6(mdo sde): bya ba ni yon tan gyi 'bras bu la bkod par bstan pa'o/ / bdud rnams brtul ba ni dpa' ba'i mthu bstan pa'o// phyag g.yas pa sa la bstan pa ni bsod nams kyi mthu bstan pa'o// sa chen po kun tu
64a7(mdo sde): g.yo ba ni drin gyi lan ldon par bstan pa'o/ / de ltar mtshan ma med par bsgom pa'i phyir/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no// 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mngon du mkhyen nas/
64b1(mdo sde): chos kun mnyam pa nyid du bstan pas ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la thug pa med de/ chos bstan to cog la sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i don bstan pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes/
64b2(mdo sde): bya'o// dus gsum gyi bya ba dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos mngon du bsal bar gzigs shing mkhyen pas na/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// bden pa dang yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir/ lha dang mi'i
64b3(mdo sde): mkhan po zhes bya'o/ / gang zhig de ltar slob cing rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de la log par rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bslu ba can zhes bya'o//
64b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad ni mi 'byung / mi 'jug/ mi skye/ mi 'gog ste/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir 'jigs rten du 'byung ngo zhes brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas mya ngan
64b5(mdo sde): las 'da' 'o zhes brjod pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang yang dag par na chos thams cad kyi
64b6(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid du rtogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'byung ba 'am/ nub pa'ang mi mnga' bas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang ma bltam/ byang chub kyi shing drung du'ang mya ngan las ma 'das/ mtha'
64b7(mdo sde): las 'das te/ kun du gnas pa sems can yongs su bsgral bar mdzad pa'i slad du/ dka' thub spyad cing mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan kyang / yang dag par na 'gyur ba 'am/ spros pa mi ma'ang /
65a1(mdo sde): de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yun du gnas te/ khams gsum na sku 'byung ba'ang chos kyi rnam pa lnga 'byung ngo // lnga po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid dang //
65a2(mdo sde): sku yon tan can dang / sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes pa dang / sku sprul cing 'byung ba dang / sku nam mkha' lta bu dang lnga ste/ de la sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi ba ni/ yang dag pa'i 'bras bu'i mchog
65a3(mdo sde): mtshan ma thams cad las 'das pa/ rang gi dbyings la yun du gnas pa na/ sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi'o// sku yon tan can zhes bgyi ba ni sems can mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du/ spyod pa
65a4(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing / dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par mdzad pas na/ sku yon tan can zhes bgyi'o// sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid skyes zhes bgyi ba ni/ chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad
65a5(mdo sde): thugs su chud de/ mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'/ spyod yul de la yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stong pa nyid las skyes te/ yang dag par rdzogs pas na/ sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi'o// sku sprul
65a6(mdo sde): cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung yang / lam rgyud lngar dge sdig kun la mngon par bstan cing / skyabs su mi mdzad pa ma mchis te/ sprul pa'i rdzas las mtshan nyid
65a7(mdo sde): du 'gyur bas na/ sku sprul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi'o// sku nam mkha' lta bu zhes bgyi ba ni nam mkha' mtha' yas pas na/ chos kyi sku yang mthara' yas so// nam mkha' la dpag pa dang gzhal du ma
65b1(mdo sde): mchis pas na/ chos kyi sku yang dpag cing gzhal du ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang nam mkha' chen po dang 'dra'o// sems can yongs su mya ngan la bzla ba'i slad du sku rnam par lngar ston
65b2(mdo sde): pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba mi mnga'/ 'gag pa mi mnga' bar mngon no// chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas mngon du
65b3(mdo sde): sprul cing / chos rnam par spel ba lags so zhes gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
65b4(mdo sde): kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pas/ spyod yul thams cad la rab tu chod pa 'am/ thog pa med de/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa stong/
65b5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten long spyod can zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha rtag theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig spyod de/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming rna
65b6(mdo sde): pa'i thog mar yang mi grag na/ ngan song lnga zhig ci smos/ khyod bskal pa de dang 'jig rten der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba
65b7(mdo sde): 'byung ste/ 'jig rten gzhan nas skyes bu chen po dag kyang der phyin cing / theg pa chen po thar pa phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde mnyan pa dang / blangs pa dang bcangs par 'gyur ro// de bas na sems
66a1(mdo sde): can gang la las byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos te/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas na/ 'jig rten longs spyod can gyi khams der yang skye bar 'gyur ro//
66a2(mdo sde): sems can gang la las theg pa chen po'i chos sgrub na'ang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang zhing bcangs pa des ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba bcu ma 'das par lung bstan
66a3(mdo sde): pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das
66a4(mdo sde): kyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan bstan nas yang seng ge'i sgra chen po
66a5(mdo sde): sgrogs te/ seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'o// nges pa'i tshig bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par 'tshe skyong zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar rig pa'o// yang sems
66a6(mdo sde): can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes bstan pa dang / lha'i bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa spa gong ste/ skyabs kyi dbang du gyur pas na seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o// de ltar bstan nas ljags
66a7(mdo sde): kyi mtshan rgya chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun khebs par g.yogs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya ba
66b1(mdo sde): ni shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dpar/ lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lce phyogs dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mthon/
66b2(mdo sde): dbus dma' ba ni sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya'o// ljags kyi drung nas 'od zer chen po btang ste/ phyogs bcur snang ba chen po byas so// snang ba chen po des mi rtag pa ni rtag par byas/ ma dag pa ni
66b3(mdo sde): dag par byas/ sdug bsngal can ni bde bar byas/ mi rig pa ni rig par byas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg cing snang ngo cog la ri dang / nags tshal dang / yul sa dang / chu bo'i klung dang /
66b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho dang / lcags kyi ri 'khor yug dang / dmyal ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang mtho dman med par mnyam par gyur cing / nyal nyil dang ldan ljin med de kun kyang yongs su dag par gyur nas 'di
66b5(mdo sde): lta ste/ dper na shar phyogs na 'jig rten zla gang rnam dag yongs su brgyan dang 'dra'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku sprul pa ni/ nam mkha' nas bab pa
66b6(mdo sde): ni me tog gi char bab pa dang 'dra'o/ / 'og nas byung ba ni sprin dang na bun byung ba dang 'dra bar nam mkha' yongs su gang ste/ nam mkha' stong par cung zad kyang med de// sprul pa'i zhal so so nas tshig
66b7(mdo sde): 'thun par de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par mtsho skyong gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' 'o// sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes gsungs/ yang chos thams cad ni stong
67a1(mdo sde): pa nyid do zhes gsungs so/ / spyod la de dag gi rgyu 'bras ni theg pa gcig tu zad pa las sems can gyis theg pa rnam pa gsum du mthong zhes bshad nas/ de ma thag tu kun mi snang
67a2(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs pa nyi tshe snang ste/ de'i tshe tshogs mang po thams cad kyis sku sprul pa de dag mthong ba ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ste/ shAkya
67a3(mdo sde): thub pa yab byams pas/ 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang gzi brjid mngon par sprul pa de'i tshe/ tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
67a4(mdo sde): thob bo/ / nyan thos brgyad khri zhig ni theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do// dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa'i lam thob bo// dge slong ma khri brgyad stong zhig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i lam tho
67a5(mdo sde): bo/ / dge bsnyen khri phrag bzhi bcus ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i lam thob bo// dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag bcus ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i lam thob bo// lha dang mi grangs med pa zhig ni chos kyi mig rdul med pa/
67a6(mdo sde): dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa thob ste/ rang gi tshe snga phyi shes pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad mi rtag par mthong ngo // de nas tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i sgra
67a7(mdo sde): stan las langs te/ tha gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gdugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
67b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis gong du bstan pa bzhin na ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang / chos kyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang/ dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung na/ sangs
67b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ chos kyi mthu lags sam/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags na ni sangs rgyas la gsol ba bgyi/ chos kyi mthu lags na ni chos la gsol
67b3(mdo sde): bar bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags na ni dge 'dun la gsol ba bgyi ba lags na/ gsum car la gsol pa bgyi ci 'tshal/ gong du gsungs pa'i theg pa gcig la so so'i skye bos rnam pa gsum du
67b4(mdo sde): mthong ngo zhes 'byung na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang gsum du bshad na sems cad lta zhig ci smos zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
67b5(mdo sde): chen po seng ge'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir don de lta bu 'dri ba'ang shin tu legs te/ nyon cig/ ngas
67b6(mdo sde): khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do/ / sangs rgyas kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/ chos kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin te/ kun tshogs pa'i mthu bas
67b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ni sems can gyi mgon skyabs kyi pha ma byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/ / sems can bslad pa can sems stor ba slar rnyed de 'khor ba la skyo nas/ dran pa'i mthu
68a1(mdo sde): mang pos khams gsum na nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las bskul par 'dod na/ phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bskal ba'i gru chen po byed do// de bas na rigs kyi bu sangs
68a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyang chos so/ / chos kyang dge 'dun no// dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas pa ni stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi stong pa nyid dang / nang gi stong pa nyid dang / phyi'i stong
68a3(mdo sde): pa nyid dang / chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / chung ngu'i stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid du 'dra ste/ de las gzhan med do// rigs kyi bu khyod zer blta na/ rnam pa gcig tu bsgrub pa'i rigs kyi bus rnam pa
68a4(mdo sde): gsum du bsgrub ci dgos zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi gcig cig nam mkha' stong pas skrag ste/ gar phyin dgur gab kyang nam mkha' dang yong ma bral lo// rigs kyi bu
68a5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang / ngas bshad do cog dge ba thams cad kyi rgyu dang / rkyen dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / theg pa gsum yang gcig las mi 'da' 'o//
68a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgras gsal ba/ legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pas bstar ba ltar ni bdag snga nas 'tshal te/ sems can rnams kyi slad du don de zhu ba lags
68a7(mdo sde): / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mi gnyis mi gsum mo// thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ byang chub sems dpa'
68b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi shul chen po/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mig ste/ lta ba log pa rnams sdud pa dang / sems stor ba rnams skyong ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi sgo gcod pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sku
68b2(mdo sde): 'byed pa dang / nyan thos rnams bzlog ste/ theg pa chen por 'dzud pa'i slad du/ bdag gis gzungs chen po'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o// sdom pa ma nyams pa dang / mdo sde 'di la
68b3(mdo sde): sgom zhing bslab par bgyid pa de la'ang bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/ / gal te gang zag la las mdo sde 'di la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing / dgung bdun gyi bar du smad pa spyod la/ bdud sdig can gyis 'khrug cing
68b4(mdo sde): 'tshe ba'i glags lta ba mchis na/ bdud sdig can gyis glags kyi skabs mi rnyed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag mdo sde 'di la rim gro bgyis te/ yun ring por gnas par bgyi ba'ang / byang chub
68b5(mdo sde): kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du gnas par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mdo sde 'di la rim gro bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o// ston pa
68b6(mdo sde): la'ang rim mo bya ba dang 'dra'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sbas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di skad ces smras so// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harma ya/ nam
68b7(mdo sde): sad+d+ha ya/ a dan d+hi d+ha ra ni/ tad+ya thA/ ha A kA sha ni ba bI/ sarba d+harmA ni ba bI/ a sha ma d+ha/ pi pa sha na/ bi ma la su pa ri dar ma ni kha na/ ba ru ni tsa ye ta ma le tsa le/ hu lu hu lu/ shi
69a1(mdo sde): de man tra swAhA/ sngags 'di dus gcig la lan rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / mchod rten la lan bdun bskor ba bgyi/ de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par/
69a2(mdo sde): gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bgyis te/ sems gzhan du mi g.yeng bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas khri phrag
69a3(mdo sde): brgyad brgyas gsungs pa ste/ deng 'dir bdag gis kyang brjod pa lags so// gal te 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la smod pa mchis na/ sangs rgyas de dag la smod par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di la smod
69a4(mdo sde): pa ni tshe rabs du ma'i bar du byang chub tu bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ srid pa gsum las kyang mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngags 'di ni sems dran pa nyams pa rnams sems skur
69a5(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang / gzungs 'di lan cig tsam rna bar thos sam/ thos nas yi ger bris te/ sha dang chang mi 'tshal bar sdom pa la gnas shing / bdag nyid rtse 'jo la sogs pa spangs te/ 'du
69a6(mdo sde): nang du mi 'jug la/ rgyun du byams pa chen po spyod cing bsam gtan la gces par 'dzin na/ gang zag de dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sgrib pa gsum gyi sdig lci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gzungs
69a7(mdo sde): 'di thos ma thag tu sems thag pa nas blang ba dang / bcang ba dang / nyin re zhing klog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / yi dam du mi bskyed par bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang ma chub kyi bar du ngan song
69b1(mdo sde): gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sku la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod dkon mchog gsum gyi/
69b2(mdo sde): rim gro bya ba dang / byams pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams srid pa gsum las gdon pa dang / bslab pa mang po grangs med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir/ ston pa'i sgo 'byed cing
69b3(mdo sde): log par lta ba rnams bzlog ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba la 'dzud pa'i phyir/ gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa ni shin tu'ang legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag khyod kyi ming dang / sngags kyi
69b4(mdo sde): sgra thos nas/ dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de mi smod na/ gang zag de tshe 'di nyid la'ang bde la/ 'chi 'phos na'ang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing / nga'ang mthong la khyed la sogs pa byang
69b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang nges par rang gis rig ste/ the tsom med do// kun nas nyon mongs spangs pa dang // dge ba kun gyis
69b6(mdo sde): lam bsgrubs te/ / sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong ba yang // rnam dag dad pa'i dbang gis so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/
69b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las nyin gcig gam/ dus gcig gam/ mtshan gcig gam/ skad cig ma gcig la phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang
70a1(mdo sde): mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la
70a2(mdo sde): bsams na/ gang zag de ni skad cig ma se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las thams cad
70a3(mdo sde): yongs su ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge sbyong mas sems kyi rang bzhin stor nas/
70a4(mdo sde): ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i rnams phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan//
70a5(mdo sde): la dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal na/ 'di lta bu'i las ngan pa kun ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de skad bka' stsal ma thag tu sngon sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur gyi dus na/ rgyal bu dge mthong zhes bya ba
70a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe mi sum stong dang lhan cig tu skad cig mar der lhag nas/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
70a7(mdo sde): bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa nas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bgyis pa lta zhig bshad kyis mi rdzogs te/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la
70b1(mdo sde): skur pa'i sdig grangs ma mchis par bgyis par de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan sngar 'thol te/ 'gyor tshangs su gsol
70b2(mdo sde): zhing mchis na/ skabs dbye bar ci gnang zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so logs so// rigs kyi bu 'jigs pa'i sems bskyed pa'ang dka' la/ dge
70b3(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'ang dka' ste/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa la 'thol zhing 'chags par 'dod pa ni/ log spyod la sogs pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mthong du nye bas/ yid la dran pa
70b4(mdo sde): bzhin du 'brel zhing bshags shig/ de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye bar gnang ba byams pa'i sems thos nas/ gos tshags bcos te thal mo sbyar
70b5(mdo sde): cing phyag 'tshal nas/ bla gos phrag pa g.yas su gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phyogs
70b6(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ / phyogs bcu'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o// phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// yang 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'khrugs mi
70b7(mdo sde): mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ / lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal
71a1(mdo sde): zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ / byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dri brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing
71a2(mdo sde): skyabs su gsol lo/ / 'og ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'bum la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// yang shar phyogs na skyes bu chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs
71a3(mdo sde): su gsol lo/ / lho phyogs na skyes bu chen po 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// nub phyogs na kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo//
71a4(mdo sde): byang phyogs na zla gang la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// bla ma phyogs na nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// 'og ma phyogs na skyes bu chen po brtan pa la phyag 'tshal zhing
71a5(mdo sde): skyabs su gsol lo/ / yang bdag cag gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur ba la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su
71a6(mdo sde): gsol lo/ / phyogs gzhan na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// da ltar bdag cag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo//
71a7(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po dri ma med par grags pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu labang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// 'phags pa dga' bo dang 'od srungs la'ang skyabs su gsol lo// 'phags pa'i 'bras
71b1(mdo sde): bu rnam bzhi mngon par byang ba rnams la'ang skyabs su gsol lo/ / byang chub kyi sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la'ang skyabs su gsol lo// sde snod chen po gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /
71b2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid yang dag pa'i mdo sde gzhan bzhugs so 'tshal la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// cha brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing
71b3(mdo sde): skyabs su gsol lo/ / de ltar na sku gzugs bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / sum cu
71b4(mdo sde): rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang phyug dang / bar snang na gnas pa'i lha dang / sa'i lha dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / shing drung gi lha dang / drang srong dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa rnams
71b5(mdo sde): dang / lha'i spyan mnga' ba rnams dang / lha'i snyan mnga' ba thams cad kyi snyan gyis gsan cing mkhyen par mdzod cig/ kun dpang du gsol te/ sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa
71b6(mdo sde): zhig mchis na'ang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur cig/ yang 'di skad ces smras te/ bdag cag thog ma ma mchis pa nas/ da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob kyi bar du nor cing 'khrul pa'i
71b7(mdo sde): sems kyis phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis/ nyon mongs pa dang / mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa brjod kyis mi lang ste/ sdig pa'i tshogs bgyis so 'tshal rang gis ma tsher ma rig pas ngan
72a1(mdo sde): sems rab tu rgyus te/ tshe phyi ma ma mthong zhing tshe 'di 'ba' zhig mthong bas/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mos te dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing / las ngan pas bar du cho
72a2(mdo sde): nas/ sdig pa'i grogs po dang bsten cing / dge slong dang / dge slong ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / pha dang ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / yang bdag nyam rangs
72a3(mdo sde): kyi dbang gis dge 'dun gyi dkor nor thugs thub tu spyad pa dang / dge 'dun sde lnga la mi rigs mi tshul bar bgyis pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i kun nas nyon mong pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu ma mchis par bshags
72a4(mdo sde): 'am/ byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can bkum pa 'am/ chos kyi slob dpon la skur te/ chos la chos ma lags zhes skur/ chos ma lags pa la chos lags zhes brjod/ de bzhin
72a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa la ni mi rtag ces bgyis/ dam pa'i chos la'ang mi rtag go zhes bgyis/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mi rtag go zhes bgyis/ sbyin pa dang shes rab la ni ma mos/ log pa'i chos la dad cing
72a6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa de dag gi slad du/ deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ khrel zhing ngo tsha ba'ang dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byam
72a7(mdo sde): pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gis sdig pa bskal pa grad ma mchis pa'i 'khor
72b1(mdo sde): ba nas bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhing slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma
72b2(mdo sde): mchis pa tshun chad mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bslab pa zhig par bgyis pa dang / log spyod kyi spyod pa spyad pa dang / ngag rtsub mo gtong ba dang /
72b3(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa'i las ngan pa de dag 'gyod cing 'thol ma myong ste/ sems la gnod pa 'am/ ngo tsha ba ma mchis par mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i
72b4(mdo sde): sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba nges par bgyis par rang gis 'tshal kyang / nongs pa bcabs nas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gnong zhing ngo tsha ba'i sems thog ma nas ma mchis par/ dad pa can gyi
72b5(mdo sde): mchod pa blangs nas/ 'thol zhing bshags ma myong ste/ dam pa'i chos yun du btsugs te/ rim gro bgyi ba'i sems ma mchis par rtag tu smod cing / brnyas pa dang / ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs
72b6(mdo sde): pa'i nongs pa mang po bgyis pa dang / ched na dkon mchog gsum yang med do zhes brjod pa dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa'i sdig de dag bgyis pa'i slad du/ deng 'jigs shing
72b7(mdo sde): skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnong zhing khrel ba dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste/
73a1(mdo sde): phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas
73a2(mdo sde): bgyis pa/ mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
73a3(mdo sde): cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa tshun chad phyin ci log tu di lta ste/ rtsa ba bzhi ni sbom por bshad/ sbom po ni rtsa ba bzhir bshad/ zhig pa rnams ni ma zhig par bshad/ ma zhig pa rnams ni zhig par
73a4(mdo sde): bshad/ lci ba rnam ni yang bar bshad// yang ba rnams ni lci bar bshad/ dag pa rnams ni ma dag par bshad/ ma dag pa rnams ni dag par bshad pa dang / yang log par lta bas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag la bstod cing bsngags
73a5(mdo sde): nas/ chos dang mdo sde la ni ma gus te/ sme ngan gyi gtam rtag tu gleng zhing brjod pa dang / ma brtags pa'i nor rnam pa brgyad pa 'chang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni bdud
73a6(mdo sde): kyi tshig go zhes bgyis pa dang / bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' zhes bgyis pa dang / mu stegs mkhan gyi tshig la'ang yid ches par 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthar
73a7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das te med pas/ dkon mchog gsum yang mi rtag go zhes bgyis nas lus dang sems 'khrul cing / phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa'ang dpag tu
73b1(mdo sde): ma mchis/ gnod zhing ngo tsha ba'ang dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i
73b2(mdo sde): yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gis sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa de dag mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis
73b3(mdo sde): 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan chad par mi bgyid par smon to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas//
73b4(mdo sde): tshe lus 'di la thug gi bar du/ dge 'dun gyi spyi'i nor ram/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ dge 'dun sde lnga'i nor ram/ dge slong gang zag gi
73b5(mdo sde): nor ram/ yon bdag thams cad kyi nor rdzas la brkus pa 'am/ rang nyam du spyad pa dang / yang rang smos te/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos bsam gtan bzhi 'am/ 'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob
73b6(mdo sde): bo zhes smras pa la sogs pa rkyen de lta bu'i las ngan pa mi dge ba'i rgyu rkyen du gyur te/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na'ang / pham pa bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad dang / lcib drug dang / dge 'dun gyi
73b7(mdo sde): lhag ma bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i lhung ba sum cu dang / ltung ba dgu bcu dang / so sor bshags pa bzhi dang / bslab pa mang po dang / bdun shin tu zhi ba'i
74a1(mdo sde): chos rnams te/ tshul khrims de dag re re la nyes byas nas/ pham pa la thug gi bar du nyams pa dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / dam pa'i chos dang / mdo sde
74a2(mdo sde): zab mo la skur pa dang / log spyod kyi spyod pa spyad nas/ nongs pa bcabs te/ 'gyod cing 'thol ma myong bas/ nyin mtshan du 'phel zhing skye ba/ sngon rgyal ba dag gis bshad pa las thos pa ni/ dam pa'i
74a3(mdo sde): chos la skur pa 'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa 'am/ rtsa ba bzhi pham par gyur pa rnams ma bshags ma 'thol na/ sems can dmyal bar nges par lhung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang
74a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang skyabs mdzad par mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyis kyang skyabs dang bor ba bgyid mi nus so/
74a5(mdo sde): zhes 'byung ba ni/ de'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnong zhing ngo tsha ba dpag tu ma mchis te/ de'i slad du deng dkon mchog gsum dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang /
74a6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ste
74a7(mdo sde): phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las
74b1(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / pham pa bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa dang / mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar
74b2(mdo sde): gsol/ yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis sems can rnams dang / bdag cag gis rang rang gi slad du/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar 'thol shing bshags par 'tshal lo// sems
74b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / pha ma'i drin glo bar ma chud pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba sna tshogs
74b4(mdo sde): bgyis pa dang / rang gi rigs bsnyams te/ dregs shing rgyags pa'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las nyam bag tu bgyis kyang / nongs par ma mthong ba'i/ skye bo blun po'i las bgyis pa dang /
74b5(mdo sde): sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten cing / nyon mongs pas sems 'khrug pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la chog ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba bzang mos bslus te/
74b6(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pas gzir cing / sems 'khrugs te/ spros pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid gsum gyi sgo nas bsags pa'i las mi
74b7(mdo sde): dge ba bdag rang gis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad deng so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// sangs rgyas dang /
75a1(mdo sde): chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa'ang deng so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// byang chub sems dpa' dang /
75a2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas la'ang bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa'ang deng so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// ma rig pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang / pha ma dang /
75a3(mdo sde): mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi drin glo bar ma chud pa'i slad du/ bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor bshags so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// blun zhing rmongs pas bsgribs te/
75a4(mdo sde): nyam rang dang rgyags pas mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// slan chad kyang mi bgyid do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la
75a5(mdo sde): bdag cag gis yon phul zhing mchod pas ni/ ma lus pa'i sems can de dag kun sa bcu la 'khod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
75a6(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal bu dge mthong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so// skyes bu chen po rang gi las legs nyes kyi rtog pa la mkhas te/ kun nas nyon
75a7(mdo sde): mongs pa'i las la 'jigs pa dang skrag pa skyes nas/ nyes pa rnams mngon par 'thol ba'i slad du/ sems can gyi sdig pa mang po'ang khyod kyis 'thol zhing bshags pa'i phyir/ khyod ni skyes bu dam pa
75b1(mdo sde): yang dag pa zhes bgyi'o/ / rang gi nyon mongs pa'ang spong ba'i steng du/ sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ring du dpral bar byas pas/ de'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya ba yin/
75b2(mdo sde): te/ rang gi don du smos pa yin gyi/ thog mar sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir/ khyod ni//
75b3(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis 'gyed 'tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces bstod do//
75b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan nyag gcig gtso bo'i mchog/ khams gsum pha ma thams cad mkhyen// thams cad mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid/ bcom ldan dkon la phyag 'tshal lo// skye bo sbyin gtong rang gi phyir/
75b5(mdo sde): nor rdzas byin cing lan yang re// byams chen rgyal ba de min te// dgra gnyen byams sdang phan snyoms mdzad// rkang gnyis nang na rgyal ba btsun// shes rab spun gyis mkhyen gzigs la//
75b6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus che bdag skyabs su mchi// lha rnams shes rab de ma 'tshal// 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs// rgyal ba kun la bdag phyag 'tshal// de bzhin rgyal la skyabs gsol pa'ang /
75b7(mdo sde): dus gsum rgyal ba mchod pa bzhin// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi sum stong la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa/
76a1(mdo sde): mang du thos pa 'brang bar byos// slob dpon dge la bkur byas na// sangs rgyas grub pa sun mi rang // gang zhig tshul khrims rnam dag spyod// de ni dge slong yang dag yin/
76a2(mdo sde): gang zhig stong par sgom nus pa// de ni ting 'dzin thob ces bya// gang zhig brtson 'grus spyod nus pa// de ni byang chub spyod pa'o// gang zhig mya ngan 'da' 'gyur ba// de ni dga' ba yang dag
76a3(mdo sde): pa'o/ / tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang // rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong ma// zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong byos// chos gos rnam pa lus gyon te// lhung bzed gseg shang thogs nas su/
76a4(mdo sde): rnam dag bsod snyoms 'gro byas na// lha rnams kun kyang dgar 'gyur bas// thal mo sbyar cing bus phyag 'tshal// ngos kyang lha dang mi rnams kun// de yi bya ba byed du gzhug/ dper na lha bran thams
76a5(mdo sde): cad kyis/ / lha yi dbang po brgya byin la// rim mo gus par byed pa bzhin// da ltar 'phral du'ang lan thob ste// phyi ma'i dus su'ang dpag tu med// rab tu byung zhing khrims 'dzin pa// sangs/
76a6(mdo sde): rgyas drin lan yon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// nga dang sems pa ma gtogs par// 'jig rten pa yi mi kun gyis// rnam dag dad pa'i sems bskyed do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag
76a7(mdo sde): na/ / mya ngan mi 'das rtag tu bzhugs// chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te// de ltar mngon par shes pa ni// sangs rgyas drin lan len zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// 'jig rten pa
76b1(mdo sde): yi mi dag kun/ / rnam par 'byed pa'i sems med cing // theg pa gcig lam mngon par shes// 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa// phyogs bcu dang ni da lta'i rnams// sangs rgyas theg pa gcig/
76b2(mdo sde): pubupul// gnyis sam gsum zhes bya med par// de ltar yid la bskyed nas su// sems kyis rnam par mi rtog na// de lta bu yi mi rnams ni// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di
76b3(mdo sde): lta ste/ / gang zag la la 'ga' zhig gis// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyin// rtag tu dad pa'i sems bskyed de// sems can kun la sangs rgyas kyi// bdag nyid yod par bshad pa ni// de lta
76b4(mdo sde): bu yi gang zag rnams/ / rgyal ba'i drin lan yon zhes bya// gang zhig skad cig dge spyod cing // lha yi 'bras bu mi re ste// cig car bla med lam bsgrubs na// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/
76b5(mdo sde): rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyin// gal te gang zag 'go' zhig gis// yud tsam mdo sde 'di bklags te// dkon mchog gsum la gus byas shing // mkhan la sri zhu
76b6(mdo sde): mchod byas na/ / de lta bu yi gang zag rnams// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// gang zhig nor rdzas sna 'ga' 'am// kha zas dang ni gos kyi rnams// kun la khyab par sbyin byas na// rgyal
76b7(mdo sde): ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ / rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// nga yi chos rnams 'jig pa na// gang zhig 'ga' la blo bstan nas// yud tsam mdo sde 'di mnyan na// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum
77a1(mdo sde): brgyal/ / mchod pa phul bas de lhag go// theg chen mdo sde 'di dag kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub kun gyi yum// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // mdo sde 'di
77a2(mdo sde): dran byas te/ / snyoms sems phan tshun gnyis med na// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// gang zhig chos 'di 'jig pa'i tshe// rgyal ba'i drin lan bla na 'dod
77a3(mdo sde): pas/ / skad cig yud tsam sgom byed pas// stong khams gang ba'i sems can gyi// srog gi sbyin pa byin pa bas// bsam gtan bsgom pa yon tan che// gang zhig bsgom la skur pa dang /
77a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun 'khrugs par byed pa ni// stong khams gsum po gang ba yi// mi rnams kyi ni srog bcad dang // srog chags thams cad bsad dang 'dra// bsgom dang dge 'dun dkrugs skur na//
77a5(mdo sde): de yi sdig kyang de bzhin no// gang zhig dge sbyong mthong ba la// skur pa 'debs shing ma dad pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gcod pas// des ni rgyal ba'i lan mi ldon// de nas rgyal bu
77a6(mdo sde): dge mthong dang / mi sum stos// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan par gnang ba/ dga' ba'i tshim nas bstan pa nyid spyi bos blangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
77a7(mdo sde): kyis bstan pa la/ / gang med lags shing gang mi med// mad dang mi mad gnyis ka yang // dngos por dmigs su yong ma mchis// yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu// chos rnams kun dang ma 'gal
77b1(mdo sde): lo/ / sems can kun la byams slad du// thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de nas byon// yang dag mtshan nyid ji lta ba// de bzhin
77b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'ang de bzhin no/ / 'phags pa kun gyi bden tshig ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin bshad// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// de bzhin gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags// bzod
77b3(mdo sde): pa'i go cha brtan pa'i sems/ / sra ba'i gzhu stobs brtson 'grus che// rno ba'i mda' ni shes rabs mgyogs// le lo'i dgra rnams 'joms mdzad cing // 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi// mchod
77b4(mdo sde): yon phul ba bzhes pas na/ / de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba lags// rab tu sdug bsngal mtshan nyid mkhyen// sdug bsngal rgyu yang shin tu mkhyen// sdug bsngal
77b5(mdo sde): zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang / / zhi ba'i tshul yang rab tu mkhyen// 'phags pa'i bden bzhi mkhyen pas na// 'gyur ba ma mchis bden par nges// de bas phyogs bcu'i nang na yang // mtshan ni yang
77b6(mdo sde): dag rdzogs zhes bgyis/ / rig pa gsum po mchog brnyes pas// spyod lam rnam dag yang dag ldan// de slad mtshan ni bcom ldan 'das// mkhyen dang zhabs su ldan zhes bgyi// chos
77b7(mdo sde): rnams thams cad kun mkhyen cing / / dam pa'i chos nyid rab brnyes paso// thams cad kun la byams slad du// dus skabs skyer ba thabs kyis bshad// skye rgan 'chi rab bsal cing /
78a1(mdo sde): bde ba'i gnas su phyin par mdzad// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// bde bar gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags// 'jig rten gang nas mchis pa dang // 'jig rten pas pa'i
78a2(mdo sde): mtha' yang mkhyen/ / de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// 'jig rten mkhyen ces bgyi ba lags// thugs rje chen pos sems can bsgral// mnyen des dge ba bstan cing btul// de yi slad du rgyal
78a3(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan/ / skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab can// thub cing bla ru 'da' ba med// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// bla na med ces bgyi ba lags/
78a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs mi mnga' shes rab ldan// rnam grol dam pa mchog bshad pas// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// lha dang mi yi ston ces bgyi// dus gsum g.yo 'am mi g.yo la// bas sam mabs
78a5(mdo sde): chos kun kyang / / byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas// de yi slad du mtshan sangs rgyas// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas// sku nam mkha' la 'phags
78a6(mdo sde): te/ zhal so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi sum stong po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi rang bzhin ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ bar
78a7(mdo sde): na'ang mi gnas so/ / sems brtan pa'i phyir dge ba'i mthu yang brtan no// sems rnam par grol ba'i phyir/ sdig gi rang bzhin yang rnam par grol lo// shes rab stong pa nyid kyi phyir// sdig gi
78b1(mdo sde): rang bzhin kyang stong pa nyid do/ / dad pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi mthu yang che'o// de bzhin du mthol bshags te 'gyod tshangs nus pa ni/ nged rnams mthong ba'i steng du/ sangs rgyas rin chen mang /
78b2(mdo sde): dang / sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs pas/ rgyun du nga'ang mthong la/ deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bar/ de bzhin du 'gyod
78b3(mdo sde): tshangs byas pa ni/ nga dang sprul pa'i sku rnams dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang la sogs pa thams cad kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / mchod
78b4(mdo sde): pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / de dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di'i rjes su byang chub tu chud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor zhabs 'bring ba rnam pa bka' stsal pa/
78b5(mdo sde): sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par 'dod na// rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin du dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la re re nas
78b6(mdo sde): dmigs te phyag 'tshal ba/ nga dang phrad pa dang 'dra ba 'am/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed de/ sangs rgyas gcig gam/ sangs rgyas gnyis sam/ sangs rgyas bcu 'am/ sangs rgyas brgya
78b7(mdo sde): 'am/ sangs rgyas stong ngam/ sangs rgyas khri 'am/ sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmigs la/ de bzhin du re re nas kyang dmigs te/ sems kyis phyag
79a1(mdo sde): 'tshal na/ de dag gis bsod nams dpag tu med pa'ang thob par 'gyur la/ 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad kyang sel bar byed do// bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du ngan song
79a2(mdo sde): gsum du lhung bar mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur bar yang nges te/ the tsom med do// de'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'thol zhing bshags par byas la/ sems thag pa nas dang
79a3(mdo sde): pab bskyed na/ gdon mi za bar sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi sum stong gis cig car du skad bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de
79a4(mdo sde): bstod pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan byams shing thugs rje che// shAkya'i gdung rigs chos kyi rje// tshogs kyi nang na seng ge'i sgras// khyab par sems can bsdus pa ni// pa la
79a5(mdo sde): gzigs pa bu gcig bzhin/ / rnam par 'byed pa yod ma mchis// de lta bu yi bla med pa// mthong nas de slad gus phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal bu dge mthong dang // mi sum
79a6(mdo sde): stong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams 'di ltar 'gyod tshangs byas te/ mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshegs pas/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes
79a7(mdo sde): bya'o/ / khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang zhig sems thag pa nas phyogs bcu'i de
79b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi drin gyi lan lon zhes bya ste/ de ma thag
79b2(mdo sde): tu mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig 'byung bar gyur nas/ rgyun du zhugs par 'os pa ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// lan cig phyir 'ong
79b3(mdo sde): bar 'os pa ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no// phyir mi 'ong bar 'os pa ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no// dgra bcom par 'os pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no//
79b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas su 'os pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu sbyin no// byang chub sems dpar 'os pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// da ltar mdo sde 'di'i nang na/ byang chub sems
79b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'ang / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' skye
79b6(mdo sde): ba gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings tho nga / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnam la yon no// byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
79b7(mdo sde): rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ / byang chub sems dpa' la las don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud pa'ang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa'
80a1(mdo sde): la la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la las nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting
80a2(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la la phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa dang /
80a3(mdo sde): chos sbyin gyi bzod pa dang / chos sbyin gyi dbyings dang ldan pa'ang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la la gzungs dran pa chen po'i sems dang /
80a4(mdo sde): rang gis rig pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'ang / dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la la seng ge'i sgra'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge
80a5(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la la mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge
80a6(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang ldan pa'ang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag
80a7(mdo sde): 'tshal ba yin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad nor cing
80b1(mdo sde): 'khrul pas sems 'khrugs te/ mi dge ba dang / mtshams ma mchis pa bgyis pa rnams ji ltar bgyis na sdig 'byang bar 'gyur zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal la bka'
80b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ gong du bstan pa yin te/ gang la las phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'
80b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi mtshan thos nas/ dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba bskyed la/ dad pa dang gus pa dpag tu med pas blangs sam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ 'don tam/ yi ger bris sam/ kun chub
80b4(mdo sde): par byas te/ dben pa'i gnas khang pa gcig gi nang du dkyil 'khor byas la/ dri chus chag chag btab ste/ 'phan gdugs bzang pos brgyan cing pog spos zhim po bsregs nas/ rgyal ba rnams
80b5(mdo sde): spyan drang zhing gshegs su gsol ba mang yang rung / nyung yang rung / spyan drangs nas/ bdag khrus dag par byas la gos gtsang ma gyon cing / lan cig phyi rol che chung du 'gro na/ khrus lan cig byas
80b6(mdo sde): te/ seng ge'i khri btsugs nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du bsgoms la/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can la sogs pa'i lta ba med par mngon par rtogs
80b7(mdo sde): par byas te/ dang po pas bye brag phyed cing gsal bar brjod par bya'o// de nas dri spos zhim po bsregs la/ 'khrugs sems bsal cing / dran pa yang dag pa dang / bsam pa yang dag pas/
81a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la sems rtse gcig tu bsam mo// de ltar spyod pa rnams 'thun zhing 'dum pa ni mchog ste/ de la mi mthun zhing rtsod pa ni 'thol tshang su mi 'gyur ro//
81a2(mdo sde): khro ba des kun 'jigs par byed de/ spyod lam dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po dran zhing don dam pa bsams la/ nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du nyal zhing gnyid log tu mi rung ngo // nyin
81a3(mdo sde): gcig kyang dus gsum du mdo sde 'di kha ten tam/ klog pa nyin mtshan dus drug tu byas la/ dri bsung gis mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas/ 'thol tshangs su byas te/ mdo sde 'di nyid nas/ sangs rgyas
81a4(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan brjod cing / sems thag pa nas mi 'khrug pa dang / sems thag pa nas mi nor ba dang / sems thag pa nas mi g.yeng ba dang /
81a5(mdo sde): sems thag pa nas dus kyis 'grus pa dang / sems thag pa nas nyin gcig pas nyin gcig 'grus pa dang / sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas dga' ba skyed pa dang /
81a6(mdo sde): sems thag pa nas rim pa bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas rgyun mi gcad pa dang / sems thag pa nas gza' ba dang / sems thag pa nas mi 'bral ba dang / sems thag pa nas sdig pa mi bsam pa dang / sems
81a7(mdo sde): thag pa nas sang rgyas dran pa dang / sem thag pa nas chos dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas gtong ba dran pa dang /
81b1(mdo sde): sems thag pa nas don dam pa'i lha dran pa ste/ de dag de bzhin du klog pa dang / de bzhin du phyag bya ba dang / de bzhin du sems thag pa nas so sor 'chags shing 'thol pa/ thog ma'i nyin par nas//
81b2(mdo sde): zhag drug tu lon pa'i nang par dri nus yang chag chag btab ste/ lus la'ang spos chus bkru bar bya'o// pog spos bzang po bsreg cing / sems thag pa nas mchod pa byas pa/ de dag de lta bur sems thag pa nas so sor
81b3(mdo sde): 'thol zhing bshag pas/ phyogs bcur skul bar 'gyur te/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang 'grog te/ sgra dbyangs
81b4(mdo sde): kyi rjes su khang bu de'i nang du phyin cing mngon du 'grub pa'i dbang du bya'o/ / de bzhin du nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du byas na/ gdon mi za bar sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar sdig 'byung bar shes
81b5(mdo sde): she na/ / so so'i skye bo rnams kyi don dam par da dung ma grub pas/ rmi ltas kyi mtshan ma la brtags su byas te/ rmi lam rnams gcig rmis na/ mtshams med pa rnam gcig 'byung ngo // rmi
81b6(mdo sde): lam rnam lnga rmis na mtshams med pa rnam lnga 'byang ste/ des nub mo rmi lam na chu klung chen po rgal bar 'dod de/ zam pa chen po'i steng du 'gro bar rmis na/ de ni nges par rnam par grol ba thob pa
81b7(mdo sde): yin no/ / gal te de'i rmi lam na gzhan gyis bdag la khrus byas pa dang / lus la char bab par rmis na/ de nges par rnam par dag pa thob pa yin no// gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag dge 'dun mang
82a1(mdo sde): po'i nang du zhugs te gral du 'dug par rmis na/ de ni nges par sangs rgyas kyi slob ma yang dag par gyur to// gal te de'i rmi lam na/ bdag mchod rten nas gtsug lag khang du
82a2(mdo sde): zhugs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar rmis na/ de ni chos kyi sgo mo dam par zhugs par gyur to// gal te rang gis shing thog rnyed cing za bar rmis na/ de ni tshe 'di
82a3(mdo sde): nyid la yon tan gyi 'bras bu 'grub par mngon no/ / yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge sbyong ma 'am/ byang
82a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dad pa can gang la la dran pa nyams te/ nor cing 'khrul pas sdom pa'i tshul khrims re re na zhig pa 'am/ nyam pa de bzhin du so sor 'chags shing 'thol na/ sdig mi 'byang mi srid de/ sems
82a5(mdo sde): thag pa nas ma byas pa ni ma gtogs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces zhus so// bcom ldan 'das cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ba'i tshe/ mi mang na rung ngam mi rung / bcom ldan
82a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ mi gcig yan chad nyi shu man chad rung ngo // cho ga 'di ltar spyod pa'i tshe/ mdo sde gzhan mi bsam mo// de ltar 'thol tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin chad nyes pa mi byed na/
82a7(mdo sde): de ni 'thol tshangs zhes bya'o// de ltar dran par gyis shig/ bdag cag rnams da ltar 'chi ba las slar 'tsho ba dang 'dra bas/ da ni bdag tshul khrims srung ngo // da ni bdag
82b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus su spyod do/ / da ni bdag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa dang / kha ton bgyi'o zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na dran pa de ltar gyis shig/ bdag deng nas sdom pa bzung ba ni rdo rje dang 'dra bar sran/
82b2(mdo sde): thub par smon to// des de ltar dran pa'i tshe/ skyes bu dam pa dri ma med par grags pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu de'i mdun du 'greng ste/ dbang du byed do// 'phags pa kun tu
82b3(mdo sde): bzang po'ang 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po byed do/ / 'phags pa 'od srungs kyang zhu gnas kyi rten byed do// 'jam dpal 'di ni sdig sbyangs pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul
82b4(mdo sde): khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ / 'di ni gnas thob pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang la
82b5(mdo sde): la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad dang / sdom pa phyed can dang / tshul khrims bcu dang / gsum la skyabs su song ba dang / khrims lnga dang / dge ba bcu dang / tshul khrims dang / 'dul
82b6(mdo sde): ba re re nas zhig pa'am/ nyams pa 'am/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa 'am/ mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig byas pa zhig yod pa de log spyod ma gtogs par/ so sor ma bshags ma 'thol na/
82b7(mdo sde): mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi za bar mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal ba zhes
83a1(mdo sde): bgyir de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis lhung ba dang / dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang / rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal
83a2(mdo sde): bskal pa'i grangs ji tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal shin tu'ang mkhas so// shin tu'ang mkhas so//
83a3(mdo sde): don 'di lta bu 'dri ba'ang shin tu mkhas te/ legs par nyon la phal mang po rnams kyang legs par soms shig/ ngas bye brag phyed par bshad do// ji ltar na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes
83a4(mdo sde): bya zhe na/ skad cig kyang mnar zhing bstir med pa'i phyir/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// gcig tu na 'gag pa 'am/ 'ong bar bya ba'ang med/ 'gyur ba'ang med de/ tsha ba ni rab tu tsha/ sdug
83a5(mdo sde): bsngal ba ni shin tu'ang mi bzad pa/ skad cig kyang mi dal/ skad cig kyang mi sdod cing bar skabs med pa'i phyir/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// yang rnam pa gcig tu na/ me chen po 'bar ba
83a6(mdo sde): rab tu tsha ba/ kun tu 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar zhing mched pa/ khong du zhugs pa'i phyir/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ rigs
83a7(mdo sde): kyi bu dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i dbyibs ni gru bzhi lham pa/ dpag tshad brgyad khri yod de/ lcags kyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor cing / steng du'ang lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis g.yogs te/
83b1(mdo sde): 'og tu bar chad bco brgyad yod do// de'i kho ra khor yug tu ral gri'i tshal rim pa bdun gyis bskor to// lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can yod do// lcags
83b2(mdo sde): kyi khang pa bar chad bco brgyad po rtseg mar 'dug ste/ rim pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do// de'i grwa bzhir zangs kyi khyi chen po bzhi 'dug pa/ lus kyi bong tshad ni 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu la/ mig ni
83b3(mdo sde): glog gi 'od bzhin/ mche ba ni ral gri sdong po dang 'dra/ so ni spu gri so gtams pa'i ri dang mtshungs/ lce ni lcags kyi mchil pa bzhin/ sder mo ni lcags kyi gsal shing dang 'tshungs/ mjug ma ni
83b4(mdo sde): lcags kyi sprul dang 'dra/ spu'i bu gu re re nas 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ste/ de'i dud pa mnam pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi rdzas mnam pa gang dang yang bskrun du
83b5(mdo sde): med do/ / dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhi la/ sgo re re na dmyal ba'i srungs ma bco brgyad 'dug go// mgo ni srin po'i mgo/ kha ni srin po'i kha dang 'dra ste/ mgo la rA bco brgyad yod pa/ lag na lkugs
83b6(mdo sde): kyi gsal shing thogs so/ / ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su lcags kyi rgyal mtshan grangs med pa zhig yod de/ rgyal mtshan gyi mgor me 'byung ba ni/ chu mig 'byung ba dang 'dra bar 'byung ngo //
83b7(mdo sde): lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'bab pa ni/ kun tu khyab par 'bab ste/ dmyal ba'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i steng na/ zangs mo che bco brgyad yod pa'i nang na/ lcags khol ba'i khu ba khar ldud cing / sgo bzhir
84a1(mdo sde): 'bab pa/ dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar bab bo// khang pa bar chad re re'i nang du'ang lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pas// khar gdug pa'i me skyug cing ra bkun
84a2(mdo sde): tu gang bar gtong ngo / / sbrul gyi sgra sgrogs pa ni 'brug sgra chen po zer ba bzhin no// lcags kyi thu lum chen po'o char bab pa'ang mnar med pa kun tu gang ngo // der sdug bsngal mi bzad pa ni 'bum
84a3(mdo sde): phrag brgyad khri ste/ sdug bsngal gyi nang na sdug bsngal/ me bzad pa'i nang na mi bzad pa/ kun kyang der 'dus pas dpe zla med do// mnar med pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhir/ sgo re re'i phyi rol tu 'bar
84a4(mdo sde): ba'i me shin tu mched cing 'bar ba/ lho byang shar nub bsnol zhing phyad par rgyu'o// 'bar ba'ang lcags kyi ra ba kho ra khor yug dpag tshad brgyad khri nas/ steng lcags kyi dra ba la thug gi bar du/
84a5(mdo sde): yang thal mar thal zhing bla za 'og dang / phyogs bzhir kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal cig car ldang ba ni/ gong du smos pa bzhin no// rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa dang
84a6(mdo sde): mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa 'debs pa rnams mdo sde 'di las 'byung ba bzhin 'thol tshangs ma byas la/ gnod bkur ba 'am/ khrel ba med na mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu/ stobs
84a7(mdo sde): tshan po che'i dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing bskum pa tsam gyis mnar med pa'i dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur ro/ / lus kyang de'i nang du gang ste/ tsha ba'i gzir bas 'phongs nas kha gang ngas/ mig btsums//
84b1(mdo sde): mig gdangs/ kha btsums kyang kha 'thams pas smra ma nus so// de sdig mang ba'i phyir ral gri 'khor lo grangs med pa du ma zhig nam mkha' nas char bzhin 'bab ste/ klad par phog cing rkang par byang
84b2(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin brgya stong khri phrag tu bsgyur ba'o/ / gang la la rtsa ba bzhi po tshang bar zhig par gyur na/ sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ba ni/ bskal pa chen
84b3(mdo sde): po lnga rdzogs kyi bar du'o/ / sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa ni de las gyur cig gis mang ngo // mtshams med pa lnga yang gyur cig gis mang ngo // mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la skur pa 'debs pa'ang gyur
84b4(mdo sde): cig gis mang ngo / / dkon mchog gsum la smod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma tshangs par spyod pa la/ dri ma can du spyod pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob
84b5(mdo sde): dpon la dbang za ba dang / ma la g.yem pa rnam pa gong ma dag las kyang gyur cig gis bskyed do// log spyod kyi rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gtan chad pas/ nams kyang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas mi
84b6(mdo sde): thar pa ni der ma gtogs so/ / de la sogs pa'i sdig can rnams sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe/ 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched pa khong du zhugs te rmugs nas 'chi'o// de nas srin po dmyal
84b7(mdo sde): ba'i srungs mas lcags kyi gsal shing sa la brdabs te/ sos sos zhes bos pa dang / bos pa'i sgra bzhin du yang sos yang sos nas/ nyin mtshan gcig la lan khri ni 'chi/ lan khri ni 'tshe ste/
85a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po nyams su myong ba ni gong du bstan pa bzhin no// nam zhig mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas slar phyin na'ang tshul khrims bshig pa dang / yon bdag dad
85a2(mdo sde): pa can gyi yon blangs pa'i las kyis/ yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams kyi nang du 'jug ste/ de la dmyal ba grang sbrebs pa dang / dmyal ba mun nag pa dang / dmyal ba rab tsha ba dang / dmyal ba spu gri so
85a3(mdo sde): bsnams pa dang / dmyal ba ral gri 'khor lo dang / dmyal ba me'i shing rta can dang / dmyal ba phyi sa'i 'dam dang / dmyal ba chu tshan dang / dmyal ba me mur klung dang / dmyal ba nags tshal ral gri
85a4(mdo sde): lo ma can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi shal ma li ka ba can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi khri can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khor lo can dang / dmyal ba
85a5(mdo sde): lcags kyi thu lum dang / dmyal ba bsdus 'joms thug ri dang / dmyal ba zangs khu lud dang / 'di rnams so so re re'i nang du'ang lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyon mongs nas gdod thar te/ 'on kyang
85a6(mdo sde): rtag tu ma rabs su skyes la/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra mi thos so// brgya la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa na ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed kyang srid/ dge ba'i bshes
85a7(mdo sde): dang ma phrad na ni/ slar yang dmyal bar lhung ngo // nyes byas kyi sdig pa rnams ma mthol ma bshags na/ dmyal bar sdug bsngal myong ba'ang rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i lo grangs lta bur/ lo khri phrag
85b1(mdo sde): brgyad brgya'i bar du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ / de la ltung ba rnams kyi sdig pa ni de las nyis 'gyur du bskyed do// dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'ang de las nyis 'gyur du bskyed do// sdig can de dag/
85b2(mdo sde): gis sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe/ tshig gzhan mi phyin te/ a pa pa/ a ta ta/ a la la/ a ba ba 'ba' zhig zer zhing 'dug go/ de bas na sdog can rnams rings par so sor
85b3(mdo sde): 'thol zhing bshags la/ dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs su song bar gyis shig/ 'jam dpal yang 'di lta ste/ sdig pa myur du bsal cing byang bar 'don na/ mdo sde 'di'i nang nas
85b4(mdo sde): 'byung ba bzhin du so sor 'thol bshags te/ 'gyed tshangs byos shig/ cho ga nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig za gcig tu byas la/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran
85b5(mdo sde): pas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas su grub pa'i tshe/ mi chen po'i mtshan dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mtshan dang / mi g.yo ba'i mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan dang / 'od zer
85b6(mdo sde): can gyi mtshan dang / ye shes yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i mtshan rnams
85b7(mdo sde): bsam par bya'o/ / yang gcig tu na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i yid dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o//
86a1(mdo sde): yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ sbyar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ shes rab
86a2(mdo sde): sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ shes rab smon ma las langs te/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid las langs te/ mtshan ma 'od zer can gyi
86a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ mtshan ma 'od zer can las langs te/ seng ge'i nga ro'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge'i nga ro las langs te/ seng ge sprug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge
86a4(mdo sde): sprug pa las langs te/ rgya mtsho yid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ rgya mtsho yid las langs te/ kun tu ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ kun tu ye shes las langs te/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge
86a5(mdo sde): 'dzin la 'jug/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya las langs te/ kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can las langs te/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi ting
86a6(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chos kyi dbyings nyid las langs te/ seng ge'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge'i rgyal po las langs te/ chos kyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chos kyi rgyal
86a7(mdo sde): po las langs te/ bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa las langs te/ stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ stong pa nyid kyi
86b1(mdo sde): shes rab las langs te/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa las langs te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chen/
86b2(mdo sde): po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las langs te/ gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus kyi gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can las langs te/ sems kyi
86b3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ byang chub
86b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ rdo rje gtsug tor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ rdo rje gtsug tor las langs te/ rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/
86b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho thams cad las langs te/ gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las langs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge
86b6(mdo sde): 'dzin la 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya mtsho las langs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug
86b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho las langs te/ gdod thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mtha' med/ mu med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgor 'jug
87a1(mdo sde): par bya'o/ / mtha' med mu med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgo nas langs te/ yid 'gog pa dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba las langs te/ rdo rje gdon mi za/
87a2(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par grol ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dad pa skad cig ma'i sems bskyed de/
87a3(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ klog pa 'am/ kha ton du skad cig mar dran te/ bsam pa'i 'du shes dang / dran pa'i 'du shes dang / rtog pa'i 'du shes su dad pa'i sems grub na/ skad cig mar
87a4(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu'i gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdig phyir snyil bar 'gyur ro/ / ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'ang gtan bral bar 'gyur ro// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag
87a5(mdo sde): tu 'tshe skyong zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mngon no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// 'khor mang po rnams la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ yi dgas mthu chen tham ca dang // dud 'gro
87a6(mdo sde): glang po ma rungs dang / / bud med g.yeng dang ma rungs klu// dpag tu med pa'i ma rungs rnams// ba su dang ni ma skyes dag/ lha sbyin dang ni sor mo'i 'phreng // lus dang sems kyi sdig spyad pas//
87a7(mdo sde): dmyal ba mnar med lhung 'os kyang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal phyir// thub pa mya ngan 'da' ba'i khar// bskal pa grangs med phyir bshol lo// ma ga d+ha
87b1(mdo sde): yi skye bo dag/ kun kyang byang chub sems bskyed pa'ang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/ gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// ko'u di n+ya la sogs pa// nyan thos lnga brgya dag gis ni//
87b2(mdo sde): ma 'ongs dus su 'tshang rgya ba'ang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// mu stegs dang ni bram ze dang // sngags 'chang chen po drang srong bcu// da ltar dgra bcom
87b3(mdo sde): grub pa yang / / 'das pa'i phyogs bcu dus sum gyi// rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas yon// dam pa'i don la chud pa dang // phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i zhing rnams na// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
87b4(mdo sde): thams cad/ / tshe dpag med par skyes pa yang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// sngon nga rgyal po byed pa na/
