116b2(mdo sde): klu rnam par bsgyings pa'i gnas zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gnas par bgyi lags so// ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus bdag gis de dag gi khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang /
116b3(mdo sde): 'dod chags de dag nye bar zhi bar bgyi lags so// de dag 'jam pa dang / snod du rung ba dang / sems zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la
116b4(mdo sde): sems byams pa dang / snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba dang / sems brtse ba can du 'gyur bar bgyi lags so// klu khro bo dang / klu ma rungs pa rnams dad par 'gyur bar bgyi lags so// sems can
116b5(mdo sde): thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing snying brtse ba can gyi sems kyi sa la gnas par bgyi lags so/ / gzhan yang gang dag rdzi char dang / char mo che dang / than chen dang / sprin dang / sprin chen dang / lhags pa dang
116b6(mdo sde): tsha ba dag gis gnod par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ bdag gis ming brjod nas 'di skad du/ ri'i snying po thugs rje rgya che ba/ klu yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ bdag cag dran lags
116b7(mdo sde): so/ / dran lags so// bla na med pa'i byang chub la spyod par mdzad pa/ thabs dang ye shes sna tshogs la brtson pas mi spyod lags sam/ bdag cag sdug bsngal las thar par mdzad du gsol/
117a1(mdo sde): yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes smra ba dag gis 'di skad du brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ stam b+ha b+hU dza/ bi ruDa b+hu dza/ go g+ha/ bi re dzA b+hu dza/ me ru b+hu dza/ ga dub b+hu dza/
117a2(mdo sde): huchung rung / a ne ba pU dza/ sma ra b+hu dza/ s+pha ra a brta b+hu dze/ nim pa b+hu swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang kha cig klu khro bo de dag gis rgyus gnod pa dag gis gnod pa bgyis par gyur pa de
117a3(mdo sde): lta bu de dag gis bdag gi ming nas brjod par bgyi zhing / klu khro bo nga rgyal can dregs pa/ phrag dog dang 'dod chags kyi sems zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ gsang sngags 'don pa na/ bdag gis lha'i rna ba
117a4(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas thos nas/ skye gnas bzhi pa'i klu dang / klu chen po dang / klu rgan po dang / klu'i bu dang / klu'i 'khor rnams dad par ma bgyis sam/ dus ma lags par don ched
117a5(mdo sde): yang ba la zhugs pa dag ma bzlog gam/ de'i tshe dus ma lags pa'i char mo che dang / than chen dang / dus ma lags pa'i lhags pa dang / tsha ba dang / rlung dang / sprin dang / 'khrug pa dag rab tu
117a6(mdo sde): zhibar ma bgyis sam/ bdag gis bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi bsam pa dag yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis na/ bdag gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
117a7(mdo sde): 'das thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
117b1(mdo sde): gis sngon 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs mar me mdzad 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ smon lam brtan por btab ste/ shin tu gnas par
117b2(mdo sde): gyur lags so/ / de'i 'og tu'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag skyed 'tsho zhing gzhes pa 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar smon lam brtan po 'di lta bu dag
117b3(mdo sde): btab ste/ bdag gis der rtag par sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus chen pos shin tu brtan par gnas par bgyi'o zhes brtson par bgyis lags so//
117b4(mdo sde): da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar klu khro bo rnams yongs smin par bgyi ba'i slad du rtsol ba brtan por bgyis la/ bdag gis de lta bu'i rtsol ba brtan pos brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni/ bskal pa
117b5(mdo sde): grangs ma mchis par skad cig tsam yang btang ma myong lags so/ / bdag gis rtag par pha rol gnon pa'i rtsol ba dang / brtson pa brtan pos sems can yongs su smin par bgyis lags pa
117b6(mdo sde): rnams kyang / yang yongs su smin par bgyi lags so// gzhan yang bdag gis klu'i dbang po dag theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyis lags te/ klu glang po che rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal
117b7(mdo sde): po shin tu rab gnas 'di dang / klu sbrul rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo 'di gnyis dang / klu rta rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'di dang / klu nya rnams kyi
118a1(mdo sde): bdag po klu'i rgyal po rgya u0f88u0f90 dang / kla sbal pa rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal ba yang bsangs 'di lta ste/ klu de sgra bu dag ni sems can rnams pa gnod pa brgyad rdzogs pa dag go/
118a2(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po gzhan lta bu de dag kyang / rang rang gi mthus sems can rnams la de lta bur gnod pa bgyid rngo thogs pa dag go// 'di ltar theg pa chen po sa rab tu zhugs pa'i rgyal po chen po de dag thams cad
118a3(mdo sde): kyis kyang / so so rang rang gi 'khor dang / dpung gi tshogs rnams dus ma lags par de lta bur yang ba bsgrubs pas rang rang gi 'khor rnams skyong bar bgyid lags so// 'di ltar 'dir bcos
118a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa chos sgron ma dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myur du mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du 'khor der mchis pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po klu'i
118a5(mdo sde): / drang srong la legs so zhes bgyi bsngal to// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to//
118a6(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten pa'i klu dang / klu'i bdag po gang dag sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba'i klu de dag gang na bcom ldan
118a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi 'khor nyan thos rnams dang / 'khor byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / yul 'khor der sha kho na ma mchis pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur
118b1(mdo sde): lags so/ / gnod sems ma mchis pa dang / sems mnyam pas gnas par 'gyur lags so// gang dag yul 'khor de'i rgyal po de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu
118b2(mdo sde): da par 'gyur lags so/ / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa'ang 'dzin par 'gyur lags so// dbang phyug gis rgyags pa dang / dregs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par mi
118b3(mdo sde): 'gyur lags so/ / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung nas/ skra bregs
118b4(mdo sde): te gos ngur smrig bgos pa/ snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa bgyid lags so// gzhan yang yul 'khor de
118b5(mdo sde): na/ gang dag mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa de'i tsher mar gyur pa de dag chos dang ldan pas smod par bgyid lags so// de nas yul 'khor der dge sbyong dang / bram ze bsod snyoms pa
118b6(mdo sde): rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po dag gis sngon lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa phul ba rnams rgyal rigs dge bas 'phrog par mi bgyid la/ rgyal rigs dge ba/ blon po dang / mdun na 'don dang /
118b7(mdo sde): skye bo dmag mi rnams dang bcas pas tshogs sbyor ba ni don ched la brtson pa lags so// snying po blangs pa lags so// lag brkyang nas lhug par gtong ba lags te/ rgyal rigs dge ba de
119a1(mdo sde): yul 'khor dang bcas par bsrung bar bgyi lags so/ / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags so// de'i yul phyogs na/ rtsod pa'i rnyog pa thams cad dang / so so'i 'khor dag
119a2(mdo sde): sngar ji skad bstan pa bzhin bskrad par bgyi lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gos ngur smrig kha bsgyur ba 'di ni/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags/
119a3(mdo sde): so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyal mtshan lags so// mya ngan las 'das par mche ba rnams kyi lam lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams kyi ral gri lags so// mya ngan las 'das pa'i
119a4(mdo sde): sa bon lags so/ / lam las rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi sgron ma lags so// phung po rnams kyi sman lags so// ma rig pa'i mun pa'i rlung lags so// ngan 'gro rnams kyi srog shing lags so//
119a5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis nyams par gyur pa rnams kyi sgyug sman lags so// dam rnams kyi rdo rje lags so// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi gter lags so// sdig pas gos pa rnams kyi chab lags so//
119a6(mdo sde): / nongs pa bgyis pa rnams kyi me long lags so// sems g.yeng ba rnam kyi ting nge 'dzin lags so// ting nge 'dzin rnam kyi za ma tog lag so// pha rol tu phyin pa rnam kyis gzhi lags so// gzungs rnams kyi nor bu
119a7(mdo sde): lags so/ / bzod pa rnams kyi khyim lags so// sa rnams kyi snod legs so// phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyi mapar lags so// nad pa rnams kyi spen ma lags so// bslab pa rnams kyi lags so//
119b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pas kun nas gdungs pa rnams kyi zla ba lags so// lta ba ngan par lhung ba rnams kyi nyi ma lags so// ye shes kyi rgya mtsho lags so// byang chub kyi phyogs pa rnams kyi 'phreng bar gyur pa
119b2(mdo sde): lags so/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bum pa bzang po lags so// chos gos ngur smrig 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba lags so// chos gos ngur smrig 'di ni sems can
119b3(mdo sde): rnams la chos kyi char bab pa'i don gyi slad du/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag ni bcom ldan
119b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par bgyid cing / dge slong dag la mtho 'tsham par bgyid pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung ba snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa'i lus la gnod pa bgyid
119b5(mdo sde): pa dang / nor 'phrog pa dang / srog gi bar chad dag bgyid pa'i bar du'o// yul 'khor der gang dag sangs rgyas la dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / grul
119b6(mdo sde): bum dang / yi dgas mthu bo che de dag thams cad kyang rgyal rigs gdol pa la gshe bar gyur te/ de dag gis de'i yul 'khor du 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / lo nyes dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag
119b7(mdo sde): tshogs dag 'byung bar bgyid lags so/ / dus ma lags pa'i char mo che dang / than chen dang / lhags pa dang / tsha ba dang / rlung dang / nyi mas gdungs pa dag gis sa bon dang / myu gu dang /
120a1(mdo sde): 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro rnams mi rung bar bgyid kyang / de na klu rnams la skyon ni ma mchis lags te/ de na klu rnams rgyu des
120a2(mdo sde): na grags pa ma lags pas ni gos par 'gyur lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dper bgyin/ yul gyi bud med bzang mos zas ngan pa 'tshal na/ dbugs dri mi 'da' bar 'gyur lags so//
120a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du rgyal rigs gdol pas kyang rgyal rigs kyi chos rnams spangs nas/ dmangs rigs kyi chos rnams spyod pa bgyid na yul phyogs thams cad srung ba'i lha nas/ yi dgas mthu bo che dag gi
120a4(mdo sde): bar du khros par 'gyur te/ de dag gis yul 'khor ma rung bar bgyid la/ klu dang / klu chen po rnams grags pa ma logs pas kyang gos par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
120a5(mdo sde): pa/ klu'i bdag po rgyal po rnams rgyal po'i bslab pa'i gzhi gnas par bstan pa de dang de dag mtho ris dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la brtson pa yin no// gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa rgyal
120a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bslab pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i bar la gzhol ba yin no/ / klu'i bdag po nga rang gi 'khor bslab pa las mi 'da' bar bstan pa des na/ de dag da ltar
120a7(mdo sde): dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par mi byed par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// btsun pa bde bar
120b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa de lta lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul 'khor gang dang gang dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags kyi gnas yul 'khor de na/ bcom ldan
120b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi nyan thos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing thos pa mang po skyon gnas de lta bu dag ba/ shing mchis pa der bdag gi 'khor gang dag klu dang / klu mo dang / klu rgan po dang / klu rgan mo dang / klu'i bu
120b3(mdo sde): dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu'i 'khor dang / klu'i 'khor mo rnams dang / dus ma lags par rdzi char dang / ser drag dang / char mo che dang / zan chen dag gtong bar bgyid dam/ lhags mo che dang / shin tu
120b4(mdo sde): tsha ba dang / nyi mas gdungs pa dag 'byung ba bgyid dam/ sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman kyi ro dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag chab
120b5(mdo sde): 'tshal bar bgyid na/ klu de dag gis bdag cag bslus pas/ de'i lus thams cad 'khums par 'gyur ro// de dag rdzu 'phrul dang bral nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig/ rims nad kyis gdungs
120b6(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ longs spyod thams dang bral bar gyur cig/ spobs pa med par gyur cig/ don byed mi nus par gyur cig ces mnas bsgag par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ nA ga dz+nyA du sha~M
120b7(mdo sde): nA ga me ne/ nA ga d+ha ra g+hu g+h+ra/ dza la glu g+hA/ A bi mu ra ge/ sa ha sra mu khe/ ka la tim pu se/ nA ga stam b+hi/ dza ya ba pha le/ bi mu shag kre swA hA/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis de nyid du
121a1(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ / de nyid kyi tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams shugs drag por 'khrugs shing sngangs par gyur to// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen
121a2(mdo sde): dga' bo gnyis stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su/ rgyal rigs
121a3(mdo sde): gdol pa de dag gzhan la sbyin par ma dad cing / bdag nyid longs spyod par 'tshal la/ 'jungs pa longs spyod la sems kun tu 'dzin cing lag mi skyong bas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa
121a4(mdo sde): dang / 'phongs pa dang / 'gron po slong ba rnams kun nas tshim par mi bgyid lags so// pho brang 'khor dang / ljongs kyi mi dang / 'khor rnams yang dag pa'i bde bas tshim par mi bgyid lags so//
121a5(mdo sde): rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag la yul phyogs srung ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas mthu bo che de dag thams cad kyang khros par gyur te/ de dag gi yul
121a6(mdo sde): 'khor du 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag kun tu 'byung bar bgyid lags so// 'bru dang sman gyi bar gyi ro rnams ma rung bar bgyid kyang / de na klu dang / klu chen
121a7(mdo sde): po rnams la skyon ni ma mchis lags te/ de na klu rnams rgyu des na grags pa ma lags pas ni gos par 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ phyis khung gi dri mi 'da' ba bser mas
121b1(mdo sde): 'tshal na/ dri mi bda' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal rigs gdol pa brnab mos kyang yul phyogs thams cad srung ba dag khros par 'gyur te/ yul 'khor de ma rung bar bgyid
121b2(mdo sde): lags so/ / klu rnams kyang grags pa ma lags pas gos par 'gyur lags so// / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// / yang na klu thams cad bdag gis
121b3(mdo sde): bslab pa las mi 'da' bar bdag gis lung dbrog par bgyi ste/ yul 'khor gang dang gang dag na grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags kyi gnas yul 'khor de na/ da ltar dang na
121b4(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus su/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing / thos pa mang po sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa der/ bdag gi 'khor gang dag klu dang / klu mo dang / klu rgan/
121b5(mdo sde): po dang / klu rgan mo dang / klu'i bu dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu'i 'khor dang / klu'i 'khor mo sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba dag dus ma lags
121b6(mdo sde): par rdzi char dang / ser drag dang / char mo che dang / than chen dag gtong bar bgyid dam/ lhags mo che dang / shin tu tsha ba dang / nyi mas gdungs pa dag 'byung bar bgyid dam/ sems can rnams kyi
121b7(mdo sde): lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag chab 'tshal bar bgyid na/ klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas/ de'i lus thams
122a1(mdo sde): cad 'khums par gyur cig/ de dag rdzu 'phrul dang bral nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig/ rims nad kyis gdungs par gyur cig/ longs spyod thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig
122a2(mdo sde): spobs pa med par gyur cig/ don byed mi nus par gyur cig ces mnas bsgag par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ka ra r+Na g+hu me/ kun b+ha ra kre/ bar ma gu Ne/ A ka la kle/ be sha ne/ bi ram gakre/ na bi ri/
122a3(mdo sde): a ta sa le/ na yan tu ma b+he/ kA la ku she/ nang gu pra be/ gan d+ha ra pa se swA hA/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bgyi ba stsa la lags so// de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa
122a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas/ sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o// tad+ya thA/ nA ma b+hi she/ A no kre/ na pa kun dzA b+hi kr-i/ kha ga be'i kha/ sa ra tron Tu/ pA pA ya si le/ na rA ya na gu Ne/ bi ni ste le/ da sha kra maM/
122a5(mdo sde): a kru d+hA nye se/ a na sa be swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po chu lca zhes bya ba nas/ sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o// tad+ya thA/ hi ma be me/ ba li kli Na gu Ne/ ru Na bin du tri nai/ tsa ra kra d+ha re/ me gA sang kra me/ bya bu
122a6(mdo sde): Tuko ga/ / dru mo de/ mA ye tun ku sau/ tsar ma hi ki/ tsa lang g+ha/ nA nA dang te/ ka Ta ka tA le swAhA/ sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po yid bzangs stan las langs te/ bcom ldan
122a7(mdo sde): bdas ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten pa'i klu dang / klu chen po de dag ni sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang /
122b1(mdo sde): drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba dag lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag gis rgyal rigs kyi chos spangs nas/ dmangs rigs//
122b2(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams spyod par bgyid de/ sems can dmyal ba mnar ma mchis pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba lags so// rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag gi skyon gyis klu rnams ma nongs bzhin du grags pa ma lags/
122b3(mdo sde): pas gos par 'gyur lags so// rgyu des na klu rnams las kyi sgrib pa dag par bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la bkur sti bgyi zhing
122b4(mdo sde): gzung bar bgyi ste/ dper bgyi na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des yul gyi bud med bzang mo khrus legs par bgyis te/ spos kyis byugs nas/ gos mchog tu bzang ba bskon te/ yan lag gi
122b5(mdo sde): dam pa mgo la rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i 'phreng ba mang po dag btags shing dpung rgyan dang / ser skud dang / sor gdub dang / lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dag gis brgyan nas/ glang po che'i
122b6(mdo sde): bzhon pa la zhon te/ 'khor phal mo che dang lhan cig khrid pa de bzhin du/ da ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag cag klu rnams dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
122b7(mdo sde): bsdus pa'i lus ma snang ma nyams la/ mchog tu khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa'i dri mas bsgos pa bdag cag klu thams cad rgyags pas myos pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi chus bkrus lags so//
123a1(mdo sde): bdag cag la ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i gos bskon lags so// byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi 'phreng bas bcings lags so// bdag cag gi sems
123a2(mdo sde): dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dag bzod pa dang / gzungs dang / sa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan lags so// theg pa chen po'i shing rta dag gis bteg lags so// gang na sangs
123a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su dag pas bskor nas/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyi gtam dag
123a4(mdo sde): ston pa der bdag cag mchi lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ da ltar bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la bkur sti bgyid cing 'dzin par bgyid lags so// de lta lags pas bdag cag
123a5(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la shin tu gnas par bgyid lags so/ / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gang na// sems
123a6(mdo sde): can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang // theg pa chen po pa dag khyim na gnas pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/
123a7(mdo sde): thos pa mang ba 'am/ thos pa nyung ba 'am/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa 'am/ le lo can nam/ mnyam par gzhag pa 'am/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa 'am/ dran pa dang ldan pa dang / dran panya
123b1(mdo sde): pa rnams bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims dag la dga' zhing / dad pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mo bgyid
123b2(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub rnam gsum gang yang rung ba dag la rab tu zhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa de dang der bdag cag yid kyis dga' zhing dang
123b3(mdo sde): dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / ri mo dag gis gnas par bgyi lags so// yul 'khor de dang / de'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brag der bdag gi 'khor
123b4(mdo sde): klu dang / klu mo dang / klu rgan po dang / klu rgan mo dang / klu'i bu dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu'i 'khor dang / klu'i 'khor mo dag dus ma lags par rdzi char dang / ser drag dang / char mo che dang / than chen dag gtong bar bgyid
123b5(mdo sde): dam/ lhag mi che dang / shin tu tsha ba dag 'byung bar bgyid dam/ sems can namAl lo tog dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman gyi ro dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag chab 'tshal
123b6(mdo sde): bar bgyid na/ klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas/ de dag thams cad kyi lus 'khums par gyur cig/ de dag rdzu 'phrul nyams nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig/ rims nad kyis kun tu gdungs
123b7(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ dbang po thams cad tshang bar ma gyur cig/ longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ las byed mi nus par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ bud d+ha dza ye/
124a1(mdo sde): k+ShutAM/ s+yA ma nis/ b+hU tas li Sh+Te/ an mA d+he/ rlud d+hanas/ ma dun sa ste/ khes gas/ pa~M p+tA/ sa / spyan d+ha pA le/ !n+tu/ d
124a2(mdo sde): er thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams bzhin dang / mig yid du 'ong bas shin tu dgod cing thal mo sbyar nas/ legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad du/ skyes bu dam pa khyod
124a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar bya ba ni legs so legs so zhes smras nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i 'khor de dag shugs drags pos
124a4(mdo sde): 'khrugs shing sngangs la kun tu 'gul zhing mngon par mi dga' ba dang / kun tu 'khor bar gyur to// de'i tshe dri za'i drang srong dga' bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das
124a5(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gang dag
124a6(mdo sde): rgyal rigs gdol pa blun po mkhas so snyam pa'i nga rgyal can/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pas nyams pa/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta ba/ g.yo sgyu can/ snying rje ma mchis pa/ dge slong la mtho 'tsham
124a7(mdo sde): par bgyid pa nas/ tha na bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du skyabs su mchis nas nye bar gnas pa/ skra bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos pa la mtho 'tsham pa dag 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab
124b1(mdo sde): tu byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'bar bar bgyid pa dag la mtho 'tsham pa'i rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis mnas
124b2(mdo sde): bsgag par bgyi ba ni/ longs spyod kyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ rgyal phran gyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ rgyal pos 'khrugs par gyur cig/ nang dmag dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag gis
124b3(mdo sde): 'khrugs par gyur cig/ chu med pas 'khrugs par gyur cig/ nad kyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ gzas 'khrugs par gyur cig/ bya ma rtas 'khrugs par gyur cig/ rtse dgas 'khrugs
124b4(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ pha tshan gyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ 'khor gyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ 'byung ba chen pos 'khrugs par gyur cig/ yi dgas mthu bo ches 'khrugs par gyur cig ces bgyi ba
124b5(mdo sde): nas/ rgyal rigs 'khrugs par gyur cig/ bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / spyang ki dag gis 'khrugs par gyur cig ces bgyi ba'i bar du rgyal
124b6(mdo sde): rigs gdol pa de dag mnas bsgag par bgyi lags so/ / tad+ya thA/ ba ne ya ba na pa le/ ma hA badz+rAn traM/ dru ma tsa te/ ku su ma/ ba ra Te/ yug tre/ sam b+ha kle/ b+hI ma dri ba kre/ sa lo ba nA ya/
124b7(mdo sde): ribA re/ b+hum dru/ kra me/ ne'i ran tan/ dza si la/ men tre'i/ be'i ma ba ta/ ma shA khA dze/ na ye na/ hing ku le/ pi bad tsha/ brI sa/ d+ha na mu tse/ sang ga byi kre/ pa la min d+ha da laM/ b+hu mi paSh+Te/
125a1(mdo sde): ro ma da le/ ba na ga dze/ tU Ta pa Te/ A ba te D+ha/ na ya driSh+Ti/ dzi hA kra ne/ u ta ru kle/ gan d+hA ra b+he/ si mi swA hA/ gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta zhing
125a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la mtho 'tsham pa de dag de ltar gyur cig/ de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i dri za'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
125a3(mdo sde): mtho 'tsham par bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag la/ bdag cag ci dgar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ bdag cag rang rang gi gnas na rtsed mo la chags shing yongs su spyod par bgyid dam/ dga'
125a4(mdo sde): sgyid nyams su myong bar bgyid na/ bdag cag kyang mna'i khongs su gtogs par gyur cig/ de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin no//
125a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang
125a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo chen po bshad par bgyi ste/ rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po'i
125a7(mdo sde): sgo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de'i rna ba'i nad dag rab tu zhi bar bgyid do/ / de'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// gal te na ba
125b1(mdo sde): srabs par 'gyur ro/ / rgya mtsho'i shun pa man dza na la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ rgyal rigs kyi rnga la bskus nas/ rnga de'i sgra gang dang gang gi rnga rna lam du grags pa
125b2(mdo sde): de dang de'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams srabs par 'gyur ro// de dang de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la shin tu dka' zhing bkur sti dang /
125b3(mdo sde): bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rjes su 'brang bas 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pha rol lta ba dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dang mi
125b4(mdo sde): 'bral la/ sems can thams cad kyi mig tu 'ong ba dang / snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ pUrba ma g+ha/ A ma lo ma ti/ krid ti la/ b+hU bai/ pa na khan De'i dur ma khi le'i/ mang sa tU le'aM
125b5(mdo sde): go'u ra sa na d+he'i na kU ba ra me'i/ bud+d+ha rash+mi'i ping ga le'i g+h+ri me/ lo hi ta ra bi/ nang ga la sUr+ye/ b+ha ga ba ri Ne/ a na d+har pa u re/ ka ra hU dze/ ke sha lo hi/ sa ma d+haM/ b+hu d+ha swA hA/ de nas de nyid du
125b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo / / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas
125b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs dang sgra rjod par bgyid pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po de
126a1(mdo sde): bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bdag la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad du gsol/ de na mthu che zhing stobs che la pha rol
126a2(mdo sde): gnon pa snang bar bgyid pa chen po lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi thos pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gter dang / ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gter du 'gyur ba
126a3(mdo sde): lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sdom pa la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / dge sbyong gi sdom pa dang / bsnyen par
126a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa dag gi gdug dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzung chen po 'di lhag mthong gi sbyor bas nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du klog
126a5(mdo sde): na/ phyir zhing nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la rtogs par 'gyur ro// nyin mtshan bdun 'das nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po lan 'bum snyed du yang
126a6(mdo sde): dang yang dran par bgyid pa de ni/ rgyal rigs rnams dang / bram ze'i rigs rnams dang / rje'u rigs rnams dang / dmangs rigs rnams dad par bgyid pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi
126a7(mdo sde): bar du shin tu mngon par dad par bgyid pa lags so/ / thams cad longs spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po mchog dang mi 'bral zhing / mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ba lags so// /
126b1(mdo sde): de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur lags so// tad+ya thA/ tri Na sang nyi ke/ bi tri Na bi ma be/ ka ra prA kle/ b+hU ta sU me tsa/ pa ra dzi me/ a b+hak+ka/
126b2(mdo sde): akrA ya lo be/ ad+h+yad ma/ ni mi re/ shrI ta bi sta ra/ ang gu dza d+had nye/ dza dza ra no se'i a na sa shud d+he/ mr-i ga g+h+r-i kre/ ku la ba te/ ma ga bA bA/ kre b+ho 'u ba s+phA re/ a b+hI ti me b+hu re/ sU ra kha dze/
126b3(mdo sde): smr-i ti mo na swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bya
126b4(mdo sde): ba'i gzungs chen po 'di bshad pas/ sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi thos pa'i mig kun tu ston par byed la/ nga'i bstan pa'ang ston par byed pa ni leg so legs so// de nas de nyid du thams cad
126b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad du/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon
126b6(mdo sde): lam zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rdzogs par bshad pas/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi thos pa mang po'i tshogs
126b7(mdo sde): rgyas par byed pa dang / rton pa ni skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba gtud nas
127a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gling bzhi pa 'di'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / shing dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / lo tog dag
127a2(mdo sde): bsrung bar 'tshal lo/ / sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dang / rtswa dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma sa la rten pa rnams bsrung bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das nang gu dpal rdul
127a3(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po de da ltar 'dir gling bzhi pa de dag gis sngon ma thos ma mthong bas 'di ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar gyur te/ 'dus pa chen po de lta bu dag byung bar bgyis lags so//
127a4(mdo sde): nang gu dpal rdul zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di ni mthu che bas lo tog thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa lags so// sa bon dang / myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras
127a5(mdo sde): bu dang / shing dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro rnams skyed par bgyid pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / snum mchis par bgyid pa dang / 'jam par bgyid pa dang / mang por bgyid pa lags so// /
127a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad dad par bgyid pa dang / tshul khrims can du bgyid pa dang / thos par bgyid pa dang / shes par bgyid pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje can du bgyid pa dang / thabs dang ldan
127a7(mdo sde): par bgyid pa nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du ston par bgyid pa lags so// tad+ya thA/ a na n+ya b+hu mi/ gA bA k+ka b+ha~M dze/ gu lo tsa lo me/ phaT kA lo me/ shri yA kra/ ku su me/
127b1(mdo sde): nab ku mun De/ rA dza bar me/ tsA Ta na ba/ ba ma Te/ biSh+Ta lang ge/ a ba b+ha su ne/ hA sa ga b+ha kre/ lo ma b+hu dza kre/ gam b+hai ra/ ba su me/ a no ma ya/ sa re/ pA lA sha two ye swAhA/ btsun+da pa
127b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nang gu dpal rdul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te sgreng bar bgyid dam/ skad chen por klog gam/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di chu la len stong gi bar
127b3(mdo sde): du bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zhing dang / shing dang / lo tog sna tshogs la gtor tam/ rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / dung dag la bsngags nas/ de dag gi sgra gang du thos pa'i lo ma dang / me tog dang
127b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman gyi ro dang / sa la rten pa'i lo tog thams cad sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu las ma gtogs par/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / yi
127b5(mdo sde): dgas mthu bo che dang / bdud dang / bdud kyi bu dang / bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshogs gang gis kyang gnod par bgyi ba 'am/ chung gsan pa 'am/ tshig par bgyi ba 'am/ bskam pa 'am/ mdangs
127b6(mdo sde): 'phrog pa 'am/ mthu chung bar bgyi ba 'am/ ma mchis par bgyi ba dag tu rngo mi thogs na/ sems can dang / sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas
127b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod gling bzhi pa 'dir sbyin pa chen po'i dpal gyi shing rta la zhon nas/ rigs kyi bu 'dir bla
128a1(mdo sde): na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam du sems can dpag tu med pa rnams rton par byed pa ni/ rigs kyi bu khyod legs so legs so// de nas de nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i
128a2(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bya ba ni legs so legs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
128a3(mdo sde): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa khyod la bdag gis dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po sbyin
128a4(mdo sde): gyis/ gzungs chen po des na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byams pa chen po'i go bgos nas/ 'dir sems can rnams la tshig gis chos ston na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs bskyed
128a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos de dag sems can gang dag gis thos pa'i sdig pa'i sems dang / sdig pa'i lta ba dag spong bar byed do// sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dag spong bar byed do//
128a6(mdo sde): sems kyis byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yid la byed par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba can du 'gyur ro//
128a7(mdo sde): sems mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag las ldog par 'gyur ro// sems dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rnam par gnas par 'gyur ro// sems sems can thams cad la mngon par dga'
128b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / gzungs chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi char 'bebs par byed pa'o// dgra bcom pa thams cad rab tu dad
128b2(mdo sde): par byed cing / bshes gnyen thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o// tad+ya thA/ laMb ta swa re/ kA shA ya/ bar me/ sa me brag g+he/ dA rang ga dza le/ su tro kle/ sum hA s+yA kle re/ su ha bung
128b3(mdo sde): gre/ go'u a ba lo ka da le/ sid+d+he b+hi ba kre/ D+hA nan pi ba re/ a ba ni d+ha lung be/ so tsa ra tsa la/ a ba b+ha sa re/ ba rA ha/ shad tre e ka hA da tai ye/ sa mA d+hi kar Ne/ bA la dza bi ti/ mahA dA pU taH/
128b4(mdo sde): se.a ra Na ni le/ mA lA ma sha me ni la ku su me swA hA/ dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis byams pa chen po'i go bgos
128b5(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams la chos ston na/ de'i sgra tha na sems can srog chags su gyur pa phra mo chung ngu gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag gi sems kyi rnyog pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang / de dag gi sems
128b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas par 'gyur na/ mir gyur pa rnams la lta ci smos kyang ci dgos/ sems can la la dag gis char dbab pa'i phyir/ dri za dang klu'i gnas dag tu gzungs chen po 'di bzlas
128b7(mdo sde): brjod byas te/ na le sham gyi phye ma dang / e ran da'i mar du bsres pa la nges lan stong du bsngags nas/ gos kyi mtha' mar phur ma byas te khron par bcug na/ des na de la klu rnams dga'
129a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ char gyi rgyun chen po'ang 'bebs par byed do// de'i tshe yul der 'dus pa'i klu dang / klu chen po rnams kyis dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po
129a2(mdo sde): 'di thos nas/ sems rangs pa dang / sdang sems med pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems byams pa dang ldan pa dang / sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar gnas par gyur to// sems
129a3(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum la dad cing / bkur sti dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dag thob par gyur to// sems dud 'gror skye ba'i rang gi sdig pa'i las dag rab tu 'chags pa dang / sems
129a4(mdo sde): theg pa chen po bla na med pa la 'jug par gnas par gyur to/ / klu dang / klu chen po de dag thams cad kyi nang nas mthu ci yod pa dang / ci nus pa dag gis/ de na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/
129a5(mdo sde): kha cig ni gser mang po'i char mngon par 'bebs so// kha cig ni dngul dang / a ka ru dang / rgya spos dang / gor shir sha dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i char dag mngon
129a6(mdo sde): par 'bebs pa nas/ kha cig ni ut+pa la dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi dol shal
129a7(mdo sde): gyi bar dag gi char mngon par 'bebs so/ / de nas klu dang / klu chen po de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol te/
129b1(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar bdag cag ni dkon mchog gsum la sems shin tu legs par rab tu zhugs pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag 'di rnams kyis dam
129b2(mdo sde): bca' bar bgyi ba ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs gang dang gang dag na/ dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rab tu sgrogs pa
129b3(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du gzungs lhag ma chu khyim snying po zhes bgyi ba dang / mtshon cha'i stobs zhes bgyi ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba dang / nang gu dpal rdul zhes bgyi ba
129b4(mdo sde): dang / dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis bshad pa'i gzungs de dag dang / klu'i snying po bzhi po dag/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grol rdal dang /
129b5(mdo sde): ljongs dang / ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gang dag tu re re tsam yang ston tam/ 'chad dam/ rab tu sgrogs pas/ dran par bgyid pa de dang de dag tu bdag cag gis dus dus su char dbab pa dang /
129b6(mdo sde): gdugs dang bser ma dag gtang bar bgyi/ dus ma lags par ni ma lags so// de dang der bdag cag gis phyir dgra dang / nang 'khrug dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / gnod sems dang / nad
129b7(mdo sde): dang / mings dang / mu ge dag rab tu zhi bar bgyi lags so// de dang der bdag cag gis skyid pa dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bsgrub par bgyi lags so// de dang der sems
130a1(mdo sde): can rnams kyi sa bon dang / myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / shing dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dag mi nyams par 'phel
130a2(mdo sde): bapabar bgyi lags so/ / longs spyod dang / yongs su smod pa phal che zhing / dri zhim pa dang / ro zhim pa dang / skam pa dang / 'jam pa dag tu bsgrub par bgyi lags so// bdag cag gis 'dzam bu
130a3(mdo sde): gling 'di'i rgyal po rnams kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / kho na ma mchis pa'i sems dang / rtsod pa ma mchis pa'i sems su bsgrub par bgyi lags so// de bzhin du
130a4(mdo sde): bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gnod sbyin rnams nas/ dge bsnyen dag gi bar dag tu byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bsgrub par bgyi lags so// gang na gzung
130a5(mdo sde): chen po 'di rab tu sgrogs pa der ni phan tshun sems 'thun par bsgrub par bgyi lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad la legs so legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // thams
130a6(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ / de na byang chub sems dpa' ri'i snying pos kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
130a7(mdo sde): dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal cho ga shes khyod la snying brtse ba'i grogs 'di dag yod na/ 'dir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ da dung du ci'i phyir gdul
130b1(mdo sde): ba'i tshogs rnams gzhug par mi nus/ dpal lha mo chen mos gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan
130b2(mdo sde): pa'i tha chad du de lta bur skye ba len cing / grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'thun pa de lta bu dag dang phrad pa thob lags so// da ltar bdag kyang grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'thun pa khyod lta bu dang phrad pa
130b3(mdo sde): lags so/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang de'i lag tu thob ste/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang brjod par bgyi lags so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes
130b4(mdo sde): gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu gnas par blta bar bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal mo/
130b5(mdo sde): gshes khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de ltar yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
130b6(mdo sde): snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa thams cad du de lta bur skye ba len la/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag la brtson zhing / der brtson pa brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// grogs dge
130b7(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bus yongs su zin pa yin no/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de'i lag tu thob pa yin te/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par yang brjod par
131a1(mdo sde): bya'o/ / des rnam par gnon pa'ang brjod par bya'o// mngal gyi skyon las thar par yang brjod par bya'o// mi slob pa'i sa la gnas pas zag pa zad par yang brjod par
131a2(mdo sde): bya'o/ / de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis dgongs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs par yang brjod par bya'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la shin tu gnas par yang brjod par bya'o//
131a3(mdo sde): de nas brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten
131a4(mdo sde): 'dir klu dang / klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par bgyid lags/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rgyu dang rkyen gnyis kyis 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten
131a5(mdo sde): 'dir klu dang / klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par byed do// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi dbang dang / khro ba'i dbang gis dus ma yin
131a6(mdo sde): pa'i sprin dag 'byung bar byed cing / rdzi char dang ser drag dag 'bebs par byed do// lhags pa dang tsha ba dag 'byung bar byed do// des na 'dir sems can rnams sa bon dang / myu gu dang / 'dab
131a7(mdo sde): ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dag tshig par byed do// skems par byed do// 'brul bar byed do// ma rung bar byed do// des na sems can rnams longs
131b1(mdo sde): spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dang mi ldan pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdig pa'i las mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kun tu spyod par byed do// las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa des na sngon
131b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad kyang sreg par byed do/ / skems par byed do// thal bar rlog par byed do// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag spong zhing / ngan song gsum po dag la gzhol bar byed do//
131b3(mdo sde): kha cig gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba tsam gyi phyir tshe gcig gis de lta bur sdig pa'i las mtshams med pa dag gi bar du kun tu spyod par byed de/ de dag bskal pa mang po zhig gi bar du phyir mir skye ba
131b4(mdo sde): thob par mi 'gyur ro/ / gal te de dag yun ring po 'das nas brgya la brgya lam na mi'i lus thob na'ang kha cig ni yan lag nyams par 'gyur ro// kha cig ni dran pa nyams par 'gyur ro// gdol pa'i
131b5(mdo sde): rigs su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro/ / g.yung po'i rigs dang / smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs dang / bkren pa dbul po'i rigs rnams su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro// bza' ba dang / btung ba'i longs spyod dang
131b6(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pa dag dang yang bral bar 'gyur la/ yang rgyu des na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral nas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa dag kun tu spyod par byed do// yang kha
131b7(mdo sde): cig ngan song gsum po dang / mnar med pa dag tu'ang gzhol bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'khor bar yun ring du nyam thag par
132a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / ngan song gsum po dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sna tshogs dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ sdug bsngal gang cung zad ci byung ba thams cad ni zas
132a2(mdo sde): kyi rkyen las gyur pa lags te/ zas ma mchis na sdug bsngal 'byung ba'ang ma mchis lags so// de nas de'i tshe brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med pas tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces gsol to// sred
132a3(mdo sde): pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na/ / ngu ba dang ni dgod par bgyid// nye bar gnas shing lhung bar bgyid// kun tu spyod cing rnam par rgyug/ sa gzhi dag la til brdungs ltar// sdug bsngal 'khrul
132a4(mdo sde): 'khor gnod par bgyid/ / lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad la// de ltar sred pas gnod par bgyid// kye ma sred pa'i zhags pa yi// srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar gtugs pas// de ltar zhags
132a5(mdo sde): 'di rgya che ba/ / kha zas dag gi rgyu las byung // so so'i skye bo rgyu gnyis kyis// sred pa'i rdul gyis yan lag bcings// ri dgas zhags pas bcings pa ltar// 'bros pa dag tu nus ma
132a6(mdo sde): lags/ / lhar bcas 'jig rten sems can dag/ sred pas gar bgyid rtsol ba ltar// gar zhung dag la gar mkhan rgyas// de ni gar bgyid rtsol mi nus// sred pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na//
132a7(mdo sde): ji ltar skye bo myos pa ltar// btung ba myos bgyid bslad pa yis// myos pa dag du mi bgyid do// srid pa'i gnod sbyin gdon dag gis// skye bo brlams nas 'khyal pa ltar// 'byung po'i gdon
132b1(mdo sde): gyis smos pa dag/ 'khyal pa dag tu mi bgyid do// nor 'dzin de dag 'dzin pa btang // srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par spangs// gang gis sred pa bskams nas kyang // de dag 'khor bar mi
132b2(mdo sde): gnas so/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// zhe sdang khro bas skye dgu brlams// sems kyang g.yengs 'gyur de yis na// dge ba thams
132b3(mdo sde): cad mi 'tshal zhing / / bzod brlag las la spyod par bgyid// mi dge ba la gnas bgyid pa// pha ma dag la rim gro chung // gang dag mtshams ma mchis bgyis pa// dkon mchog gsum la brnyas
132b4(mdo sde): par bgyid/ / snying brtse snying rje ma mchis pa// 'jigs bgyid gtum po drag shul can// khro sems dbang gis de dag ni// sems dmyal mnar ma mchis par gnas// sems can 'di dag
132b5(mdo sde): khro ba'i rgyus/ / gcig la gcig ni za bar bgyid// yang dang yang ni ngan song du// sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir// sdig pa'i sems kyis bring gyur cing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen spangs nas
132b6(mdo sde): kyang / / srid pa'i mtshor ni ltung ba ste/ mun pa mun nag gzhol ba po// de 'dra'i sems can don slad du// byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i// bsam pas bdag bde btang nas kyang //
132b7(mdo sde): sems can sdig pa bsal slad du// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos gsum gyis// sdig pa'i sems can grol bgyid cing // chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar bgyid//
133a1(mdo sde): sems can 'ga' yi don slad du// lus dang srog dag btang nas kyang // dka' thub brtul zhugs spyod ldan pa// dka' ba dag ni mang du spyad// gang tshe sems can
133a2(mdo sde): 'ga' slad du/ / bskal brgyar sdug bsngal sel bgyid na// dka' thub brtul zhugs bzod par bgyi// sems can yongs su smin slad gnas// de 'dra'i bsam dang ldan pa yis// sems
133a3(mdo sde): can sred pa'i bsam pa can/ / sems ni byang chub sngo bgyid skul// de nas dpal lha mo chen mos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bre bo lo tog
133a4(mdo sde): gis bkang ba de phul nas smras pa/ gling bzhi pa 'di'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag gis rgyur sa bon dang / lo tog thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / grub par
133a5(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa khyod la lhung bzed dbul lo/ / des na dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par chad pa/ ma rungs pa/ gtum po/ drag shul can kun sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral
133a6(mdo sde): ba dang / byang chub kyi sa bon la bzhag par rngo thog go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bre bo lo tog gis bkang ba de blangs
133a7(mdo sde): nas phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol/ gang gis
133b1(mdo sde): gling 'dir sa bon dang / myu gu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dang / sa'i bcud dang / gzi byin dang / sems can gyi gzi byin dang / dam pa'i
133b2(mdo sde): chos kyi ro dang / snying ku dang / gzi byin dag mi nyams shing 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad par bgyid pa dang / gang gi de yongs
133b3(mdo sde): spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa las zlog par bgyid pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la dgod par rngo thogs pa dang / gang gis
133b4(mdo sde): 'dor sems can de dag thams cad kyis ngan song rnams yongs su spangs nas/ mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis dpal lha mo chen mo de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de
133b5(mdo sde): ltar phyogs bcu na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa thams cad 'dir dgongs su gsol/ tad+ya thA/ mu ni shi ba/ mu nin tre/ mu ni pa la/ mu ni sa lo// san
133b6(mdo sde): ta u sa kri ti/ krA nu pra NA nI la/ ba ya ba sar+b+ba bi dza ba/ ste la le swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang nas/ dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
133b7(mdo sde): dpal cho ga shes khyod kyis gling bzhi pa 'di sa bon dang / myu gu dang / lo tog 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ khyod ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor chos
134a1(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa ma lus pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin ko'u shi kas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
134a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces
134a3(mdo sde): bya'o/ / ri'i snying pos zhus pa zhes bya'o// gzungs kyi za ma tog ces bya'o// sa'i bcud 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor sems can yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya'o// /
134a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dpal lha mo chen mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis
134a5(mdo sde): gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ / 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
134a6(mdo sde): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyi bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa/ bya ba'i rgyud du gtog so//
134a7(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na/ satwa A lo kan/ bud+d+ha kle tra san dang shan byA ha nA ma ma hA mA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
134b1(mdo sde): kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyug
134b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ lha'i nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po dang / me tog
134b3(mdo sde): rgyas pa dang / lha'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ sems kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha
134b4(mdo sde): stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang snying rje chen po shes pa la gnas pa/ thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gos thogs pa dang / skye ba gnyis dang / skye ba gsum dang / skye ba bcu dang
134b5(mdo sde): skye ba nyi shu dang / skye ba sum cu dang / skye ba brgya'i bar dag gis thogs pa/ thams cad kyang sa brgyad pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas pa sha stag ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
134b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal dang / dri med tog dang / nor dpal dang / glog gi tog dang / dri med 'od dang / tsan dan dang / bdud rtsi'i tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun brgya dang /
134b7(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang lung bstan pa dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
135a1(mdo sde): dri za thams cad kyang sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul mthong ba brgyad stong dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad kyang byang chub
135a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ye shes thob pa/ lung bstan pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dung can ma la sogs pa
135a3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / gang pa bzang
135a4(mdo sde): po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi bar dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs par rig nas/ rang rang
135a5(mdo sde): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i rgyan dang / na bza' dang / me tog dang / me tog 'phreng dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas/ ri mor byas
135a6(mdo sde): so/ / kha cig gis ni lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te bstod do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sems cad thams cad la dmigs pa/ snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i
135a7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od kyis snang bar gyur cing / gzugs thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par
135b1(mdo sde): gyur nas/ sems can dmus long gang yin pa de dag gis ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur to// 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas sgra dag thos par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad
135b2(mdo sde): dag dang bral bar gyur to/ / gos med pa rnams ni gos dag thob par gyur to// smyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to// lus nyams pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni lus dang dbang po yongs su
135b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par gyur to/ / dbul po rnams kyis ni nor dag thob par gyur to// sems can gang dag nor dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod med pa de dag ni/ nor dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod dag dang ldan
135b4(mdo sde): par gyur to/ / sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
135b5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag thams cad la'ang bskul nas/ thams cad chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ sems can gang dag lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyis
135b6(mdo sde): ni lha'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis
135b7(mdo sde): kyang mi'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za rnams
136a1(mdo sde): kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa so sor thob nas/ sems can tham cad la byams par gnas pa dang / lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ chos
136a2(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ / sems can gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su mun pa mun nag gi nang du skyes pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus yud tsam zhig/
136a3(mdo sde): dran pa so sor thob nas/ gcig gis gcig kun tu shes par gyur te/ de dag mun pa chen po de nas yongasu thar par gyur to// sems can thams cad gcig la gcig gis byams par gnas shing nye
136a4(mdo sde): ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te// mtho ba dang dma' bar yang gyur to// de nas 'khor 'dus pa der 'jam dpal gzhon
136a5(mdo sde): nur gyur pa 'dus te 'dug par gyur nas/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
136a6(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po kun tu snang zhing / 'dus pa chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang la/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag lung ston pa'ang kun tu snang zhing chos kyi 'brel
136a7(mdo sde): ba'i gtam chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang ba las na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / ye shes chen po'ang tho
136b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir//
136b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus shig/ rigs kyi phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ sems can sdig pa byed pa/ dbul ba/ nyam chung ba/ lus mdog ngan pa/ rga ba dang na bas yongs su gzir ba/
136b3(mdo sde): longs spyod chung ba/ lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa/ tshe thung ba/ blo rung ba/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gzir ba dag 'byung ba de/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi don du chos
136b4(mdo sde): bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig dang / rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis yun ring por sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / nad thams cad
136b5(mdo sde): rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sdig thams cad bzlog par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las
136b6(mdo sde): 'da' ba'i bar dag byas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye
136b7(mdo sde): ba phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag yid la byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
137a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus srad ma'i tshe na/ sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan gyis non par gyur pa/

137b1(mdo sde): ma rtogs pa dang / mi gzigs pa dang / ma gsan pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci'ang mi mnga' bas/ chos kyi 'brel ba'i gtam nyan par 'tshal ba dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa
137b2(mdo sde): dang / shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /

138a1(mdo sde): ngas sngon dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snang ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar de thos so// rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de'i
138a2(mdo sde): ming thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba phrag dgu bcus de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par gyur nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan te/ ngas kyang
138a3(mdo sde): lung bstan pa thob bo/ / rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mkhyen pas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris sems can thams cad kyi don du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad de/ thams cad
138a4(mdo sde): du yang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod nyid dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
138a5(mdo sde): po'i 'khor rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa 'di dag gis kyang thos nas/ ri mo dang mchod pa dag byas te/ de'i 'og tu
138a6(mdo sde): sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lung bstan pa thob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang thob par gyur nas/ 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang / re ba thams cad grub
138a7(mdo sde): pa dang / nad thams cad dang bral bar yang gyur la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa dang / gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / nor
138b1(mdo sde): dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba rnams 'byor pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os
138b2(mdo sde): pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa dang / tshe dang / kha dog dang /
138b3(mdo sde): gzi brjid dang / mthu stobs dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ nam yang sdug pa dang bral bar ma gyur cing / sdug pa'i sdug bsngal med par gyur pa de dran te/ rigs kyi
138b4(mdo sde): bu de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos smra ba de la mchog tu gus pa'i sems bskyed de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yan lag lngas phyag byas shing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang /
138b5(mdo sde): spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis legs par brgyan nas/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed
138b6(mdo sde): pa dang / legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag ni yon tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang yon
138b7(mdo sde): tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la/ blta na sdug pa dang / nad rnams dang bral ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / blo brtan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang
139a1(mdo sde): brtan pa dang ldan pa dang / rgyal po thams cad dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo thams cad dang / rgyal bu thams cad dang / blon po thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dang /
139a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang / phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os par yang 'gyur ro// nor dang yo byad mang por yang 'gyur ro// de dag gi kha
139a3(mdo sde): nas tsan dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro/ / mig ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro// de dag gis nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang
139a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa byas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad zad par yang 'gyur ro// de dag la lha rnams srung bar yang 'gyur ro// de dag 'chi ba'i dus na sangs rgyas dang / byang
139a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/ / phrag dog med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
139a6(mdo sde): can du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas te/ yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod par
139a7(mdo sde): byed pa dang / 'ang ba dang / ming tsam thos par gyur pa de dag ni ngas mngon sum du lung bstan pas lung bstan pa yin te/ de dag gis mthong shing bsnyen dbakur byas mor byas// mchod par byas pa'ang yin
139b1(mdo sde): pas/ de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tsom bskyed par mi bya'o// gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' yin par yid la byas la/ bsnyen bkur bya'o//
139b2(mdo sde): de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs mi mdzes pa dang / longs spyod med pa dang / blo med pa dang / sred pa che ba dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / rgyal srid 'khrugs par gyur pa gang
139b3(mdo sde): yin pa de dag dang / klad pa na ba gang yin pa dang / zan chad pa gang yin pa dang / gos ngan par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / lus dang sems la gnod pa gang yin pa dang / reg na mi bde ba'i mal
139b4(mdo sde): bcas pa gang yin pa dang / spyo ba gang yin pa'i las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang / ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa'i mthus yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// des kyang 'di ltar sems bskyed par
139b5(mdo sde): bya ste/ bdag gis sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams la sdig pa mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pa de dag so sor bshags par bya'o// bsal bar bya'o// mi bcab par
139b6(mdo sde): bya'o/ / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ rig kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i longs spyod kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba'i
139b7(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / pha ma dag la sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag
140a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing / dbang phyug chen po dag kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ri'i sems can dmyal/
140a2(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / dmus long du 'gyur ba dang / bud med kyi dngos por 'gyur ba dang / mtshan gnyis par 'gyur ba dang / phrag
140a3(mdo sde): dog dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba'i dbang gis gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu//
140a4(mdo sde): de ltar na ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs bu mo de dag la srung ba
140a5(mdo sde): dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed pa dang / de dag thams cad kyi yon tan dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / bde ba chen po byed/

140a7(mdo sde): nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar byed pa dang / tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu che bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin dang
140b1(mdo sde): 'byung po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / me dang / chu thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / lung bstan pa'i bar dag thob par/
140b2(mdo sde): byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag yod de/ de dag mnyan cing bzung ste/ bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /

140b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / ras bcos bu zung dag gsol te/ legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/

140b6(mdo sde): bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha ma te/ lo ke bi lo ke lo ka/ a ti kran te/ satwa a ba lo ka ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta i d+hISh+Ti te/ sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ne/ d+yu tin d+ha re nar de ba pU dzi ni/ ta thA ga tad ny+dzi nad de/ ta thA ga ta
140b7(mdo sde): a d+hiSh+Te ne na/ sarba lo kam su khI b+ha ba tu/ pUrba karma k+Sha pa ya tu ra kra b+ha ba tu sarba ye b+h+yasta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te na swA hA/ kye rigs kyi bu dag gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa
141a1(mdo sde): sum khris gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ / ngas kyang da ltar sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang /

141a3(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur snyam du sems pa des/ nang par sngar langs te/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang / snying rje ba'i sems dang /

141b5(mdo sde): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de slan chad bdag gis mngon par 'tshal te/ gang gi rna lam du gzungs de zag par gyur tam/ glo bar chud par gyur pa de'i lus la nyam chung ba 'am/ nyon mongs
141b6(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs sam/ bro nad dam/ rims sam/ lus bro 'tshal ba 'am/ sems gdung ba 'am/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa 'am/ chab kyis 'jigs pa 'am/ mtshon gyis 'jigs

142a1(mdo sde): pa dag gis mtho ba tsam pa 'am/ rnam par gtse ba 'am/ gnod par bgyid par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
142a2(mdo sde): la rjes su gnang ba stsol cig dang / bdag gi chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa de dag gi don du nyan pa rnams dang / ri mor bgyid pa rnams dang / mchod par bgyid pa rnams dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa

142a4(mdo sde): a ri hA tAn tad t+ya thA oM/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ badz+ra kA ya/ badz+ra bA la/ badz+ra te dza/ hUM hUM/ badz+ra pA ni ta thA ga ta ad nyi ma pa lA ya/ sma ra pra tid ny+tsA ma/ sarba byA d+hin sarba pA pA ni nA sha ya/ di hi me/ ya the
142a5(mdo sde): ba si tam pa ram/ ya na ya me ba ha b+hi prA yan mA tsa mi/ tan ta me ba sa mrid d+h+ya tra/ he haM/ tu ru tu ru/ sA gad tsa A gad tsa mA bi lam pa/ da ri sha ya badz+ra kA yam/ da ri sha ya badz+ra kA ya ma/ bud+d+ha sa d+hiSh+Ti/

142b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'am/ nor dang / 'bru dang / longs spyod kyi/

142b4(mdo sde): 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa bgyis la/ gtsang mas bdug spos kyis bdug cing / gdugs mtshan gcig tu bsnyung ba bgyis la/ de nas tshes brgyad nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du/ de bzhin
142b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ bum pa gang ba bzhi yang gzhag par bgyi// phyogs bzhir yang ro dang ldan pa dang / dri dang ldan pa

142b7(mdo sde): chen po rtso zhing / de shi ga shegs pa pa yang mad pa cas te/ de ban gshegs pas bya bgyis nas/ snga ma'i 'i la chu brgyad la thas parjod tu rgya chun zas shing /
143a1(mdo sde): nas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bgyi'o// de nas sgra skad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dogs g.yo ba dang / 'od zer kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de nas dam pa ci 'tshal
143a2(mdo sde): ba'ang stsal bar bgyi'o/ / bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis las thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// glo nad ma mchis pa dang / tshe ring ba dang /

143a6(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ ting nge 'dzin 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes

143b2(mdo sde): su skyes pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba lhag par g.yo ba dang / bral bar g.yo ba dag rab tu shes shing / sems can 'di dag ni
143b3(mdo sde): bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ste/ legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la dad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba

143b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par byed pa dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / ser sna dag sel bar byed pa dang /
143b6(mdo sde): sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la dad pa rab tu thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye zhing / nam du'ang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur la/
143b7(mdo sde): yid mi bde bar 'gyur bas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun
144a1(mdo sde): ston pa zhes bya ste/ 'di thos pa'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog par nges pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ rigs kyi bu dang
144a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo de dag lung bstan par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang dka' ba lags/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta smos kyang mi 'tshal lags na/

144a4(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
144a5(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa dang / mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / lus dang / sdug pa'i bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / bran dang /
