144b4(mdo sde): pa dang / yang dag par ston par byed pa dang / nyan par byed na/ de nas mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du yongs su sdud par 'gyur te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par
144b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger
144b6(mdo sde): 'drir 'jug pa'i bsod nams ni de ltar dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ / rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bro gar la mngon par dga'
144b7(mdo sde): ba dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dang / 'dod pa dang / khro ba dang / sems mang ba dang / mi bde ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / mtshon cha dang / spyo ba dang / sdigs pa dang /
145a1(mdo sde): rdeg pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par mi 'gyur ba de dag dang / sdig pa'i las kyi gzhi de dang / mi shes pa des mi dge ba'i//
145a2(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing / rga ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / 'chi bas yongs su zin pas 'chi ba'i tshe na/ yongs su gdung bar gyur te/ dmigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang
145a3(mdo sde): 'dra bar mthong zhing / dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang mi 'gyur la/ dad pa mi phyed pa thob par mi 'gyur te/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na
145a4(mdo sde): lung bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang / lung bstan pa thob pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba
145a5(mdo sde): dang / gzung ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir gzhug pa dang / dad par yang mi nus la/ chos smra ba de'ang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod
145a6(mdo sde): par bya bar yang mi nus so/ / rigs kyi bu gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i yul der ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar
145a7(mdo sde): lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos smra ba de dang
145b1(mdo sde): chos nyan pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas bsnyen bkur bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi zhing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi lags so//
145b2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang rgyas par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi ste/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par yang 'gyur lags so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ji ltar lhag
145b3(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor rnams la rnam par gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// khyed cag gis de bzhin du gyis shig/ gnod pa byed pa dang / brnyas pa dang / gshe ba dang /
145b4(mdo sde): sdigs pa dang / mtshon 'byin pa dang / rgyal bar byed na yang lus dang / srog la mi lta bar byas la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par bya/ yi ger bri bar bya/ yi ger 'drir gzhug par bya/ bklag
145b5(mdo sde): par bya'o/ / chos smra ba de la'ang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro bya'o// yul phyogs de dang / gling de dang / grong khyer de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'gego ba'i nad dang /
145b6(mdo sde): 'khrug pa dag las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la'ang rtag par rgyun du bsam par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
145b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ / bskal pa grangs med stong phrag bye snyed du// sangs rgyas 'byung ba lan 'ba' rnyed pa la// phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar// rigs kyi bu rnams bag yod chos
146a1(mdo sde): nyon cig/ yon tan nyan cing mngon par dang byed pa// de dag gis ni ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'// gang gis rkang gnyis gtso bo rnams la ni// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed/
146a2(mdo sde): du/ nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan// spos dang 'phreng ba byug pa phul ba bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di la dad byas te// nyan cing klog la yi ger 'dri byed pa// de la bsod nams
146a3(mdo sde): tshad ni yod min te/ bde bar gshegs pas de snyed tshad ma gsungs// rtag tu bag yod dgon par sten byed cing // sems gzhan med par bsam gtan rtag sgom dang // sdug pa'i bu dang bu mo
146a4(mdo sde): sbyin byed cing / / mgo dang lag pa yongs su gtong ba bas// gang su mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa// de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob// mdo mchog 'di ni nor byin byed pa ste// de yi ngan song
146a5(mdo sde): kun kyang rtag tu spangs/ / 'di ni nor dang 'bru sbyin byed pa ste// gang zhig mdo sde rnam dag 'di 'dzin pa// de la yon tan kun kyang mi dkon zhing // de la tshe stobs brtson 'grus mod pa yin// 'dren
146a6(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong zhing / / ngas de sangs rgyas byang chub lung yang bstan// de la nam yang sdig pa yod min zhing // bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams kyang mthong // de la rtag tu
146a7(mdo sde): las gang 'byung 'gyur ba/ / sems gdung lus na ba 'am de bzhin du// glad pa na bas thams cad zad 'gyur zhing // de ni nams kyang rnam par lhung mi 'gyur// des ni mthong ba'i chos la'ang yon
146b1(mdo sde): tan kun/ / ji ltar bsams shing 'dod pas 'thob par 'gyur// de ltar rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang // dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos rtag tu ni// mi yi dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ltar/
146b2(mdo sde): / chos smra ba la rjes su gus byas te// mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing // 'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya// spos dang 'phreng ba byug pa rnams dag gis// bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger
146b3(mdo sde): 'drir yang gzhug/ phyi ma'i dus la rga nas gdung 'gyur la// 'khrug pa stong phrag du mas g.yen spro zhing // sems dmyal yi dgas rnams su yongs 'khyam dang // za ma ma ning smad par bya ba dang //
146b4(mdo sde): dmus long nyid dang ro dang khyi yi dri// rigs dma' bud med rnams su skye ma byed// phrag dog tsho zhing rtag tu sdig byed la// khro bas zi non rtag tu ser sna can// sangs rgyas chos la gus par
146b5(mdo sde): ma byas pas/ / de ni de 'dra'i rigs kyi bu 'gyur la// der yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing // de ni phyi ma'i dus na gdung bar 'gyur// de phyir gang dag 'dzin cing ston byed pa// de dag
146b6(mdo sde): gis ni rtag tu mchod par byas/ / gang gis de la yongs su spro ba dang // sprad cing brdegs la bcing ba byas gyur pa// des ni nga yang yongs su spyos pa yin// 'dzin la phu dud byas na nga la'ang byas//
146b7(mdo sde): de phyir de dag gis ni chos smra dang // gang zhig 'di 'dzin 'dri zhing klog byed pa// de dag la ni rtag tu bsnyen bkur zhing // tshig 'jam snyan pa'ang rgyun du brjod par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
147a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan/
147a2(mdo sde): 'das bdag gis rnam par lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis par rjes su dran te/ bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ye shes tog ces bgyi ba'i spyan sngar de thos shing
147a3(mdo sde): bzung lags so/ / de mnyan cing bzung la/ bcangs shing klags te/ gzhan dag la'ang bsgrags shing bsnyen bkur bgyi nas/ yi ger bris sam/ yi ger 'drir skul na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i
147a4(mdo sde): sa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur/ des ji ltar bsams pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ de'i
147a5(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur/ bro nad rnams dang bral bar yang 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong
147a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so//
147a7(mdo sde): legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zin gyis shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
147b1(mdo sde): phyug gis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/ gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag smras so// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ sarba A shwa pA ri pU ra kA nAn/ na maHAr+ya ba/
147b2(mdo sde): laM ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha/ ma ma ma/ d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi ri/ shAn te pra shAn te/ sarba pA pa kra yang ka ri/ a ba lo kA ya/ kA ru ni ka/
147b3(mdo sde): bo d+hi tsid ta ma ma na si ku ru/ bya ba lo kA ye/ mA ma/ smA ra sma ra/ yan tA yA pArbe/ sad t+ya a d+hi sh+tsA nang kri nan/ te na sad t+ye sad t+ye/ ba tsa ne na/ sarba A shA me pa ri pU rA ya/ bud+d+ha kle tra ma
147b4(mdo sde): pa ro sho d+ha ya/ ma me ka sh+tsid be he thang ka ro tu/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ti na sA hA/ tad+ya thA/ ti dze te dze/ ma hA tai dze/ yan ma ma kA ya dus sh+tsa ri tam bA/ bA ga dus sh+tsa ri tam b+hA/ ma ma dush+tsa ri tam bA/
147b5(mdo sde): dA rid druM bA/ tad sarba da k+Sha ba ya/ a lo kA ya/ bi lo kA ya/ ta thA ga ta da ri sha nan tsa/ a ha ma d+hi kang/ k+Sha mi bo d+hi satwa di ra sha nam/ d+hu d+hu ma/ da das swa me da ri sha nam/ sarba me ku
147b6(mdo sde): she la/ a b+hi bar dz+nyAn tu/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ na maHAr+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ smai ra pra tid ny+dza ma ma hA satwa/ sid d+h+yan tu man tra pa dA sAhA/ gzungs 'di brjod
147b7(mdo sde): pa nas chen po rab tu g.yos shing / gzha'i sgra chen po dang / lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur te// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin
148a1(mdo sde): te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// sems can chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
148a2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed pa/ las thams cad byang bar byed pa dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs 'di legs par
148a3(mdo sde): smras so/ / bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang gzung bar bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag gang la la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yongs
148a4(mdo sde): su bsgrags pa'i yon tan dag mngon par 'dod cing lung bstan pa dang / kho bo'ang mngon sum du mthong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong
148a5(mdo sde): ba dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'dod pa des/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la lus legs par khrus byas shing gtsang la/ bsnyen te gnas/ 'phags
148a6(mdo sde): papa'i yan lag brgyad po la gnas par byas la/ tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa phyogs su spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan/
148a7(mdo sde): dag dang / bum pa gang ba dag gis sa phyogs de dang / chos smra ba de la'ang mchod pa byas nas/ lus legs par khrus byas pa gtsang mas gos dkar po bgos te/ me tog dang /
148b1(mdo sde): bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ yi ger bri bar bya'o// 'dri ba'i tshe na nyin gcig bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can
148b2(mdo sde): thams cad dang thun mong du byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma dang / gus pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang
148b3(mdo sde): snying rje'i sems kyis nyi ma phyed tshun chad kyi bar de tsam du bri bar bya'o/ / tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa'ang de bzhin bya'o// cho ga 'di kho na bzhi
148b4(mdo sde): du byas te bris na/ de ma thag tu mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/
148b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// tshe de nyid la'ang lus bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phra dog dang / ser sna
148b6(mdo sde): dag srab mor 'gyur ro/ / des yi ger 'drir bcug nas kyang sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi gnas su/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa dang / spyan ras
148b7(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa shin tu rgya chero byas la/
149a1(mdo sde): chos brgyad nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya zhing / gtsang ma kha zas dkar po zab bsnyen te
149a2(mdo sde): gnas pa/ 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/ grogs po yid gcugs pa dang ldan pa/ nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su spangs pas/ nyin gcig
149a3(mdo sde): bzhin du mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ dus gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spros dang / mar me dag kyang phul la/ dus gsum du sna
149a4(mdo sde): ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la dor bar bya'o/ / lag na rdo rje la'ang bdug spos kyis bdug par bya'o// phyogs bcur phyag byas la/
149a5(mdo sde): nub phyogs kyi lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang / shar phyogs kyi dpe med ma dang / steng gi phyogs kyi dung can ma la sogs pa phyogs bzhir gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / 'o thug dang /
149a6(mdo sde): zho dang / 'bras chan dag kyang gtor bar bya'o// des na de la rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'jigs pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / sems 'khrul par yang mi 'gyur ro// sna ma'i
149a7(mdo sde): me tog brgya rtsa brgyad po thams cad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bskul bar bya'o/ / cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du sngar bsnyen pa byas la/ de nas tshes bco lnga'i nang par sa phyogs der bum
149b1(mdo sde): pa gang ba bzhi bzhag la/ bdug spos dang / tsan dan dang / pog dkar po dang / ga pur dag kyang bzhag la/ mar me kha bzhi dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang /
149b2(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dar dang / ba dan sna tshogs dag dang / gser dngul gyi snod dag gis legs par brgyan la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dang
149b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang ci 'byor pa'i lha bshos dang / gtor ma dag kyang phyogs bzhir bzhag go// sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod lan re byas la phyogs bzhir bzhag go/
149b4(mdo sde): de nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod lan re byas la/ re re nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la bsnun par bya'o// de nas gzugs de 'gul
149b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing / sgra skad chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin
149b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par yang 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su'ang 'gyur/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba rnam
149b7(mdo sde): 'byor par yang 'gyur/ nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang / tshe ring bar yang 'gyur/ dgra thams cad dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams kyang de la lta 'dod cing gces sbas bye
150a1(mdo sde): par yang 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs par yang 'gyur/ nam du'ang sdug pa dang mi 'bral bar
150a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / brtan pa dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying
150a3(mdo sde): brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / chos shes pa dang / 'chi ba'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba dang / byams
150a4(mdo sde): pa la gnas shing chos ston bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa dag gam/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs chen po 'am/ gang du rjes su dran
150a5(mdo sde): par byed pa der skye ba dang / gzhan yang yon tan stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / gzungs kyi gsang sngags
150a6(mdo sde): gzhi 'di dag ni yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas lags te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma mchis par mnyan rngo mi thog la/ gzung bar yang rngo mi thog/ klog
150a7(mdo sde): par yang rngo mi thog/ mchod par yang rngo mi thog/ yi ger bri bar yang rngo mi thog/ yi ger 'drir stsal bar yang rngo mi thog/ dad par yang rngo mi thog lags so// gal te mthong bar
150b1(mdo sde): gyur na'ang nyan par mi 'gyur la/ gal te nyan par gyur na'ang de sems rnam par g.yengs par nyan par 'gyur zhing dad par mi 'gyur/ bsnyen bkur bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// gal te/
150b2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bgyid par gyur na'ang nyon mongs pa dang / gnod sems dang bcas pa'i sems kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur lags so// gal te yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir
150b3(mdo sde): stsol bar gyur na'ang de gzhan dag yid la bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu lags pa'i slad du ste/ de ni las de nyams su myong bar
150b4(mdo sde): bgyid cing / the tsom skye bar 'gyur lags so// mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pas kyang lan gsum bsgrub na re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur lag te/ de la nem nu ra ma mchis pa
150b5(mdo sde): dang / yid gnyis ma mchis pa dang / the tsom mi bskyed par bgyid lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so/
150b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin chen mo dpe
150b7(mdo sde): med ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu zung dag gis mchod pa byas te/ bcom
151a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sham+bi/
151a2(mdo sde): na dbyangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam bcas pa brjod par rjes su dran lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
151a3(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying po dag 'tshal lags so/ / de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / re ba thams cad
151a4(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi don du bdag rjes su gzung du gsol/ namaHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/
151a5(mdo sde): s+yAd ya the dan/ hwA hA/ hI h+ni/ hU hU/ sa ra sa ra/ la hUM la hUM/ shI g+h+raM shIg+h+raM mahA bid d+ye/ sarba bid d+ye/ d+ha ra na ma skr-i te/ ha sa ha sa kin tiSh+Tha si/ king kin tiSh+Tha si/ kan ka bi
151a6(mdo sde): tsing tra/ A ba ra na bi b+hAShi tang ke/ po Ta~M T+Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hai ra b+hai ri/ d+hu ru d+ha ru/ sarba ar+tha na me sA d+ha ya/ tA ru tra ru/ ar+tha nas ha sa/ ar+thA ni de hi me/ sarba satwA nAn+tu/ sid d+hi/
151a7(mdo sde): hA hA/ pad+ma pad+me/ mahA badz+ra/ bi sha de/ zi sha de/ mahA'i sha de/ b+ha ba b+ha ba/ b+ha bod b+ha bA ya/ ta ma hang g+ho raM/ tam hang g+ho re/ tan me/ bid byam pa yo tsA ya/ sid d+hi kA r+ra/
151b1(mdo sde): sarba swa shA me pa pU ra ya/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThAn na swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la yon tan 'tshal ba dang / nor dang / 'bru 'tshal ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal/
151b2(mdo sde): bapab dang / nor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal srid dang / rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang / bdag kyang mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des/ tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar
151b3(mdo sde): bapa kha tshar ma bskum pa sgra ma skul ba la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/ 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas/ tshon rtsi sprin dang ma 'bags pa snod gsar pa'i nang du skul bas/
151b4(mdo sde): dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du zhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo rang po dkar po 'tshal ba rgyan thams cad dang / me tog 'breng /
151b5(mdo sde): dang / zla gam dang / se mo ngos brgyan pa rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// g.yon phyogs su gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/
151b6(mdo sde): rang pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sug pa na pad+ma thogs shing / yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang
151b7(mdo sde): ma bsnyen te gnas pa/ 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/ rang pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ grogs dang ldan pa/ nas chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen pa bgyis la/ tshes brgyad kyi
152a1(mdo sde): gdugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / lag na rdo rje la me tog dang / bdug spos dang /
152a2(mdo sde): spos dag la gsol bar bgyi zhing / phyogs bzhir 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / chang sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug
152a3(mdo sde): spos dang / spos dang / mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas/ dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum bgyi zhing / re re nas
152a4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma'i gzugs de la bsnyen par bgyi'o/ / de nas zla ba nye ba'i tshes bco lnga'i gdugs la'ang cho ga 'di nyid dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag dang / bdug spos dang /
152a5(mdo sde): ga pur dang / bog dkar po dang / tsan dan dang / shing mu sa dag kyang dbul/ 'bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul bar bgyi'o// des na bdag der rang gi gzugs
152a6(mdo sde): kyis gnas par bgyi zhing dam pa 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal srid dang / stobs kyi 'khor los
152a7(mdo sde): sbyar ba nyid dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / gter lha 'tshal ba dang / nor rgyur 'tshal ba dang / pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar
152b1(mdo sde): bgyid lags so/ / des kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi'o// mchod rten dang / chos
152b2(mdo sde): dang / dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog pa yongs su spangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad pa mi phyed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te mtshams ma mchis par bgyid pa zhig gis kyang
152b3(mdo sde): lan gsum bsgrubs te/ bdag gis kyang ma bsams par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig
152b4(mdo sde): gal te sangs rgyas la dad par ma gyur pa dang / yid gnyis su gyur pa gang lags pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas/ 'gyod par mi bgyid pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon
152b5(mdo sde): mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag la'ang bdag mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing / thob par yang bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma la
152b6(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so// sring mo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdig pa kun tu spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gsang sngags gzhi 'di lta bu
152b7(mdo sde): 'di dag smras shing / dam bca' ba'ang khyod legs so// khyod snying rje chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod nus
153a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur gyis/ / de bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas lha mo chen mo drang can mas bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas te/
153a2(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi
153a3(mdo sde): rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang bsrung ba'i slad du/ dam bca' bar bgyi zhing re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis
153a4(mdo sde): ba'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi lags kyis/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang ba mdzad du gsol/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nan/ tad+ya thA/ oM shang bi
153a5(mdo sde): ni de bi/ A gad tsha/ A gad tshwa/ tiSh+Tha d+ha ne/ d+hA na dza ye/ bri bri/ brid d+hi ka ri/ d+hI d+hI/ d+hi ti ka ri/ nA nA bi bi d+ha/ be Sha bsta/ A yu d+ha d+ha ri ni/ yu yu A yu shwA la ne/ ta thA ga tAn/ smA ra
153a6(mdo sde): bo d+hi tsid tAn/ ma bI lam pa/ de hi me ba ra na/ shing khi ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag lus la gnas par bgyis na de'i snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / gzi brjid
153a7(mdo sde): 'phel ba dang / longs spyod 'phel ba dang / dbang phyug 'phel ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dgra rnams dbang du bgyi ba'ang 'phel bar 'gyur lags so// sa phyogs gtsang ma 'am/ lha
153b1(mdo sde): gnas su ci 'byor pa'i gtor ma phyogs bzhir stsal la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdug spos dang / pog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing / zhugs mar dag kyang phul la
153b2(mdo sde): dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byams pa la gnas pa dang / nges par gnas shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ dam pa'i chos spong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs
153b3(mdo sde): su rdzogs par bgyis lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis lha mo chen mo dung can ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so// yon tan
153b4(mdo sde): mamo dang ldan pa'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so/ / sring mo khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed mas/ bcom ldan 'das la
153b5(mdo sde): gser gyi me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang
153b6(mdo sde): chos smra ba de dag dang / chos nyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa bgyi ba de dag gi don du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid
153b7(mdo sde): pa dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal srid dang / tshe ring bar bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags
154a1(mdo sde): gzhi rnams skul bar bgyi ste/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig 'dzin
154a2(mdo sde): tam/ klog gam/ bsnyen bkur bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir stsol tam/ mchog tu gus pas ji skad gsung ba'i bsgrub pa la sgrub par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de
154a3(mdo sde): bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi zhing / dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dag gis mi phel bar bgyi/ 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang /
154a4(mdo sde): khrag khrug dang / 'khrug glong dag las rgyal bar bgyi/ tshe phun sum tshog pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ de'i yul dong grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags kyis/ de'i slad du bcom
154a5(mdo sde): / ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol u0f7f/ na ma u0f7fsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ sarba bo d+hi satwA nAn/ na ma u0f7fAr+yA ba lo kaM ti shwa ra/ badz+ra pA Ni pra b+hI tI nAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA de bi/
154a6(mdo sde): b+hi me b+hI ma ma te/ dza ye dza ya ba he ya sha ba ti/ ya sha dza be/ te dza dza be/ bya kar Na prA ba te/ sarba satwa a ba lo ka Ne/ kri pa te dza pa hu le/ ta thA ga te a nud ny+dza tam pA la ya/ sma ra pra tid
154a7(mdo sde): nyam bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha ne na/ de he me ba ra na/ si d+hing ku ru/ de bi ma hA de bi sad t+ya pu tsa na de bi b+hi me/ sad t+ya ba tsa na pra tiSh+Thi te gu h+ya ni bA sI ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can
154b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi ngan du/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs shing / de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba'i gsang sngags gzhi dag smras te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar me tog dang /
154b2(mdo sde): bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa bgyis la/ phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag skul te/ ci dang ci 'tshal ba yid la bgyis shing

154b4(mdo sde): brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma bskum pa/ sgra ma mchis pa la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su bzung ba/ tshon rtsi sprin dang ma 'bags pa snod
154b5(mdo sde): gsar pa'i nang du skul bas/ dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyid/ g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos
154b6(mdo sde): kyi 'brel ba'i gtam ston pa bri bar bgyi'o/ / g.yon phyogs su ni lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan
154b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ril ba dang bgrang 'phreng thogs shing / yang dag par 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas sngar bsnyen pa bgyis la/
155a1(mdo sde): tshes brgyad nas bco lnga'i bar mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas su me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spros dang / me tog 'phreng dag gis mchod pa bgyi zhing // phyogs
155a2(mdo sde): bzhir yang 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan gyi gtor ma dag gtor la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing / lha bshos dkar po
155a3(mdo sde): dag kyang phul la gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya
155a4(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyi zhing / re re nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzugs de 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing / dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi
155a5(mdo sde): ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang / nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / gter lta 'tshal ba dang / nor rgyur 'tshal ba dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa bzlog pa dang
155a6(mdo sde): bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu gzhom pa dang / bu mchis par bgyi ba dang / nor 'du bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa skye ba
155a7(mdo sde): dang / gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la the tsom du gyur pa
155b1(mdo sde): gang lags pa ma gtogs par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na yang / bdag gis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med
155b2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sring mo legs so leg so// sring mo khyod sems can gyi don dang / phan pa dang
155b3(mdo sde): bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni yang khyod legs so/ / sring mo de'i phyir khyod kyis rtag tu dam bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig/
155b4(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing / lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/

155b7(mdo sde): 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsal ba dang / klog pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchid thon du bgyid pa des bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur lags sam/
156a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig
156a2(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa'am/ ma dgongs pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'
156a3(mdo sde): bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /

156a5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ gos dang / rgyan dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu ti ga dag gis sems can thams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser bcug kyang /

156a7(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba nyid yin zhing / lo 'bum du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /
156b1(mdo sde): yi dgas kyi yul dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur ba nyid de/ sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan cing mchod pa byed pa dang / yang dag par bstan te/ de'i don kyang
156b2(mdo sde): mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug

157a2(mdo sde): byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 'chag sa dang / skyed mos tshal dag byed du bcug gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten
157a3(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa brgya 'am/ stong byed du bcug ste/ de dag la lo 'bum du mchod pa dag gis mchod par byed pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger

157a5(mdo sde): gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du mchod pa byed pa de ni de lta ma yin la/ sems can thams cad la sbyin pa byin zhing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug pa'ang de lta ma
157a6(mdo sde): yin no/ / de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po de dag gis rtag par rgyun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par
157a7(mdo sde): bya'o/ / gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrog par byed pa dang / rjod par byed pa dang / don kyang nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'du shes
157b1(mdo sde): bskyed par bya zhing / de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ yid la bya zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed par
157b2(mdo sde): yang bya ste/ bdag cag don med pa la don du 'du shes pa dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes shing / lam ma yin par zhugs pa la lam
157b3(mdo sde): bapar ston pa gang yin pa dang / bdag cag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa

157b5(mdo sde): ni sems can thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa mdzad pa chen pos yang dag par bshad lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs
157b6(mdo sde): 'di ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma na/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ der yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang /
157b7(mdo sde): blon po chen po dang / blon pa snod du gyur pa/ mchod pa byed pa/ 'jig par byed pa/ 'dzin par byed pa/ klog par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dad par 'gyur/ yid ches
158a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / gal te byang dang / shar dang / nub phyogs kyi rgyud dag na spyod par 'gyur na yang / de na gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang / dang par mi byed pa dang /
158a2(mdo sde): yid ches par mi byed pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa dang / brjed ngas pa dang / pra smad dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / bzhad/
158a3(mdo sde): gad dang / 'dze sgeg dang / bro dang / gar dang / glu sna tshogs kyis rnam par g.yengs shing phrag dog dang / ser sna'i dran pas nyan par mi byed/ yid ches par mi byed pa'i sems can de
158a4(mdo sde): dag ni bdud kyi las la mngon par brtson pa yin te/ de dag ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi
158a5(mdo sde): bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul rnams las yongs su mi thar pa kho nar 'gyur
158a6(mdo sde): ro/ / de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo bdag nyid ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar par 'dod pa de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya
158a7(mdo sde): zhing / gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par bstan par bya/ yid la'ang gzung bar bya'o// khrag khrug dang / 'khrug klong dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba
158b1(mdo sde): dang / gnag nad dang / phyags nad dang / mi nad dag dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs dag la yang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa byas te bklag par bya'o//
158b2(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis mchod cing / phyogs bzhir gtor ma gtor la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dag gis phyag
158b3(mdo sde): byas te/ 'jug par byas na der yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'
158b4(mdo sde): stsal to/ / sngon gyi srid par 'dren pas gang gsungs shing // sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// de ltar ngas kyang khyod la bshad pa yi// ting 'dzin 'di ni mdo sde mchog zung zhig
158b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la/ / gang gis khams gsum sbyin par byed pa bas// mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byas na ni// sbyin pas de yi dper yang mi phod do// sangs rgyas
158b6(mdo sde): dge 'dun la ni dang byas te/ / tshad med gtsug lag khang dag brtsigs pa bas// gang zhig mdo sde 'dzin pa gang yin pa// doni de bas bsod nams mang por 'gyur// gang zhig me tog gtsug
158b7(mdo sde): tsam 'dor byed cing / / gos dang 'phreng ba byug pa de bzhin te// ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na// bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur// gang gis mdo sde 'di la mchod
159a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ / kar sha pa Ni'i sbyin pa sbyin byed cing // byang chub phyir ni byams pa'i sems bskyed na// de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob// byang chub sems dpa'
159a2(mdo sde): gang gis sems can la/ / ting 'dzin 'di bshad lung phog de bzhin du// bla med byang chub phyir ni bkod gyur na// de yi bsod nams dper yang de mi 'gyur// de ltas phan yon 'di dag thos
159a3(mdo sde): nas kyang / / sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te// mdo 'di gzung zhing yi ger bri bar bya// bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshad par bya// rga dang de bzhin ma mchis gnod gyur cing /
159a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rab dag brgya yis yongs gdungs la// sems dmyal yi dgas rnams su skye ba na// phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par gyur ta re// 'chi ba'i dus na yid skrag 'jigs gyur la//
159a5(mdo sde): yang dang yang du sngam pa 'don byed cing // bdag gi dpung gnyen skyabs su 'gyur zhes pa// byis pa'i blo can phan tshun tog ga re// gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchod cing // sangs/
159a6(mdo sde): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nor phrogs pa// mi bzad gshin rje'i 'jig rten khrid 'gyur zhing // phyin chad rtag tu skyabs 'gyur 'ga' yang med// bu smad yod min nye du rtsa lag med//
159a7(mdo sde): yul 'khor yod mi bzhad gad 'jo sgeg med// nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan// kun spangs sdug bsngal yang dang yang mi bzad// ting 'dzin 'di la dad par ma byas pa//
159b1(mdo sde): de 'adz+ra'i sdug bsngal mi babang skyong 'askur bas// sdug bsngal 'di dang pan yon de thos na// byis pa'i blo yang sa TIg dang mi skyed// de phyir rtag tu dge slong po mo dang // dge bsnyen nam/
159b2(mdo sde): dang rgyal po khor zug tu// mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing // 'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
159b3(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags te/ ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bcang bar bgyi zhing / sems can thams cad la'ang yang dag par bgyi lags
159b4(mdo sde): so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang bstan pa mnyan te/ kun gzung ba de dag thams cad 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/
159b5(mdo sde): rgyas par byed na ni/ des ni khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing / gus par ma mnyan par yang mi 'gyur la/ nyan thos nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur gyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
159b6(mdo sde): 'chang bar mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ mchod par mi byed/ yang dag par ston par mi byed/ yid la mi byed na ni/ des na khyod kyis nga la nyes par byas par 'gyur zhing / grus par
159b7(mdo sde): ma mnyan par yang 'gyur la/ nyan thos nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis phung dung byas te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o// 'di ni phyi ma
160a1(mdo sde): dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par
160a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags drug khri len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' bdun
160a3(mdo sde): brgyas ni ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ / lnga brgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob par gyur to// srog chags dgu khri ni nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par
160a4(mdo sde): grol te/ mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad spangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
160a5(mdo sde): dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid pa dang /
160a6(mdo sde): 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang ji
160a7(mdo sde): lta bur 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan pa lags so/ / slad ma'i dus srad ma'i tshe na/ sems can gang bzhad gad dang / 'jo sgeg dang / gar dang / bro dang /
160b1(mdo sde): glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs su g.yeng ba 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pa che ba/ rtsed mo la dga' bar 'du shes pa/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa
160b2(mdo sde): phrag dog dang ser snas yongs su zin cing / mchod par mi bgyid/ ri mo mi bgyid/ dad par mi bgyid/ glo ba ches par mi bgyid/ 'chang bar mi bgyid/ klog par mi bgyid/
160b3(mdo sde): nyan par mi bgyid/ nan tan gyis sgrub par mi bgyid pa de dag ni/ dal ba 'di yid byung bar bgyis shing / sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su bas par bgyi nas/ sdug bsngal dang
160b4(mdo sde): yid mi bde ba sna tshogs dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / der yang bskal pa bye ba phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas/ yang sla
160b5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshini rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags te/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis yun ring por rjes su 'gyed par 'gyur la
160b6(mdo sde): so/ / de lta lags pas na/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid legs par bsdam par bgyi zhing / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la'ang dad pa mi phyed par bgyid/ sems can
160b7(mdo sde): thams cad la byams pa'i semasu bgyid/ phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi lags so//
161a1(mdo sde): da dus mas rgya bdun pas shan shegs papa/ g+sa dang / dam sa dang / A /
161a2(mdo sde): 5/ dang / nga / sa ts+tsha nga / na nga/ ma las / pa dang / bya sangasapas /
161a3(mdo sde): ba / das pa gas / thams mas cad kya nga/ da rna ma /
161a4(mdo sde): sa das ma dag tu gas pa dag 'phrul la dengs kyimaldan das/ dang na sa dan sapa / na
161a5(mdo sde): du ma / sa na sa /
161a6:
161a7(mdo sde): 'i marnam rgyas kyi ma kyi ma b
161b1(mdo sde): ka' stsal nas/ 'phags pa spyad+ma ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang / nyan tho/
161b2(mdo sde): chen po de dag thams cad dang / borgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang /
161b3(mdo sde): 'od can ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dung can ma dang / 'phrog ma la sogs pa de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
161b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
161b5(mdo sde): bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing
161b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi
161b7(mdo sde): lo tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur/ bya ba'i rgyud sder gtogs so//
162a1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA bud+d+ho ma hA sho d+ha ya pus ti sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga dang / mtshan
162a2(mdo sde): nas brjod pa'i yon tan gyi gleng gzhi dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /
162a3(mdo sde): bshags pa'i le'u rnams 'byung ba nyi tshe bcos shing bsgyur ba/ de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lhan cig tu thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/
162a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong la theg pa chen po'i chos
162a5(mdo sde): thos nas/ bdag cag dang lha dang mis mdo sde'i gsung rab 'di len cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang bar gsol gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/ yul khams
162a6(mdo sde): 'di dang phyogs gzhan du/ ri dang / tshal dang / shing drung gi rig sngags 'chang ba'i gnas dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / gnas dang / khyim dang / dgon pa'i gnas dang / dur
162a7(mdo sde): khrod dang / shing drung dang / bla gab med pa dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang / mi mang po 'du ba chos bshad pa'i gnas dang / mi phal gyi
162b1(mdo sde): / gnas dang / mir gyur pa thams cad la rgya cher khyab par bstan te rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas na/ ngan 'gro rnams kyang gtan du bkag pa'i
162b2(mdo sde): slad du'o/ / de ji lta zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pas sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bkum zhes thos te/ chos kyi gzhung 'di las tshig 'bru gcig tsam kha ton du 'dod na/ lha rnams
162b3(mdo sde): kyang dga' zhing mgu nas rtag tu bsnyen cing mchis te/ rang yang dge ba spyod par bgyid lags so// mi la la dag kyang rtog pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di thos nas dga' zhing
162b4(mdo sde): mgu la mos shing gus te/ yi ger 'dri la 'don cing klog pa dang / 'dzin cing 'chang la phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi gzhung 'di las bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'ga'i mtshan dang / byang chub
162b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'ga'i ming nas brjod na yang / mi des da ltar gyi tshe 'di la bde zhing skyid pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba mi 'byung la/ nam 'gum pa'i tshe na'ang bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams
162b6(mdo sde): dang lha rnams kyis de'i sngon du shul 'dren cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag mthong la/ dad nas gcig tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi gzhung 'di len cing
162b7(mdo sde): yongs su gzung ba'i slad du'o/ / mdo sde 'di len cing yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'dzin pa lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su 'dzin pa de ni/ byang chub
163a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' lags te/ de bas na bdag cag dang slob pa gcig ste/ rgyu de'i slad du chos kyi gzhung 'di yongs su bzung bas gnas gcig tu skye zhing / gcig gis
163a2(mdo sde): gcig mi spong zhing mi 'bral bas smon lam gcig pa lags so/ / de nas yang lha ma srin rnams kyi rgyal po dang / tshangs pa chen po'i rgyal po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /
163a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyag brnyan lag na rdo rje dag dang / sde dpon chen po la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang /
163a4(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi rgyal po dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po dang / bu dgu ma'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / shing gi lha dang / 'bab chu'i lha dang / mtshe'i lha dang / sa'i
163a5(mdo sde): lha dang / chu'i lha dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha la sogs pa'i rgyal po dang / de dag la sogs pa tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / lha chen po rnams 'khod pa las langs te/
163a6(mdo sde): gdong dang skyobs phyag brgyas nas thal mi sbyar te/ rjes dang gus par bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas sman chad rtag tu bcom ldan
163a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di yongs su bzung ste/ mdo sde 'di gang na gnas par bdag cag lha'i rgyal po rnams rtag tu de'i mdun du
163b1(mdo sde): mchis te/ gtsang zhing dag par bgyis la/ mchod rten gyi nang ngam/ mi phal gyi gnas sam/ dben pa'i phyogs gang na gnas sam/ yang na 'odo rje 'di tsang sbra ma phyed pa'i yan lag gis 'dzin kyang rung
163b2(mdo sde): bdag cag gis mi de la mi rigs pa'i gnod pas mi tshugs par bgyi'o/ / de mchis pa'i gnas kyi khyim gyi rim gro yang bgyi'o// bdag cag lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ de phan
163b3(mdo sde): tshun mchi na yang de'i mdun du 'dren cing shul sel ba dang / ci 'tshal ba bsgrub par bgyi'o// de phyogs bzhi dag tu mchis na yang sgrib cing chags pa ma mchis la/ rtag tu dge ba'i chos thob pa
163b4(mdo sde): dang / tshe brjes na lha'i nang du skye ba dang / de'i bsod nams kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mjal cing / theg pa chen po las mi nyams par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byag
163b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha ma srin rnams kyi rgyal po la sogs pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyed kyis smras pa de bzhin te//
163b6(mdo sde): chos kyi gzhung 'di lta bu 'di thos par yang dka' na/ rtogs par lta smos kyang ci dgos/ chos kyi gzhung 'di len cing 'dzin la/ 'don cing klog par byed na/ gtsang sbra dang khrus kyis dag cing
163b7(mdo sde): dad par byas la/ gos gtsang ma bgos te gnas gtsang mar byas la dar gyi bla re dang ba dan la sogs pas gnas kyi nang bzang por byas te brgyan la/ spos mchog tu dri zhim pa/ tsan dan dang phye ma
164a1(mdo sde): dag gis byug pa dang / spos rnam pa mang po bsregs nas phyag 'tshal te/ nyin gzhag gcig la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum de lta bur nyin mtshan gyi bar du chos kyi gzhung
164a2(mdo sde): 'di klog cing 'don te/ sems mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa mi g.yel zhing gcig tu rtag pa dang / bsam pa drang ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag cing 'gro ba dang / len cing 'dzin pa ma
164a3(mdo sde): 'khrul pa dang / spyod pa brtan pa dang / 'don cing zlos pa/ phyin ci ma log pa de lta bu'i tshul du mdo sde 'di las bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /
164a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bklags la/ mos shing gus pas de ltar phyag 'tshal zhing 'chang ba ni/ mdo sde 'di las bshad pa bzhin du sdig lci ba thams cad yang
164a5(mdo sde): dag par bsal bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang spyod cing sbyangs la/ byin gyis
164a6(mdo sde): brlabs nas yongs su gzung ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo// mdo sde rnams kyi rgyal po'o// mchog gi gzhung gi ni mdzod do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni lam mo//
164a7(mdo sde): rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa 'di mchog tu zab pa'i chos kyi gzhung gi snying po'o// gcig tu dper na 'jig rten na chen po bzhi la sogs pa rnam pa drug dang mtshungs shing bsam gyis
164b1(mdo sde): mi khyab ste/ drug gang zhe na/ sa chen po dang / chu chen po dang / me chen po dang / rlung chen po ste/ chen po bzhi dang / nyi ma dang / stong pa ste drug go// de la mdo sde 'di ni dper nas chen po
164b2(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar gtsang sme dang / che chung dang / bzang ngan theg pa yin no// yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na chu chen po dang 'dra bar mi gtsang ba'i ldan ljin dang dri ma thams cad dag par khru ba yin no//
164b3(mdo sde): yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na me chen po dang 'dra bar las dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mi gtsang ba'i slar sbur thams cad sreg pa yin no// yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na rlung chen po dang 'dra bar las dang
164b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mi gtsang ba'i phyag dar thams cad 'thor zhing 'bud pa yin no/ / yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na nyi ma dang 'dra bar ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad kun tu snang bar byed pa yin no//
164b5(mdo sde): yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na nam mkha' stong pa dang 'dra bar dngos po ma lus pa thams cad go 'byed cing shong bar byed pa yin no// theg pa chen po mdo sde rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas
164b6(mdo sde): pa'i mdo sde 'di rgya che ba ni zla med pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' man chad/ nyan thos dang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la thug pa thams cad shong bar byed do//
164b7(mdo sde): de bas na khyed kyis mdo sde 'di long la yongs su gzung ba dang rgya cher spel zhing khyab par gyis shig/ mdo sde 'di la mos shing gus par gyis te/ khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
165a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams kyis rtag par sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid mthong bar gyis shig/ khyed lha'i rgyal po dag mdo sde 'di
165a2(mdo sde): len cing yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyis rtag tu nga dang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba mthong bar gyis shig/ de
165a3(mdo sde): nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan zhes bya ba stan las langs te gos legs par gyon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo la phyag 'tshal
165a4(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du gsol zhing zhu na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar
165a5(mdo sde): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/ mos pa'i mtshan khyod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhu ba zhus pa legs
165a6(mdo sde): so legs so/ / khyod kyis ci dang ci zhus pa nyon cig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// khyod kyis zhus pa yang dpag tu med pa'i skye bo la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
165a7(mdo sde): la/ byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dran pa sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan rin chen gtsug tor zhes bgyi
165b1(mdo sde): pa de'i mtshan lan cig tsam thos pas kyang lhar skye ba thob bo/ / slad kyis yun mi ring ba zhig na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces pa'i khams yul dgon pa'i nags shig la/ yu ma chen po zhig/
165b2(mdo sde): mchis pa'i chab bskams te/ de'i nang na chab nyi stong phrag bcu zhig gdugs kyis gdungs nas 'gum du nye ba zhig mchis pa la/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bgyi ba zhig gis chab nya de dag
165b3(mdo sde): mthong ba dang snying rje'i sems skyes te/ rab dang zas kyi sbyin pa stsal nas/ dgung mang po mi thub cing 'tsho ba yun mi ring bar 'tshal te/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis bcom ldan 'das
165b4(mdo sde): rin chen gtsug tor gyi mtshan lan gsum brjod pas/ nya rnams kyis thos pas/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skyes so// de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag
165b5(mdo sde): dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la sman pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan bstan cing bsgrags par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan yang thos na/ dpag tu ma
165b6(mdo sde): mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang bde ba thob cing / rtag tu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi gter rnyed cing / de bzhin
165b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du gsol ba dang / tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams shing / nyon mongs pas 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar
166a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i slad du bstan par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
166a2(mdo sde): bu gal te ngas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan rdzogs par bstan na/ bskal pa khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du bstan kyang rdzogs pa'i mtha' med do// chu thams cad kyi thigs
166a3(mdo sde): pa'i grangs ni bgrang zhing shes par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod cing shes par mi nus so// ri rab lhun po rnams kyang srang la gzhal zhing bgrang bar
166a4(mdo sde): rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod cing shes pas mi nus so// 'jig rten thams cad kyi rdul thams cad ni bgrang zhing shes par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
166a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mtshan brjod cing shes par mi nus so/ / nam mkha'i mtshams dang mtha' ni shes par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod cing shes par
166a6(mdo sde): mi nus so/ / de bas na ngas khyod la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan mdo tsam zhig bstan te/ de gang zag la las rna bar lan cig tsam thos na/ mi de tshe 'phos ma
166a7(mdo sde): thag tu lha'i gnas su skye'o/ / thos nas mos pa dang gus pa byas la/ yi ger bris sam/ mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal na/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i sdig lci ba kun byang ste/ bsod
166b1(mdo sde): nams tshad med pa thob pas/ gang zag de dus zad nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yid la smon pa bzhin du skye ste/ nga yang mthong la/ ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i sangs
166b2(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed la sogs pa rnams chos thob par 'dod na/ tshul bzhin du
166b3(mdo sde): gos legs par gyon la lus bsrang ste/ sems mi g.yeng zhing dran pa mi g.yel bar shin tu yid la byos te/ sems rtse gcig tu bsdus la phyag tshol cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mar
166b4(mdo sde): me'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
166b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la gus par phyag
166b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad bsdus shing 'dzin pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// dpag cing
166b7(mdo sde): gzhal ba las 'das pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / zla dang dpe med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// chos mu med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bsam dpag dka' ba la gus par
167a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ / stobs kyi stobs la gnas pa'i stobs la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// khams
167a2(mdo sde): gsum na btsun pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / thams cad kyi lam ston pa chen po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcod par mkhas pa la gus par phyag
167a3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / pha rol gyi mthar phyin pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten rnams las thar pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'chi 'pho'i lam dang yongs su bral ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo//
167a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba mngon du brnyes pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha' ltar ci la'ang mi gnas pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// mang po'i nang na chos kyi rgyal po chen po la
167a5(mdo sde): gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdud bzhi'i tshogs bcom pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bu gcig pa'i pha ltar byams pa chen po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tshe rabs gar byung gar
167a6(mdo sde): skyes kyang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin mngon par rtogs la/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po nyid du phyin par smin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus can
167a7(mdo sde): thams cad gang la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pa'i phyir ro/ / 'khor mang po rnams sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ sems rtse gcig tu gus par mchod cing legs par nyon la yid
167b1(mdo sde): la zung zhig/ nga yis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan brjod pas// mtshams med lnga po'i sdig las kyang // rnam par grol ba sems skyed cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
167b2(mdo sde): med pa'i mi/ / de yi phyir yang ngas bshad de// de yis rtogs par ma nus kyang // sa bon tshig par rang 'byung ngo // yang dag bden pa 'ba' zhig yod// theg pa chung ngu'i mtshan bsal na//
167b3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po de nyid yod// theg pa rnam gnyis bsal bas na// theg pa gcig po kho na yod// dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa'i mis// tshig 'di thos par mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas grangs med sngon
167b4(mdo sde): mchod pas/ / da ltar bcom ldan mtshan thos so// len cing 'dzin pa'i gang zag ni// phyogs tsam las ni rnam grol te// rnam dag sa la'ang bde bar gnas// da ltar nga yi chos 'di la//
167b5(mdo sde): len 'dzin klog cing 'don pa dang // bcom ldan mtshan la phyag byas shing // sangs rgyas mdzad la bsgrubs pa yis// bdud tshogs las dang bral bar 'gyur// phas pham bzhi dang mtsham
167b6(mdo sde): med lnga/ / 'dod chen po yang byang gyur nas// ma 'ongs dus na mi de dag/ byang chub 'tshang rgya gdon mi za// gang zhig mos par mi byed na// ngan song gsum du nges par lhung // phyag
167b7(mdo sde): 'tshal brtson zhing mos bskyed na/ / sangs rgyas grangs med mthong 'gyur bas// rtse gcig sems kyis phyag 'tshal rigs// sdig pa thams cad byang 'gyur te// de bas gus shing mos par
168a1(mdo sde): gyis/ / de nas 'khor mang po rnams thal mo sbyar te/ lus dang sems nan tan du bsdus shing bsrangs nas/ mi g.yo zhing mi 'gyur bar lus kyi yan lag lnga sa la gtugs
168a2(mdo sde): nas/ sems rtse gcig gis shin tu legs par nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan nas brjod de bka' stsal pa/ snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
168a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa rnams la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mar me snang stong phrag nyi shu la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
168a4(mdo sde): mar me mdzad stong phrag sum cu la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu rtogs chen ye shes rgyal ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bu bcu drug la
168a5(mdo sde): gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
168a6(mdo sde): gzi brjid dbyangs kyi rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbang mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la phyag
168a7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od grangs med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan nyi zla ltar dang
168b1(mdo sde): zhing snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo rnam dag yongs su mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang mas brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
168b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug smra'i sprin gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug gi sprin dbyangs sngon gyi rgyal po ye
168b3(mdo sde): shes pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyalo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing sA la'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid
168b4(mdo sde): mchog rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rnam dag rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i 'od 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo//
168b5(mdo sde): debazhin gshegs pa 'od rgyang ring la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dril phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
168b6(mdo sde): dge ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lha'i dbu rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg pa snang mdzad ri rab lhun mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
168b7(mdo sde): bzla ba'i mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgya mtsho
169a1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo
169a2(mdo sde): ba'i sa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bai zlaR+Ya pad+ma'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser mdog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi snying
169a3(mdo sde): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo//

169a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa gsung chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma bral la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skyo yid spangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
169a7(mdo sde): 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab yon tan
169b1(mdo sde): 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla/
169b2(mdo sde): baiDUR+Ya'i 'od bla na med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
169b3(mdo sde): 'od snang zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mdog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chu zla 'od la
169b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom rmugs pa sel la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal spyod 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa rnam dag la
169b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dge ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dge la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob la phyag 'tshal lo//
169b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab chos la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ka la bing ka'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
169b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa klu'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
170a1(mdo sde): pa tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thog med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshes

170a6(mdo sde): pa bdud rtsi bro la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal
170a7(mdo sde): lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dam pa'i ri la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
170b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bla med dam pa pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig med stob kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
170b2(mdo sde): pa klu dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
170b3(mdo sde): kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zangs mdog tsan dan dri
170b4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan bsrung 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog brtseg
170b5(mdo sde): rab dga'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus bra ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin rgyal mtshan mar me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo//
170b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sra brtan la phyag 'tshal lo//
170b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od kun tu 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i brtson 'grus che la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu rtsa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
171a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa thugs rje'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i snying po'i rgyal po/
171a2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpung rgyan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i blo la phyag
171a3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser ri rin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi pad+ma'i 'od
171a4(mdo sde): 'bar mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang sgron chen la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bla res mkha' snang mnga' mdzad stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
171a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi pad+ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rin chen pad+ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+Ya bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag
171a6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa sku mdog kun tu bstan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi rgyal
171a7(mdo sde): po rnams btul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od stong la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa shes rab rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
171b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa byams pa 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
171b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rab zhi zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mchog btsun ye shes rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bla re mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
171b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i gdung bla ma'i ye shes gtso bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo//
171b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab ba dan rgyal ba bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri med snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo//
171b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od 'phro snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od kun tu snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra dbyangs dbang phyug
171b6(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba gsung mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rtag rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
171b7(mdo sde): pa spyan ras gzigs rgyal thabs brnyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rgyal thabs brnyes pa'i na bza' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid
172a1(mdo sde): kyi dgongs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyug 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sum bcwa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// te/
172a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa me tog ut+pa la'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson pas rgyal ba stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab stobs kyi rgyal de
172a3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rab dga' 'khrugs med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshad med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
172a4(mdo sde): pa mkhas pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab ri dbang rgya mtsho thogs med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
172a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad thogs med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rtag tu
172a6(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rmongs mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
172a7(mdo sde): 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bcu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa stong la
172b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa khri la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba rnams bsal bar 'gyur ro//
172b2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal
172b3(mdo sde): lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khrag khrig bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye
172b4(mdo sde): ma snyed dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
172b5(mdo sde): gal te gang zag la las snga ma 'das pa dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan thos na/ mi de bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cu'i bar du sems can dmyal
172b6(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ngo / / de bas na da gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams la// gang zhig gus par phyag 'tshal na// sdig byang sems kyis rang bzhin 'thog/
172b7(mdo sde): mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga// phyin chad 'di dag mi spyod de// yang dag ros thos rgyun mi 'chad// theg pa chen po'i tshul khrims rdzogs// de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal// gang zag
173a1(mdo sde): gnyis ni ma gtogs te/ / gcig ni phyogs snyoms chos la skur// gnyis pa de ni 'dod chen pa// gal te la las sems dag na// de ni 'dod chen ma yin te/
173a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas grangs med rtag tu mthong // la las rtsa ba bzhi nyams shing // mtshams med lnga por bcas pa dag/ mos pa rnam dag bya nus na// des na chos bzhin gnas par rung // kun gyis/
173a3(mdo sde): gus par phyag byas pas// mi dge bcu i las rnams bsal// kun gyis theg chen khrims thob ste// de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi mtshan bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
173a4(mdo sde): dpa' stong phrag bcus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa so sor thob bo/ / nyan thos brgyad brgyas kyang theg pa chen po'i sems cung zad skyes so// dge slong lnga stong gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob
173a5(mdo sde): bo/ / lha dang mi 'bum ni chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po snang 'bum phrag
173a6(mdo sde): bcu rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gser phye mdog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med snang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'khor
173a7(mdo sde): lo 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gsung brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i thong ka'i mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
173b1(mdo sde): pa seng ge'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od yon tan ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge gnas yon tan rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//

173b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
173b6(mdo sde): pa zhing gi bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla re la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag
173b7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo//

174a5(mdo sde): pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'di las lhag med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
174a6(mdo sde): pa bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od snang gsal bsod nams kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgras

174b1(mdo sde): pa ri rab ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rnam dag rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs

174b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jug pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin shes rab dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
175a1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid mnga' mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan kun tu 'od la phyag

175b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa zangs mdog tsan dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug sprin gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
175b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'jigs pa spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'bum phrag brgyad brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// da ltar bzhugs pa'i de

175b7(mdo sde): 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / gal te gang zag la las da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i mtshan thos na/ gang zag de
176a1(mdo sde): bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi lhung ngo / / de bas na gus par phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis da ltar phyogs bcu yi// bcom ldan/
176a2(mdo sde): 'das la phyag 'tshal na// mi dge lam las rnam grol zhing // mtshams med lnga la sogs pa byang // rnam dag sa la rtag gnas shing // shAkya'i chos la bde bar gnas// ngan song gsum ni
176a3(mdo sde): yongs su spangs/ / sangs rgyas byams pa mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas stong yang mthong 'gyur te// de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun mthong ste// rtag tu
176a4(mdo sde): rnam dag zhing du skye/ / dam pa'i chos kyang thos pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par rtogs// phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar bzhugs pa rnams kyi mtshan bstan pa'i tshe//
