240b2(mdo sde): pa ma srog dang bral lo// srog dang phral nas kyang rdzu 'phrul de ston to// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas kyang pha ma srog dang bral na/ bdag 'dra ba lta zhig/
240b3(mdo sde): ci smos snyam mo// byang chub sems dpa' de yang de'i tshe/ sems can de la ci nas kyang de'i las de sbrang ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i chos ston par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub
240b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'gyod pa'i yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang
240b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can gang chos bstan par rung zhing nus pa dag mthong la/ de dag kyang shin tu mi dge ba'i las byed par 'gyur na/ de dag gdul ba'i thabs su byang chub sems dpas 'phrul ba
240b6(mdo sde): ngag mngon par sprul te/ de la sems can gang rnams rgyal pos 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la rgyal por sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do// sems can gang rnams blon po chen pos 'dul
240b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de dag la blon po chen por sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do/ / sems can gang rnams bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mis 'dul bar 'gyur
241a1(mdo sde): bde dag la/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mir sprul pa dang / sems can gang rnams lhas 'dul ba de dag la lhar sprul pa dang /
241a2(mdo sde): gang lag na rdo rjes 'dul ba de dag la/ lag na rdo rjer sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do// sems can gang rnams 'jigs pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la 'jigs pa ston/ sems can
241a3(mdo sde): gang rnams brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gsad pa dang / bcings pas 'dul ba de dag la de 'dra bar ston/ sems can gang rnams nges pas 'dul ba de dag la nges pas 'dul
241a4(mdo sde): sems can gang rnams mtshams med pa byed pa 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag la brgyad par 'dod pa de dag thabs sna tshogs kyis 'dog cing zil gyis gnon par byed/ phyogs
241a5(mdo sde): gzhan du bkar bar byed do/ / mtshams med par 'gyur ba'i dngos po sbas te/ de 'dra bar de'i mdun du sprul pa ston to// yang na sems can dmyal ba ston to// mngon par shes pa ma skye
241a6(mdo sde): ngapa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe'i mtshan ma shes pa ni byed 'dod pa dang / gsod 'dod pa'i sems can de dag mthong nas/ snying rje chen po'i sems skyes te/ de yang 'di snyam du kye ma sems can
241a7(mdo sde): 'di rnams ni bung bar 'dod pa'o/ / kye ma sems can 'di rnams ni brlag par 'dod pa'o snyam du sems shing / de dag des lag mthil du sU ru ra'i 'bru bzhag pa ltar mthong nas mi dga' ba'i
241b1(mdo sde): sems chen po bskyed de/ de yang 'di snyam du sems so// bdag sems can gcig gi phyir yang sems can de phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su rab tu ma bzhag gi bar du mnar
241b2(mdo sde): med pa'i sdug bsngal bzar bar bzod na sems can 'di rnams kyang mi dge ba'i las byas te/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'dod pa thabs gzhan gyis ni bzlog par mi nus te/ sems
241b3(mdo sde): can de rnams tshe yang thung / dad pa yang med bdag cig la/ yul gzhan du bkar ba 'am/ zil gyis mnan par bya ba de lta bu'i dbang ni bdag la med na/ sems can 'di rnams mi dge ba'i las 'dis
241b4(mdo sde): lus zhig nas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar mi 'gyur grang zhes de'i phyir snying rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ las bdag gir bya ba dang 'thun par byas nas sems can de
241b5(mdo sde): rnams la byams pas khyab par byas te/ thabs gzhan gyis ni mi nus nas chang pa rab kyis 'chos te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//
241b6(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang rnams 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes par mi lcogs
241b7(mdo sde): mi nus te/ zas dang gos lhur 'dzin cing de kho nas chog shes par rtsi ba mthong na/ de rnams la sems dpa'i yi ge dang / bstan bcos dang / lag rtsis dang / grangs dang / shod thabs la sogs pa'i
242a1(mdo sde): las dge ba dang ldan pa mi ston to/ / mi dge ba dang ldan pa mi ston to// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na bung
242a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' len pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam thob na yang len te/ dngos po ngan pa zhig thob na yang len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
242a3(mdo sde): de 'di ltar sems te/ sems can 'di dag ni ser sna can/ brkam pa/ chags pas zil gyis non pa/ 'dzums pa yin te/ rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des chu'i phung po chen pos non pa bzhin du 'khor
242a4(mdo sde): ba'i rgya mtshor nub cing 'bying bar byed pa de dag la/ de ni yun ring por don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de blangs nas bdag gir mi byed/ chags pa'i sems mi skyed de/ gzhan du na
242a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la bya ba byed do// sems can sdug bsngal ba'i rnams la phan par byed do// sbyin pa'i bdag po de yang yang
242a6(mdo sde): dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' len pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su
242a7(mdo sde): slospong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lcogs shing nus pa zhig la/ de
242b1(mdo sde): yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thob par rtsol zhing 'bad de/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa mthong na/ de gnas de nas bslang ste tha na 'khor 'byed pa yang byas nas/ theg pa chen po la 'jog ste/ de
242b2(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzengs stod pa dang /
242b3(mdo sde): yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems skyed du 'jug/ byang chub kyi
242b4(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa'i sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba/ tshul khrims tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dag ni brtson 'grus la 'jog/ sems can gang rnams bslab pa kun spyod pa phra mo las
242b5(mdo sde): 'gal ba dag rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des sems kun khengs shing 'khod de dga' mgu rangs par yang mi rnyed pa de dag la/ de ci nas kyang gnas de nas ldang ba de lta de lta bur chos ston par byed de/
242b6(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzengs stong pa dang / yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang
242b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rnyed pa chung ngu yang
243a1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa yin/ de gcig pu lkog tu song ste rab tu dben par gnas nas/ de 'di ltar sems te/ ma la bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod/
243a2(mdo sde): pa dang rim gro bya ba bas ma mo snyam nas/ de de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems te/ de ltar sems pa de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
243a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ de la gang mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba mngon par byed pa 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang
243a4(mdo sde): rim gro bya ba de la gang sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems skye ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag la gang sems mngon par mos shing
243a5(mdo sde): dga' ba 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sems mi skyo ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag nyid
243a6(mdo sde): la gang nye bar rtog pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sna tshogs pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub/
243a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no//
243b1(mdo sde): / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dman pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin
243b2(mdo sde): ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ bdud thams
243b3(mdo sde): cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin
243b4(mdo sde): yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/
243b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i bde ba 'dod cing / smon lam mi 'debs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
243b6(mdo sde): dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ni khams gsum las skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog par smon lam mi 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
243b7(mdo sde): dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can
244a1(mdo sde): gyi khams ji snyed pa ma lus par de thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas/ bdag phyis sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'a'o//
244a2(mdo sde): zhes smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
244a3(mdo sde): yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems ma skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed/
244a4(mdo sde): du bcug ste/ mthar gyis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod du btsud nas/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa rnams la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba gdab bo//
244a5(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnams kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bzhugs su gsol lo zhes smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
244a6(mdo sde): yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar
244a7(mdo sde): bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na ci nas kyang bdud kyi sgra 'am/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o zhes smon lam
244b1(mdo sde): 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/
244b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi dring la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam mi 'debs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyis shes rab kyis dpyad de/ sems can gyi
244b3(mdo sde): khams sdug bsngal ba la bltas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin no//
244b4(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi tshogs rnams kyi phyogs 'ga' zhig bzung nas/ nyi tsho ba'i smon lam mi
244b5(mdo sde): 'debs te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ sems bskyed par byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bltas te/
244b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyogs bcu na gnas pa dang / gang dag dka' ba spyod pa la gnas pa dang / gang dag byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas gang dag mngon par rdzogs
244b7(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de rnams la snying thag pa nas bsams te/ de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed pa de dag la mos par byed do// mos par gyur nas rjes
245a1(mdo sde): su yi rang ngo / / rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji/
245a2(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yin yang chos zab mo zab mo rnams thos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba zab mo thos pa dang /
245a3(mdo sde): byang chub sem sa dpa'i rnam par rol pa zab mo thos pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul zab mo thos kyang mi skrag/ mi dang nga / dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing byang chub kyang
245a4(mdo sde): mtha' yas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mtha' yas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa yang mtha' yas te/ de ni bdag 'dra bas shes par mi nus
245a5(mdo sde): kyi/ sangs rgyas dag nyid kyis mkhyen gyi/ bdag gis mi shes so snyam du sems te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs
245a6(mdo sde): mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmu rgod sems can gdul dka' ba rigs te/ de rnams kyis yi chad nas 'di lta bu'i dmu rgod 'di 'di lta bu'i gdul
245a7(mdo sde): dka' ba'i sems can 'di dag gis chog go zhes te/ de'i phyir yongs su skyo zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur te/ gang na sems can 'di lta bu dag gi ming yang mi thos pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs
245b1(mdo sde): su dag par smon lam mi 'debs so/ / sems can gyi don lam phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de la byang chub
245b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' shes rab can ni/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad na/ sems can gang rnams ngan pa brtson 'grus chung ba blun po glen pa lug ltar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can yongs su
245b3(mdo sde): mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'di las bsnyigs pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spangs par gyur pa yod pa de dag
245b4(mdo sde): bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus par gyur la/ bdag gis de dag byang chub kyi snying por 'dug tu bcug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya bar
245b5(mdo sde): bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems bskyed pa re re la yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang de'i bsngags pa gsung
245b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar na/
245b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa yin zhes/ rigs kyi bu 'di
246a1(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bdud kyi dpung gzhom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
246a2(mdo sde): rgya ba dang / yang de las 'das par smon lam mi 'debs pa 'di ni legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mar ram 'bru mar gyi snod khang chad du gang ste/
246a3(mdo sde): lhag par rdul phra rab tsam gyi thigs pa yang mi shong na/ de'i phyir e ma 'o snod gang ba/ e ma 'o snod shin tu gang ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
246a4(mdo sde): rgyas pa la smon lam legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ smon lam ma rdzogs pa rdul phra rab tsam yang med do// de bas na legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu chos
246a5(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa
246a6(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum
246a7(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin/ shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin
246b1(mdo sde): dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin//
246b2(mdo sde): bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di
246b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' pha rol rgol ba kun gyis mi non pa yin te/ de ltar na zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum
246b4(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs la gang stobs kyis thub pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs
246b5(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'jig rten pa
246b6(mdo sde): 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de gang yang med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs
246b7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis mthong ba dang / mngon du
247a1(mdo sde): ma byas pa dang / khong du ma chud pa de dag med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
247a2(mdo sde): 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin/ lta ba nyams pa ma yin/ cho ga nyams pa ma yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa ma
247a3(mdo sde): yin gyi/ byang chub semasad pa'i 'khor ni/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par spyod pa rnams nyid yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar
247a4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis rdzu
247a5(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi yul thams cad zil gyis non te/ de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa mchog gi zil gyis gnon to// de 'dod na 'dzam bu'i gling gi skra nyag ma gcig gi rtse mo la 'jog go// de bzhin du srid
247a6(mdo sde): bzhi pa dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de bzhin no// 'dod na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi 'am
247a7(mdo sde): rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog go/ / de bzhin du gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed khams dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu nas/
247b1(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i yang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog kyang / rdul phra rab de la gang ba dang / bri bar yang mi mngon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams kyang phan
247b2(mdo sde): tshun du 'dres par mi 'gyur/ sems can de rnams la gnod par yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi
247b3(mdo sde): stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byin gyis rlob bo// de 'dod na brjod du
247b4(mdo sde): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang bar byin gyis rlob ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji
247b5(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
247b6(mdo sde): ji snyed cig don tha dad pa dang / tshig dang yi ge tha dad pa dang / brjod pa tha dad pa dang / tshul tha dad pa'i chos bshad pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig gcig la thams cad 'dzin par
247b7(mdo sde): byed/ khong du chud par byed/ sgom par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyis
248a1(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpas byin gyi/
248a2(mdo sde): rlabs byin du brlabs pa la gang rnam par 'khrugs par byed pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrug pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs
248a3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub sems
248a4(mdo sde): dpa'i bka' gcog pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na ma mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
248a5(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no//
248a6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs
248a7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/
248b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes/
248b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun
248b3(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpas phung po rnams skye ba yang yang dag par mthong / 'jig pa dang 'gog pa yang yang dag par mthong ngo // des phung po skye ba
248b4(mdo sde): rnams snying po med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / gsog tu yang dag par mthong / phung po 'gag pa rnams 'jig par yang dag par mthong ste/ de 'di snyam du sems/ phung po 'di dag ni bdag
248b5(mdo sde): med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di dag ni/ 'di ltar bdag
248b6(mdo sde): cag gi phung po rnams bdag go/ / bdag cag gi phung po rnams la bdag yod do// bdag cag gi bdag la phung po rnams yod do// bdag cag gi bdag ni phung po can no snyam ste/ de dag bdag tu 'dzin
248b7(mdo sde): pa la mngon par zhen pas/ de kho na nyid khong du mi chud do// de kho na nyid khong du ma chud pas mga' me'i 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba na 'khyam mo snyam du sems shing / de thams cad kyang byang chub sems
249a1(mdo sde): dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
249a2(mdo sde): dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos su sgro 'dogs pa dang / chos la skur pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'di/
249a3(mdo sde): snyam du glo bur du byung ba'i chos la kun brtags pa'i ming gdags te/ chos la yang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ yi ge de dag kyang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin mod kyi/ 'di ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam du bya'i
249a4(mdo sde): 'di la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ / glo bur du byung ba'i chos de yang thams cad kyi thams cad du med pa ma yin te/ gzhan gyi rkyen dang / gzhan gyi rkyen la sdod pa dang / gzhan gyi rkyen rnams kyis 'byung
249a5(mdo sde): zhing rkyen dang bral na 'gag pa'i chos 'di ni yod do zhes de thams cad byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shA
249a6(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba'i ye shes skad cig gcig la 'jug cing
249a7(mdo sde): skad cig gnyis pa la mi 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba ni/ skad cig thams cad la thogs pa med par 'jug ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye
249b1(mdo sde): shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam
249b2(mdo sde): kyang rab tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang
249b3(mdo sde): rab tu shes so/ / des ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la nyan thos spyod pa de dag yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la rang sangs rgyas
249b4(mdo sde): spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la de bzhin gshegs
249b5(mdo sde): paspyod pa de yang rab tu shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs phye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu shes kyi/ rnam par smin pas grub pas rang gi ye shes kyis ni ma yin no// ting nge
249b6(mdo sde): 'dzin gzhan rnams ni rnam par smin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzi gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
249b7(mdo sde): dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas nyan thos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta
250a1(mdo sde): ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na/ sems can de ma yin pa gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
250a2(mdo sde): dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni mu stegs can
250a3(mdo sde): thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji
250a4(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yongs su dag pa/ dang zhing rnyog pa med pas/
250a5(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ste/ des de na sems can la la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag dang / la la byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag dang / la la byang chub kyi sems bsgrubs pa dag
250a6(mdo sde): dang / la la byang chub kyi sems ma bsgrubs pa dag dang / la la sa dang po la gnas pa dag dang / la la sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas pa ngag dang / la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag dang /
250a7(mdo sde): la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dag dang / la la bya ba kun byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya
250b1(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la bde 'gror skye ba dag dang / la la ngan 'gror skye ba dag mthong ngo // de ltar sems
250b2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
250b3(mdo sde): dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'am/ 'greng ba 'am/ 'dug pa'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba na lhun gyis grub cing ye
250b4(mdo sde): shes 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na miganyid kyis log pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa dag lhun gyis grub cing 'byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de yang de bzhin du blta'o//
250b5(mdo sde): ye shes de yang thams cad du mi chags par 'jug ste/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams
250b6(mdo sde): cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs par yang rab tu shes/ mtshan nyid gcig par yang rab tu shes
250b7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid du mar yang rab tu shes/ rgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang rab tu shes/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du yang rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos
251a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa
251a2(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa dang ldan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
251a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no//
251a4(mdo sde): dkon mchog sprin bam po gsum pa// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
251a5(mdo sde): yangs shing tshad med pa rnams yin/ sems can thams can gyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams yin/ gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyi sprin chen po kun bzed
251a6(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa rnams yin/ rin po che'i snod du gyur pa rnams yin/ rtsi chen po'i snod
251a7(mdo sde): du gyur pa rnams yin/ mi bskul ba rnams yin/ mi spangs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing tshad med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
251b1(mdo sde): dper na sa chen po ni thams cad du yangs shing tshad med pa yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kun tu yangs shing tshad med pa yin te/
251b2(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing tshad med pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen
251b3(mdo sde): po'i 'di ltar yo byad rnam pa de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
251b4(mdo sde): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la sogs pa byang chub kyi tshogs rnams dang / phan par 'gyur ba'i yo byad rnam pa du ma de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin te//
251b5(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang / lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ rigs kyi bu dper
251b6(mdo sde): nas chen po ni gnod pas kyang zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur/ phan pas kyang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ de la gnyis su 'du shes pa mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gnod pa dag gis kyang
251b7(mdo sde): zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur/ phan 'dogs pa dag gis kyang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ de ni sems can de dag la chags pa dang / khong khro ba yang mi skye ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod
252a1(mdo sde): pa dang / lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun bzed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po ni sprin chen po
252a2(mdo sde): las bab pa'i chu'i klung chen po kun bzed de/ bzod cing kun 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char pa chen po rab tu bab pa kun bzed
252a3(mdo sde): cing bzod la 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun bzed pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
252a4(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po ni sems can thams cad 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das par
252a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin
252a6(mdo sde): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa bon thams cad ni sa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa las skye'o// de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyang byang chub sems
252a7(mdo sde): dpa'i gzhir gyur pa las skye ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
252b1(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod yin te/ sa chen po la rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod
252b2(mdo sde): du gyur pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' la yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin to// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du
252b3(mdo sde): gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rtsi chen po gang dag nad rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar 'gyur ba dag kyang sa chen po la gnas te 'jig rten na snang ngo // de bzhin du gang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad
252b4(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rtsi chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la gnas shing 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur
252b5(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi bsgul ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po ni 'di ltar sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sbrul gyis reg pa'i sdug
252b6(mdo sde): bsngal thams cad kyis mi bskul ba yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad las byung ba'i phyir nang gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi bskul ba yin te/ de
252b7(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi bskul ba yin no/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi spangs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po ni glang po che'i rgyal po'am/ ri dgas kyi
253a1(mdo sde): rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra thos kyang mi skrag/ mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud dang mu stegs thams cad kyi sgra thos na mi skrag/
253a2(mdo sde): mi dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi spangs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po dang mtshungs pa rnams/
253a3(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba rnams yin/ dkar
253a4(mdo sde): po'i chos thams cad skyed pa rnams yin/ dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can rnams yin// nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul ba rnams yin/ drang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal
253a5(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la sred pa zlog pa rnams yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ mtho dman 'gengs
253a6(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper
253a7(mdo sde): na chu ni gzhol bar 'gro ba dang / gzhol bar rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dge ba'i chos la gzhol zhing / dge ba'i chos kyi phyir rgyu ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
253b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu ni rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / rtsi dang / nags
253b2(mdo sde): tshal thams cad skyed de/ skyes pa rnams kyang phyir zhing rgyas par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin gyi chus byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad rnam par bskyed do// skyes
253b3(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur kyi bar du phyir zhing rgyas par byed do/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs
253b4(mdo sde): dag gis sems can rnams 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad bskyed pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / dad pa dang /
253b5(mdo sde): rangs pa'i gsher can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu ni ngo bo nyid kyis gsher ba can yin te/ gzhan yang gsher bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ngo bo nyid kyis
253b6(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin te/ sems can gzhan yang dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gshe sa can du byed do// de la dga' ba ni 'jig rten las 'das
253b7(mdo sde): pa'i chos tshol ba'o/ / dad pa ni sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la rten pa'o// rangs pa ni gang sems dag pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba dang / dad pa dang
254a1(mdo sde): rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad sprul ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu ni shing gi
254a2(mdo sde): rnam pa dang / rtswa'i rnam pa'i rtsa ba dag gi rgyun rnams srul lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sgom pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul te/
254a3(mdo sde): ji ltar na nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun 'di dag gi ming yang mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i dring ba'i bag chags kyang med par 'gyur ba de lta bur srul te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon
254a4(mdo sde): mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul ba yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu ni rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog
254a5(mdo sde): pa med de gsal lo/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin no// de la bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba dang bral bas na dang ba'o// 'dod chags
254a6(mdo sde): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral bas na rnyog pa med pa'o// dbang po rab tu dang bas na gsal ba ste/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin no// ji ltar na byang
254a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu ni sa chen po dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa dang / de las gzhan yang sems can
254b1(mdo sde): rnams dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad chos kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de
254b2(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa zlog pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu
254b3(mdo sde): ni skom pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi skom pa rnam par zlog go/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yul la sred pas nyen par gyur pa dag la gang gi sems can de dag gi yul la sred pa
254b4(mdo sde): ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu chos kyi chos mngon par 'bebs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa zlog par byed do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab cing gting dpag dka'
254b5(mdo sde): ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i 'jing ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang 'di lta ste/ bdud thams
254b6(mdo sde): cad dang / mu stegs thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
254b7(mdo sde): mthong man 'gengs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i klung ni sa phyogs mtho dman 'gengs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu klung gis sems can gyi
255a1(mdo sde): khams mtho dman 'gengs te/ ji ltar na chus 'gengs pa ltar sems can la gnod par byed pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gyi/ sems can de rnams la snying brtse ba'i
255a2(mdo sde): phyir chos kyi chu klung 'bebs shing de dag la gnod par mi byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtho dman 'gengs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams
255a3(mdo sde): cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chus ni sa'i phyogs skam zhing / rdul 'thul ba thams cad snum par byed cing rdul de dag zhi bar byed do// de bzhin du byang
255a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang sems can sems rtsub pa rnams 'di lta ste/ shes rab la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus sems snum par byed cing / sems can de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams
255a5(mdo sde): cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chu dang
255a6(mdo sde): mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung
255a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang sreg par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad kyang skam par byed/ me'i phung po dang 'dra ba rnams yin/ snang bar
255b1(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams yin/ skrag par byed pa rnams yin/ dbugs 'byin pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa rnams yin/ mchod pa byed pa rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa rnams yin no// /
255b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na me ni phyag dar khung dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / gel ba dang
255b3(mdo sde): rtsi dang / sdong po thams cad sreg go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis bag la nyal dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa'i
255b4(mdo sde): phyag dar khung thams cad sreg ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs
255b5(mdo sde): su smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na me ni lo tog dang / rtsi dang / sdong po'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su smin par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab
255b6(mdo sde): kyis nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed pa yang ji ltar 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su smin par byed do/ / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos
255b7(mdo sde): rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'o/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed de/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na me ni chu bran gyi 'dam thams cad skam
256a1(mdo sde): par byed do/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis zag pa nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam
256a2(mdo sde): thams cad skam par byed do/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can grang ba'i nad kyis nyen pa rnams kyi grang ba med
256a3(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ me'i phung po byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i nad kyis btab pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i nad med par bya ba'i phyir/
256a4(mdo sde): shes rab kyis rab tu dro bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
256a5(mdo sde): dper na gangs kyi rtse mo 'am/ ri bini da'i rtse mo na me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba des dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu snang bar byed/ dpag tshad gnyis kho ra khor yug dang / dpag tshad gsum khor
256a6(mdo sde): khor yug tu yang snang bar byed do/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'ang ye shes kyi snang bas dpag tshad brgyar yang khyab par byed/ dpag tshad stong du yang khyab par byed/ dpag tshad stong phrag
256a7(mdo sde): brgyar yang khyad par byed pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa grangs med pa'i bar du yang khyab par byas nas/ sems can thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed do// ye shes
256b1(mdo sde): kyi snang ba des mi shes pa'i mun pa mun gnag thams cad rnam par sel to/ / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skrag par byed pa yin zhe na/
256b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ri dgas khro bo 'am/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po khro bos me'i phung po chen po mthong na skrag/ rab tu skrag/ shin tu rab tu skrag par gyur cing / 'di lta ste/ me'i 'jigs
256b3(mdo sde): bas skrag pas gnas te/ de ring ba bas kyang shin tu ring bar spong ngo // de bzhin du bdud rnams sam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas skrag/ rab tu
256b4(mdo sde): skrag/ shin tu skrag par gyur cing / 'di lta ste/ gzi brjid chung ba'i phyir gang du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming yang mi thos na/ mthong ba lta smos kyang mi smos par/ ring ba bas
256b5(mdo sde): kyang shin tu ring bar sa'i phyogs de yongs su spong ngo / / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skrag par byed pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/
256b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa las me'i phung po chen po mthong ste/ de de logs su song ba dang / des ni grong ngam/ rdzi'u brang mthong nas
256b7(mdo sde): de shugs phyin te/ rab tu dbugs phyin nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par 'khyam pa'i
257a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na/ shugs phyin par 'gyur/ rab tu dbugs phyin par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral
257a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/
257a3(mdo sde): me ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa ste/ ji ltar na rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams
257a4(mdo sde): cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin te/ ji ltar na rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin/
257a5(mdo sde): no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na me la ni bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis mchod do//
257a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ston par 'du shes pas mchod de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
257a7(mdo sde): mchod par bya ba yin no/ / ji ltar na mi brnyas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na me stag chung ngu yang 'tshig pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na mi brnyas pa yin no// de bzhin du mos pas spyod pa
257b1(mdo sde): la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs ma rnyed pa theg pa chen po la las dang po pa yang / lU dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bla rnyas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
257b2(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di ring por mi thogs par byang chub la 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
257b3(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar khong du chud de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' me dang mchung
257b4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas med par spyad pa dang / spyod
257b5(mdo sde): yul kun tu mu med pa dang / sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu snyil bar byed pa dang / chos kyi char sprin chen po kun skyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyang
257b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la chos dkar po lus 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba dang / chos kyi char sprin
257b7(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin pa dang / chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyis
258a1(mdo sde): 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa dang / bskal pa/
258a2(mdo sde): grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang
258a3(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i khor yug ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor na gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang ngo /
258a4(mdo sde): yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na med cing lus med par gnas 'pho bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gan
258a5(mdo sde): med par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni thams cad du thogs pa med cing gnas med rten med de/ gzugs med kyang nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med
258a6(mdo sde): khang dang / ri rab dang / rgya mtsho la sogs pa thams cad la rang gi dgos pa byed par snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang chos thams cad la kun tu mi gnas pa yin te/ phung
258a7(mdo sde): po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams
258b1(mdo sde): dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par
258b2(mdo sde): shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i kham
258b3(mdo sde): dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sgra'i skye
258b4(mdo sde): mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang /
258b5(mdo sde): chos kyi skye mched la mi gnas pa yin/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'khor
258b6(mdo sde): los sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag tu 'gyur ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dag tu 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'ang
258b7(mdo sde): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag la yang gnas par mi byed de/ de thams cad la mi gnas pas dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang
259a1(mdo sde): gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / de bzhin nyid la sogs par rlom sems kyi rnam pa du mas ma gyur cing / dmigs pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i spyod
259a2(mdo sde): yul dang ldan pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa yang byed la/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu sems can thams cad
259a3(mdo sde): kyi don thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par thams cad du yang tshul chos kyi lus kyis mi snang ba yang yin zhing / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste
259a4(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu mu med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
259a5(mdo sde): dper na rlung mar ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag tu reg par byed de/ g.yob cang rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang / chos
259a6(mdo sde): mu med pa dag kun rdzob dang / don dam par kun nas mthong zhing rgyas par byed/ reg par byed/ rnam par 'god cing ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang /
259a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang / 'khor ba thams cad kyi gnas dag tu yid kyi mgyogs pa dang ldan zhing phyogs bcu thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i spyod yul
259b1(mdo sde): bar gyur nas rgyu zhing 'gro ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu mu med pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis
259b2(mdo sde): snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu stsal bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni ri dang / khyim dang / nags tshal gyi rtse mo dag 'dud par byed
259b3(mdo sde): rab tu snyil bar byed/ rnam par 'jig par byed/ 'thor bar byed/ mi sdang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang sems can nga rgyal dang / rlom
259b4(mdo sde): sems dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mos snyems pa rnams/ gzugs dang dar la bab pa dang / longs spyod dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / tshe dang
259b5(mdo sde): nad med pa dang / 'tsho ba dang / bzo dang / thos pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / g.yog dang / smra mkhas pa dang / dpal che ba'i dregs pas myos pa dag dang / yang dag pa'i
259b6(mdo sde): nan tan gyis bdag stod pa rnams la de dang khyad zhugs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa dang / chos bstan pas nga rgyal choms par byed cing dge ba dri ma med pa la sbyor bar byed de/
259b7(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu snyil bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos
260a1(mdo sde): kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni phyogs bzhi nas sprin gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can dang /
260a2(mdo sde): zab cing gsal la mnyen zhing 'jam pa'i 'brug sgra rgya mtsho'i dbyangs can krung ro sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs rjes su grag pa glog gi 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par
260a3(mdo sde): brgyan pa gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya dag kun nas yongs su khebs par byas te/ 'gro ba thams cad dga' ba dang / lo tog dang / sdong po
260a4(mdo sde): yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir/ char gyi rgyun rin po che rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bebs pa'i sprin chen po kun nas slong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang / lus sna tshogs kyi
260a5(mdo sde): sprin sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byed pa/ 'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa'i glog gi 'phreng ba'i rgyun 'byung ba yang dag pa
260a6(mdo sde): de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra yan lag stong phrag drug cu pas sgrog pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlung mar gyi yang dag par 'thor ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nam mkha' khyab par
260a7(mdo sde): byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas khebs par byas shing / ngan song dang / mi khom pa la sogs pa nas/ sems can rnam par bslang ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mtshan dang / dpe byad/
260b1(mdo sde): bzang po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba rnam par dag pa yang byin gyis brlabs te/ bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang byin gyis brlabs nas/ lha dang
260b2(mdo sde): mi dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa mchog tu gyur pa dga' ba dang / bde ba mchog thob pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dkar po'i lo tog dang /
260b3(mdo sde): rtsi chen po dang / sdong po thams cad rnam par bskyed pa dang / thams cad du skyid par chos kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / rgud pa
260b4(mdo sde): rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi char chen po mngon par 'bebs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems
260b5(mdo sde): dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar dri zhim po'i char gyi rgyun gyi snying po can ldang na/ sems can thams cad kyi
260b6(mdo sde): gdung ba yongs su zhi bar byas shing lus shin tu sim pa dang / bsil bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
260b7(mdo sde): dang ngan 'gro dang / ngan par lta ba dang / nyes byas dang / the tshom dang / 'phongs pa mi bzad pa dang / yul la sred pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad pa dang / nad rnams
261a1(mdo sde): bcil nas dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la sred pa la sogs pa'i gdung ba dag dam pa'i chos kyi char dang 'dres pa'i bla na med pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / smon lam dang /
261a2(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / reg pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / bstan pa don yod pa la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon
261a3(mdo sde): mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed cing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa la 'god pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par byung ba'i/
261a4(mdo sde): dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i rlung gi mthus sems can thams cad 'tsho'o// de bzhin du byang
261a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpas mngon par bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bstabs pa'i chos dkar po'i rlung mar nye bar spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pas kyang sems can thams cad dga'
261a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'di lta ste/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / khor yug ri dag dang / khor yug ri chen po rnams
261a7(mdo sde): dang / gling chen po bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa'i gser gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang bcas pa rnams dang / ri rab dang / ri rab chen po dang / de ma yin pa rin po
261b1(mdo sde): che'i ri dang / gangs dang / ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang / grong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang dag dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dag dang / gling chen po bzhi dag dang / stong dag dang / stong
261b2(mdo sde): gnyis pa dag dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po dag 'god pa rnam par phye ba sna tshogs pa mngon par sgrub bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang phyogs bcu kun tu sems can
261b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub bo/ / skyed do// yongs su gzhog go// de la ji ltar gangs kyi ri phun sum tshogs pa de ltar 'jig rten pa'i bsod
261b4(mdo sde): nams phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ / ji ltar na gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri rab phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar stong gi
261b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ / ji ltar stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni byang chub sems
261b6(mdo sde): dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ / ji ltar na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 'jig rten
261b7(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa shin tu rnam par dag par grags pa/ mchod pa la dmigs pa thams cad yang dag par gnas pa rnams kyi thams cad mngon du byas
262a1(mdo sde): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lta'o// de la rgya mtsho ltar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho rnams
262a2(mdo sde): blta'o/ / gling dang / bar gyi gling dang / ri gzhan dang / gling chen po bzhi la sogs pa ltar ni sbyor ba dang / gzungs dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / slob pa'i dge 'dun la sogs pa blta'o// /
262a3(mdo sde): grong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang ltar ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa rnams blta'o// dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags tshal rnams ltar ni/ sa dang / pha rol
262a4(mdo sde): tu phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / ye shes snang ba dang / dbang dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang /
262a5(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / thugs rje chen po la sogs pa dbang sgyur ba dam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o// rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya
262a6(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yongs su brtag pa gzung ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang ji snyed yod pa
262a7(mdo sde): de dag thams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur la/ de lta bu'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi
262b1(mdo sde): phung po ji tsam pa nyid bsdoms pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba chen po cig gcig ldan par gyur te/ rnam grangs nges shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
262b2(mdo sde): gtogs pa'i sems can de snyed cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas
262b3(mdo sde): gtugs pa dag na/ sems can yod do cog ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu sha stag dang so sor ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis/ 'jig rten gyi
262b4(mdo sde): khams ji snyed pa de snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag tu gyur la/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
262b5(mdo sde): grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dang / brgya byin cig gcig dang ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
262b6(mdo sde): pa nam mkha' mthas gtugs pa thams cad/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra ba sha stag tu gyur la/ bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig
262b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad tshangs pa chen por gyur la/ bsod nams de thams cad gcig tu bsdoms pa dang / tshangs pa chen
263a1(mdo sde): po cig gcig ldan par gyur la/ tshangs pa chen po ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin du gyur te snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang / rang sangs rgyas
263a2(mdo sde): dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po thob pa 'od zer gyi sprin chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba dbang bcu thob pa sha stag tu gyur te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems can thams cad phyogs
263a3(mdo sde): bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams su gtogs pa dus gsum pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa des dus gsum gyi nam mkha'i khams su gtogs pa dang /
263a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub bo// ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du
263a5(mdo sde): gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu las/ dpe byad bzang po re re mngon par 'grub bo// dpe byad bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod//
263a6(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po de thams cad brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin
263a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu zla ba nya ste/ dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa bye ba stong phrag
263b1(mdo sde): bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing / bltar mi snang ba gtsug tor gyis yongs su brgyan pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du
263b2(mdo sde): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong phrag drug cu pa/ dmigs pa thams cad las gsung gi sgra mtha'
263b3(mdo sde): yas pa 'byung ba lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad bsam pa yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa mngon par 'grub ste/ rigs kyi bu de ni sangs
263b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ces bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang ldan zhing kun tu
263b5(mdo sde): rgyas par byed pa bkod pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi
263b6(mdo sde): klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams bcu pa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lus dang / ngag dang
263b7(mdo sde): yid kyi rgyan 'chang ba dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i snod rin
264a1(mdo sde): po che sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pas/ nam mkha'i tshad tsam gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thogs te/ phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par yongs su bkang zhing skad
264a2(mdo sde): cig skad cig tu blangs shing khyer yang spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gang ba 'am bri bar mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan
264a3(mdo sde): ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / de la sa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa dang / rab tu dga' dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro can dang / shin tu
264a4(mdo sde): sbrang dka' dang / mngon du gyur dang / rang du song dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyis kun tu 'od de/ sa bcu gnyis po de dag go/ de la byang
264a5(mdo sde): chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i byis pa'i spyod pa dang / log pa'i nan tan thams cad las yang dag par 'das te/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya
264a6(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang khyad zhugs shing 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa rnam pa thams cad du dpal dang ldan pa'i
264a7(mdo sde): lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs 'chang ba
264b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par skad cig re re la 'gro zhing 'ong na/ dri zhim po dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'byung ba/ pad+mas rkang pa
264b2(mdo sde): yongs su brtan pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i stan gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i lhag mthong rnam par bsgoms pas// thogs
264b3(mdo sde): pa med cing yid du 'ong ba'i dmigs pa'i mtshan ma chen po bcu la sogs pa grangs med pa'i lngas bzang po mthong ba/ phyir mi ldog pa phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs po mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'od
264b4(mdo sde): kyi dra nga bsam gyis mi khyab par rab tu 'gyed pas zhing dpag tu med pa'i rgyan byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi mnga' bdag dpag tu med pa snyed kyi bdag gi gzugs
264b5(mdo sde): brnyan gyis dbang bskur ba yang dag par gnod pa'i dbang dang byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che char gyi snang ba'i sgo dpag tu med pa thams cad
264b6(mdo sde): gtan pa med pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos sbyin chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/ blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong la mdzes shing dge la 'gro ba thams cad dang mi mthun pa med cing / don yod
264b7(mdo sde): par bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro ba ngan 'gro la sogs pa la sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob pa
265a1(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa grangs med pas
265a2(mdo sde): rnam par rol pa chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas zang zing med par phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa'i mthar thug par rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba thob pa/ bskar
265a3(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ther 'bum dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i sgom pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs la/ gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan tshar phyin pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi
265a4(mdo sde): t shogs mngon par bsgrub pa grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya stong phun sum tshogs pa'i mos pa chen po'i yang chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thag tu thob par gang gnas pa 'di ni byang chub
265a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni mi'i kha dog las ni 'das la/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang
265a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las ni 'das pa yin/ don dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni ma thob pa yin no// sangs rgyas
265a7(mdo sde): kyis kun tu 'od ni mtha' dang dpung med pa ma lus pa dri ma med pa'i chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun tu shin tu lta ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do//
265b1(mdo sde): de la ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhe na/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che chen po kun tu 'phags pa dang / shin tu
265b2(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / mi bsgul ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dang / don thams cad grub dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgya
265b3(mdo sde): mngon du bzhugs pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mtha' yas so// gzungs ni bcu gnyis te/ bcu gnyis gang
265b4(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang bskur ldan dang / ye shes ldan dang / sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang / mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang / 'khyil ba mtha' yas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang / pad+ma
265b5(mdo sde): bkod pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas
265b6(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i gzungs te/ de dag la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// mngon par shes pa ni drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
265b7(mdo sde): lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa
266a1(mdo sde): ste/ drug po de dag go// dbang ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par byin gyis rlob pas tshel dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i
266a2(mdo sde): yang brjod du med pa'i nges par rtog cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan par byin gyis rlob pa ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la
266a3(mdo sde): dbang ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa ston pas las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
266a4(mdo sde): khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang bar ston pas mos pa la dbang ba dang / / dus dang zhing gang du 'dod par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas smon lam la dbang ba dang / 'jig
266a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dang dpung med pa yongs su ston pas chos la dbang ba dang //
266a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam
266a7(mdo sde): pa dang / dus thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs la sogs pa skad cig gcig la yongs su shes pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams
266b1(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas ye shes la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i
266b2(mdo sde): stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa'i stobs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs
266b3(mdo sde): dang / theg pa'i stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnams so//
266b4(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan
266b5(mdo sde): ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyis spyod lam smad du med pa'i las gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang / chos bzung ba yun ring du mi brjed pa dang / thabs dang
266b6(mdo sde): shes rab mthar phyin pas sems can sgrol zhing dad pa ston pa dang / dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma nyams shing theg pa gzhan gyi mi
266b7(mdo sde): 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so//
267a1(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams yin/ ma bstan pa'i tshul
267a2(mdo sde): khrims can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i shes rab can rnams
267a3(mdo sde): dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad sdud pa rnams dang / yongs su sngo ba'i cho ga shis pa rnams dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gis theg pa'i
267a4(mdo sde): mchog gis 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa rnams dang / zung dang spel zhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams
267a5(mdo sde): yin/ ye shes sngon du 'gro bas mngon par 'du mi byed cing kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon par zhugs pa rnams dang / lus dang ngag yid kyi las kyi mtha' dge ba bcu dang ldan pa
267a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba rnams dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon par ston pa rnams dang /
267a7(mdo sde): byis pa so so dang nyan thos mi bzad pa ji snyed cig gi nang na yang dge ba mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag bsam ltar brtan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su ma nyams pa
267b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba bstan pa las mi ldog pa rnams te/ bco brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i
267b2(mdo sde): chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi las kyi
267b3(mdo sde): rgyu'i rnam par smin pa len pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs
267b4(mdo sde): dang thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang //
267b5(mdo sde): ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / shi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni
267b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /
267b7(mdo sde): zag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
