268a1(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
268a2(mdo sde): 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang / sems mnyam par ma gzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa'i
268a3(mdo sde): 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / mos pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge
268a4(mdo sde): 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /
268a5(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro
268a6(mdo sde): zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba da / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/
268a7(mdo sde): bco brgyad po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rnam pa sum cu
268b1(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis dang ldan par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin du 'byung ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams
268b2(mdo sde): cad ni bdag med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni bdag med par ma mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni sems can
268b3(mdo sde): med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni sems can du smra ba'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni srog med pa yin na/ sems
268b4(mdo sde): can rnams ni srog tu smra'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gang zag
268b5(mdo sde): la gnas so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni yod par lta'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin
268b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni gnas med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gnas la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o//
268b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni gzhi med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gzhi la dga' 'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni nga yir bya
269a1(mdo sde): ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni nga yir bya ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni bdag
269a2(mdo sde): po med pa yin na sems can rnams ni yongs su gzung ba la brtson no zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa yin na//
269a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni dngos po la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni skye ba
269a4(mdo sde): la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni 'chi 'pho dang ma skyes pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'chi 'pho dang
269a5(mdo sde): skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon ma mongs pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon
269a6(mdo sde): mongs so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'dod chags par
269a7(mdo sde): byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni zhe sdang bar byed do zhes
269b1(mdo sde): de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni gti mug par gyur to zhes de'i
269b2(mdo sde): phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'ong ba la gnas pa'o zhes de'i phyir sems
269b3(mdo sde): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'gro ba la gnas so zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de
269b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skya'o/ / chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can
269b5(mdo sde): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni spros pa med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni spros pa la dga' 'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams
269b6(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni stong pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni lta ba la zhen to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
269b7(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni mtshan ma spyod yul can no zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
270a1(mdo sde): rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa yin na// sems can rnams ni smon pa la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
270a2(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / zhe sdang la zhugs par gzigs nas de dag la gnod sems
270a3(mdo sde): kyi tha ba dang / zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhini gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan
270a4(mdo sde): zhing nyam nga bar zhugs pa la ma gol ba la gnas pa yin gyis/ de dag yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o//
270a5(mdo sde): kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pa'i zal gyis non pa ste/ cho ga ma shes shing gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa yin gyis/ de dag 'phags pa'i nor dad pa dang / tshul
270a6(mdo sde): khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i nor la dgod do zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o//
270a7(mdo sde): kye ma sems can de dag ni bu smad dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'phrul sred pas/ 'khor bste/ snying po med pa la snying por 'du shes pa yin gyis/ de dag la shin tu mi rtag par bya'o zhes
270b1(mdo sde): de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mi rigs pas 'tsho ba ste/ gcig la gcig 'drid par gnas pa yin gyis/ de dag
270b2(mdo sde): la 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste/ rnyed pa
270b3(mdo sde): dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang bdag cag ni chog shes pa snyam du 'dzin gyis/ de dag la gang 'di sdug bsngal shin tu zhi zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pas shin tu chog/
270b4(mdo sde): par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod shin tu nyon mongs pa la rtag tu dga' ba yin/
270b5(mdo sde): gyis de dag las byung zhing khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams
270b6(mdo sde): cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ba bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ de la sems can rnams ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la le lo byed kyis/ de dag la rnam par grol ba lhur
270b7(mdo sde): blang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams par chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ / sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad
271a1(mdo sde): bar du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyis/ de dag la gang
271a2(mdo sde): 'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/ rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa sum cu rtsa
271a3(mdo sde): gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu
271a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang 'a la zhig sems can dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po skye na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bsod
271a5(mdo sde): nams kyi zhing gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa phyir mi ldog pa sems can gyi don la brtson par rig par bya'o/ / snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ srog chag
271a6(mdo sde): stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ / srog chags brgyang stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis
271a7(mdo sde): ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dang ba
271b1(mdo sde): skyur gyi chos rnam par dgod pa ni dpag tu med grangs med de/ de dag phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mtha' meng na/ sems can rnams kyi dga'
271b2(mdo sde): ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir phyogs tsam zhig bstan te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba
271b3(mdo sde): dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
271b4(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor mu med cing rgya che la brtan zhing sra bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'byung ba char sprin dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho dang gling chen
271b5(mdo sde): po bzhi par bcas pa/ ri rab dang / ri btang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi ngad ldang dang / grong
271b6(mdo sde): rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam par bcas pa dag yongs su 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang
271b7(mdo sde): g zungs kyi rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor mu med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis phab pa'i gtan pa med pa'i chos kyi char kyi rgyan chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin
272a1(mdo sde): to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chags pa'i tshe/ ji skad du brjod pa'i ri rab dang / rgya mtsho dang / gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri btang bzung dang / ri btang bzug
272a2(mdo sde): chen po dang / gangs dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi ngad ldang dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams
272a3(mdo sde): brgya pa'i mtshan dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par
272a4(mdo sde): rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen po la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'dra
272a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi phung po brgya stong mu med pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun
272a6(mdo sde): 'dzin nus pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa
272a7(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni gzhal med khang dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun nas gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed de/
272b1(mdo sde): nags tshal dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / ldum bu dang / myu gu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / sdong po la sogs pa dang / sems can
272b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi yan lag dang nying lag rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs su rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su gzhog cing rnam par 'byed de/ gsal bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub
272b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rlung mar yang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing mtha' yas pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum
272b4(mdo sde): tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas yongs su gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ snang bar byed/ yongs su ston par byed/ thob par byed cing rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste
272b5(mdo sde): chos 'di ni ngan song sgrub pa'o/ / 'di dag ni bde 'gro sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bdag por sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas sgrub pa'o//
272b6(mdo sde): 'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni mir sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni lhar sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni 'khor los sgyur bar sgrub pa'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni brgya byin
272b7(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gzugs dang / g.yog dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / dpa' chen por sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni rig pa'o// 'di dag ni sgyu rtsal la/
273a1(mdo sde): 'di dag ni bzo'i gnas so// 'di dag ni bstan bcos sna tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ste/ nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni rang
273a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni theg pa chen po ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag dang gzhan gyi don yang dag par thob par byed pa kun tu bzang po
273a3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ / de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni sa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / rig pa rnams dang / dbang rnams dang /
273a4(mdo sde): gzungs rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ma 'dres
273a5(mdo sde): pa rnams so zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pas/ gzungs pad+ma bkod pa la sogs pa la mkhas pas chos bkod pa rnam par bkod pa dag
273a6(mdo sde): byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin no// ji ltar na byang
273a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyibu 'di lta ste/
273b1(mdo sde): dper na rlung mar ni dpag bsam shing gi nags tshal dag las gang gis lha dang mi rnams shin tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ mya ngan med par rnam par rtse zhing
273b2(mdo sde): dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kha dog dang / stobs dang / mthu dang / yid bde ba las yongs su mi nyams pa de lta bu'i spos dang / me tog dang /
273b3(mdo sde): rgyan dang / gos dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i mngon char 'bebs/ yongs su skyod cing 'byin par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems
273b4(mdo sde): dpa'i rlung mar yang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas/ sems can dag la gang nas sems can
273b5(mdo sde): de dag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / yongs su skyo bar mi
273b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyis snang bar gyur pas rtag tu khyad par gyi
273b7(mdo sde): rnam par 'dod par 'gyur ba'i mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i snga dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang /
274a1(mdo sde): rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / 'di lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la bab par/
274a2(mdo sde): bstan pa'i sde dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i me tog la sogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs so// rjes su 'thun pa dang / rjes su mi mthun pa dang / snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshug/
274a3(mdo sde): kyi rgyud la sogs pa'i gtam rnam par gdon mi za ba nye bar sgrub bo// tha snyad kyi dmigs pa thams cad la bdag med pa zhi zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid rjod cing ston la rnam par
274a4(mdo sde): byang bar byed do/ / chos thams cad sgo kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba yongs su ston to// sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro// ye shes sgyu ma rnam par rgyas
274a5(mdo sde): par byed do/ / chos thams cad la dga' bar rtse ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do// 'dri ba thams cad kyi lung bstan pas tshim par byed do//
274a6(mdo sde): mtha' dang dpung med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas paskyed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par rnam pa
274a7(mdo sde): gdon mi za pa'i mchog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su
274b1(mdo sde): bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang /
274b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i khor yug gi ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ gdul ba yongs su smin pa yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas su
274b3(mdo sde): 'gyur bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni bskal pa'i mthar thug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig
274b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i dus na gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / ri rab dang / khor yug ri dang / rgya mtsho la sogs par bcas pa kun
274b5(mdo sde): nas 'jig cing rnam par 'thor ba dang / rmeg med par byed cing nam mkha'i rang bzhin du byed pa de lta bur stobs kyi shugs thogs pa med par ldang ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems
274b6(mdo sde): d pa'i rlung mar yang bskal pa mang por tshogs bsags pa'i sems can bsod nams dang ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i ri mthon po dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stob
274b7(mdo sde): kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu bskor ba'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas
275a1(mdo sde): / chos kyi phung po'i rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang ba'i lhag mthong dam pa dang ldan pa bzod par mi nus pa'i 'du byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par
275a2(mdo sde): gzhog pa tshul bzhin yid la byas nas yang dag par sems nang du gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa la brten te srid pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed kyi
275a3(mdo sde): lus thams cad bshig cing rnam par btogs te lus med par byas nas/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa rnam par bshig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa/ bsam gyis
275a4(mdo sde): mi khyab cing gzugs med pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa rnam par bshig pas gnas gyur pa rnam par dag pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug par gnas
275a5(mdo sde): ba rnam pa thams cad du mtha' dang bral ba rnams thob par byed pa de lta bu kun nas rab tu gtong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil
275a6(mdo sde): 'khor yongs su bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang nags
275a7(mdo sde): tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i khor yug ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dul ba dang yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa
275b1(mdo sde): bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'gyur bar ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu
275b2(mdo sde): yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// a la la de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi
275b3(mdo sde): mchog dang ldan zhing / sems can rlabs po che rnams yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba'i chos bcu po 'di bstan pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom
275b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das lha dang mi gang la la chos 'di dag la mos shing nan tan bgyid na/ de dag thams cad ji snyed du gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa/ bde ba dang bcas pa/ yid bde ba dang bcas
275b5(mdo sde): par thob par 'gyur te/ brgya ba ni dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa zhig bgyid na yang / gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs
275b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can gang de lta bu'i chos rnams la nan tan du byed pa de dag
275b7(mdo sde): ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / kun tu rnam par bltas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang //
276a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro// gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni mun par gzhol ba ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad la sten pa'o// lha dang / mi dang /
276a2(mdo sde): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba'o// // dkon mchog sprin bam po bzhi pa// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/
276a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dri ma med pa rnams yin/ ma chags pa rnams yin/ zhi ba rnams yin// shes
276a4(mdo sde): rab mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ so so mi ye shes mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid rjes su song ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
276a5(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid du mos pa rnams yin/ so so mi rten pa rnams yin/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos
276a6(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs po rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'ang
276a7(mdo sde): mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yid du 'ang ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khrobar mi 'gyur ba
276b1(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par yang //
276b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang /
276b3(mdo sde): smad pas chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no//
276b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa dang /
276b5(mdo sde): mthong na dga' ba rnams dang / chos dkar po rnams skye bar byed pa dang / chos nag po rnams 'bri bar byed par dang / rab tu bsngags pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams
276b6(mdo sde): yin/ bzhon pa mchog la zhon pa rnams yin/ rtag tu brgyan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa rnams yin/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no// rig
276b7(mdo sde): kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas/ ji ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
277a1(mdo sde): dper na zla ba shar na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus bsil ba dang / yid du 'ong bar rab tu sim par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba
277a2(mdo sde): shar na'ang 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa dang / yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par
277a3(mdo sde): byed do/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba shar na 'di lta ste/ zhi ba dang / dang ba dang / sems shin tu dga' bar byed pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba yin no// de bzhin du
277a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba shar na'ang 'di lta ste/ dbang po rnam par gsal ba dang / sems kyi rgyud dang ba dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pas sems can
277a5(mdo sde): thams cad mthong na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo la zla ba nya ste/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par gyur kyi bar du nyi ma re re zhing 'phel lo//
277a6(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang thog ma sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel
277a7(mdo sde): zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar de rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba mar gyi ngo la bab pa dang /
277b1(mdo sde): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dang / snang ba dang / chu zheng yang yongs su 'bri ste/ bco lnga la ji ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems
277b2(mdo sde): dpa' zla ba yang nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa de ni/ de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du rab tu 'bri ste/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi snying po la thams cad
277b3(mdo sde): kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu 'bri'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba shar na bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang /
277b4(mdo sde): khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na yang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
277b5(mdo sde): khams rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi bsod nams kyi las rnam par smin pas grub pa ni yongs su dag pa ste/ rnyog
277b6(mdo sde): pa med cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste/ chos nyid kyis mngon par grub pa rdzus te skyes pa/ pha ma'i btsog pa dang mer mer po
277b7(mdo sde): las byung ba ma yin te/ yongs su dag la rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon te gling bzhir snang bar byed de/
278a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu
278a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu brgyan cing rgyan ma brnyings pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa yin no// rigs
278a3(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi dag
278a4(mdo sde): ba la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi/ 'dod pas dga' ba la dga' ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
278a5(mdo sde): zla ba yang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams chen po dang / ye shes chen pos 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par
278a6(mdo sde): byed nas/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
278a7(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ / byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba rnams yin/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnam par 'byed par
278b1(mdo sde): byed pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos mngon par shar ba rnams yin/ de dag gi zag pa nub par gyur pa rnams yin/ snang bar
278b2(mdo sde): byed pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i lus rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug pa rnams yin/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa kun ston pa rnams yin/ chos dkar po'i las kyi mtha'
278b3(mdo sde): thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yin/ skye bo dge ba la dga' ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas/ ji ltar skye bo dge ba
278b4(mdo sde): la dga' ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang ma rig pa'i
278b5(mdo sde): mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na pad+ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar ba na yang 'dul ba'i
278b6(mdo sde): sems can gyi pad+ma rnam par 'byed par byed do/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi mi shar na phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma sha
278b7(mdo sde): na yang phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi gzi brjid dang / ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu lhan ner byed kyang sems can rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
279a1(mdo sde): dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'i 'od zer dag nam snang ba de'i tshe na shar ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer rnams nam snang ba/
279a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe na/ dge ba'i chos rnams shar ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'i snang ba nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na nub ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub
279a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i nyi ma'i nyon mongs pa rnams thams cad du nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na/ zag pa zad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi
279a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams la snang bar byed do/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba byed cing / gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyis
279a5(mdo sde): khebs pa rnams sel to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na 'od thams cad kyi 'od med par byed kyang / nyi ma ni ngas 'od thams cad kyi 'od mi snang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems
279a6(mdo sde): mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang mu stegs can ngan pa'i 'od dang / mu stegs can ngan pa'i lus thams
279a7(mdo sde): cad 'ong med par 'gyur mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ni ngas 'di dag 'od med par bya'o snyam du mi sems te/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
279b1(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa legs par ston to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams
279b2(mdo sde): cad la ye shes kyi snang bas mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa legs par ston to/ / rigs kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu mi mnyam pa zhes bya/
279b3(mdo sde): ba 'di ni lam ngan pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na rmo brko'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang dge
279b4(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo / / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na skye bo dge ba ni dga' bar 'gyur la/ mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can dag mi dga' bar 'gyur ro//
279b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang skye bo dge ba rnams dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin can rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur ro// lam ngan par zhugs
279b6(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / byis pa'i rang bzhin dran rnams dang / shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga'
279b7(mdo sde): ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa'i rnams ni mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas/ skye bo
280a1(mdo sde): dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu/
280a2(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag mi tsha ba rnams yin/ mi rtab pa rnams yin/ mi zlogs pa rnams yin/ seng ge'i sgra//
280a3(mdo sde): bsgrags pa rnams yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yin/ nags tshal dang nags kyi mdab na rgyu ba rnams yin/ ri'i lug na gnas pa rnams yin/ len pa med pa rnams yin/ bdag gis brtson /
280a4(mdo sde): 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde rab tu 'jom pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tshang
280a5(mdo sde): nas/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni gar 'gro yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o// de bzhin
280a6(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas gar 'gro yang bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni wa thams cad kyi sgras mi rtab
280a7(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge yang bas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis brtsad pas brgal kyang mi rtab cing rgod pa dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper
280b1(mdo sde): ni seng ge ni bskugs na phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis bsgrags na mi zlog cing mi zhum par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di
280b2(mdo sde): ste/ dper na seng ge ni sgra gang gis ri dgas phra mo thams cad dang / wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag med
280b3(mdo sde): pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa gzhan mu stegs can gyi ri dgas rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyi wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta
280b4(mdo sde): bu sgrog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can gzhan dag 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par de dag la gnod par bya ba'i phyir bdag med
280b5(mdo sde): pa'i seng ge'i sgra mi sgrog go/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni kun tu lha yang mi 'jigs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i nan
280b6(mdo sde): tan la lta yang mi 'dzegs pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni rang bzhin gyis nags tshal dang nags kyi mdab na rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng
280b7(mdo sde): ge yang rang bzhin gyis dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing / nags tshal dang / nags kyi mdapa na spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni ri phug na gnas pa yin no//
281a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang ye shes kyi brag gi ri phrag na gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni mi len par 'gro ba yin no//
281a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang nyon mongs pa'i khur thams cad bor zhing len pa med par 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni gcig pu gnyis su med pa bdag
281a3(mdo sde): gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas pha rol gyi sde 'jom mo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang gcig pu gnyis su med par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas
281a4(mdo sde): bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde 'jom mo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na grong gi mngab na seng ge rgyu ba der ri dgas phra mo dag gis lo tog rnams
281a5(mdo sde): chud mi gson to/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug pa der mu stegs can gyi ri dgas phra mo dag gis dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog chud mi gzon
281a6(mdo sde): to/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bgra mi tsha ba nas/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
281a7(mdo sde): dpa' seng ge lta bu rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems
281b1(mdo sde): brtan pa rnams yin/ byang chub kyi sems kyi byi dor shin tu byas pa rnams yin/ dbang po bsdams pa rnams yin no// lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ khur chen po khyer ba rnams yin
281b2(mdo sde): sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pas 'tsho ba rnams yin/ tshul bcos pa dang / kha gsag gi rnyed pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo sgyu dang
281b3(mdo sde): bral ba rnams yin/ drang ba'i rang bzhin can pas drang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yin no//
281b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin
281b5(mdo sde): sgrib pa med cing kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyun ma chad pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mi gcog pas bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi
281b6(mdo sde): dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyis gdol bu lta bur 'jig rten na spyod pa rnams yin//
281b7(mdo sde): rtag tu rkun mi 'chad par bsod snyoms blang bar 'du shes nye bar gzhag pas/ nga rgyal ba dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di ltar de mngon sum du shes
282a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur med pa rnams yin/ chos rang gis rig pa'i phyir the tsom med pa rnams yin/ rang gi lam mthong bas gzhan gyi/
282a2(mdo sde): mi bkri zhing pha rol gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ rab tu zhugs pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
282a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma gos
282a4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ sdig pa chung ngu dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnams yin/ gtsang ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/ mi rtsub pa/
282a5(mdo sde): rnams yin/ mthong na bkra shis pa rnams yin/ blo rnam par bye ba rnams yin/ blo yongs su smin pa rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su bzung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la
282a6(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mgos pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni chu'i nang nas 'byung yang mi chags
282a7(mdo sde): par skye'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chu las 'byung yang mi chags par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
282b1(mdo sde): ltar de'i thabs dang shes rab kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba ni spyod kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pa dag gis mi gos te/ de'i thabs de ni shes/
282b2(mdo sde): rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma la chu'i theg pa chung ngu yang mi chags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa chung ngu yang mi
282b3(mdo sde): chags so/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa'i phyogs gang du pad+ma skyes par gyur pa'i sa phyogs de dris khyab par 'dug go// de bzhin du yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na byang chub
282b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni sa'i phyogs gar skyes pa'i sa phyogs de gtsang zhing bram ze
282b5(mdo sde): dang rnga rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gar skyes kyang rung / 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang /
282b6(mdo sde): gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang ba yin te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
282b7(mdo sde): mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams 'du ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no//
283a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni 'byen 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta bar snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
283a2(mdo sde): yang khro gnyer med cing dbang po shin tu dang bas bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing mi rtsub pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub
283a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing dal gyis smra ba yin/ mi brlang zhing mu cor mi slu ba'i rang bzhin can yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni rmi lam dang / lhas dang /
283a4(mdo sde): yud tsam dga' mthong na yang 'di lta ste/ don 'grub pa'i phyir bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya/
283a5(mdo sde): ba la dus thams cad du yang bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni nam rgyas pa de ni rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nam
283a6(mdo sde): shes rab dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog rgyas pa de ni blo rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni nam yongs su smin par gyur pa de ni/ bltas na mig gi dbang
283a7(mdo sde): po tshim par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po tshim par byed/ bsnams na sna'i dbang po tshim par byed/ myangs na lce'i dbang po tshim par byed/ reg na lus kyi dbang po tshim par byed/ sems
283b1(mdo sde): rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshim par byed do/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab kyi snang ba yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bltas na mig gi dbang po rnam par dag par
283b2(mdo sde): byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ tshul khrims dang yon tan gyi dri bsnams na sna 'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ myangs pa na lce'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/
283b3(mdo sde): reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byed na lus kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ yon tan rjod pa rnam par bsams pas yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na
283b4(mdo sde): pad+ma ni skye ba'i tshe 'di lta ste/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
283b5(mdo sde): dang / de ma yin pa gzhan brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa nas/ shin tu
283b6(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na
283b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems da' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yang dag par bsgrub bo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos
284a1(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/ / sems can thams cad gdul lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
284a2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
284a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang chos dang ldan par sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes sems rgya cher spyad do//
284a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par song ste/ sems can gyi don bya ba'i dngos po de dang de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// shes rab kyi gru sbyar
284a5(mdo sde): te/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las pha rol tu bsgral lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// mgon med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / rten med pa dang
284a6(mdo sde): dpung gnyen med pa dang / rtsa lag med pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtsa lag bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang //
284a7(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog nyid bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra sgrog go// sangs rgyas
284b1(mdo sde): kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par rtse'o/ / glang po che'i lta stangs kyis blta bar bya'o zhes sems rgya che bar skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi che bas sems can rnams gdul bar bya'i/ spyod pa
284b2(mdo sde): ngan pas ma yin/ dka' ba spyod pas ma yin/ zhan pa'i spyod pas ma yin/ zhum pa'i spyod pas ma yin no zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na//
284b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no// bcu gang
284b4(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mi g.yo bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa la sgyu med pas bsam pas shin tu gnas pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/
284b5(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi byed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / brtson 'grus chung ba'i yid la byed pa mi skyed pas tshul bzhin ma
284b6(mdo sde): yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ sku'i spyod lam dang bral bas
284b7(mdo sde): lus kyi tshul 'chos dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i don kun ston pas ngag gi tshul 'chos dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta s+t+wa~M/ lus kyis 'du 'dzi med par
285a1(mdo sde): nyid thob bo/ / chos nyid thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma bta/
285a2(mdo sde): pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub
285a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba
285a4(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang / theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan
285a5(mdo sde): pa dang / tshul sna tshogs bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi
285a6(mdo sde): bu de lta ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad pa nas/ ji ltar sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs
285a7(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so/ / gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang / zhi ba'i sku dang / mi mnyam pa'i sku dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
285b1(mdo sde): pa'i sku dang / tshad med pa'i sku dang / phal la med pa'i sku dang / rdo rje sku zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem/
285b2(mdo sde): nur med/ the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
285b3(mdo sde): gi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du lung ston pa dang / gsang ste lung ston/
285b4(mdo sde): pa dang / ldem po ngag gis kyang sems can rnams la lung ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa 'am/ ca co med de/ de'i phyir de la brdzun du smra ba'i nyes par
285b5(mdo sde): mi 'byung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyon thams cad spangs pa/ dri ma thams cad spangs pa/ rdul thabs cad spangs pa/ yongs su gdung ba thams cad
285b6(mdo sde): dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ zhi ba/ dang ba/ yongs su dag pa/ rnyog pa med pa rnam par gsal ba ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
285b7(mdo sde): 'khrul pa 'am/ ca co 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med do zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di de nem nu
286a1(mdo sde): ngag gis 'dod pa chung ba dang / sems kyis smon pa med pa'i phyir/ sems kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ cung zad byas pa yang chung mi gson na mang//
286a2(mdo sde): po lta ci smos te/ byas pa gzo ba rnams yin/ byas pa tshor ba rnams yin te/ dgos pa byas pa la mi smod/ mi smyung/ yon tan ma yin par mi lta ste/ gzhan du na cung zad
286a3(mdo sde): byas pa yang tshor zhing de la ston par byed/ gzengs stod par byed/ yang dag par dga' bar byed/ rab tu bsngags par byed/ de la yon tan du lta ba yin no// ji ltar lta ba de ltar
286a4(mdo sde): byed pa rnams yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis snyan par ston cing sems kyis mi mthun par sems pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis ston cing sems
286a5(mdo sde): kyis ngan du bya ba'i sbyor ba mi byed/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis 'jam par smra zhing sems kyis zhe la non te shar gnyer ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis nges pa
286a6(mdo sde): ston cing sems kyis 'khon gyi mdud par 'dzin pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mor bya ba ston cing sems kyis brnyas par byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
286a7(mdo sde): rnams tshul mi 'chos/ kha gsag mi byed/ ser sna dang phrag dog gis kun tu grags pa ma yin/ sgyu dang g.yos mi spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'thab sman mi byed/ phan tshun
286b1(mdo sde): du dpa' ba 'jug pa ma yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis kyang ri mo skyed pa yin/ ngag gis kyang yang dag pa'i don smra/ las su yang sgrub bo// byang chub sems
286b2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin no// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsta/
286b3(mdo sde): pa la skur ba ma btab pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag gon nas/
286b4(mdo sde): yang dag par dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo // de rab tu byung ba na rgyal pos mnar ba med par rab tu 'byung / rkun pos 'tshe ba med pa dang / bu lon gyis
286b5(mdo sde): 'tshe ba med pa dang / 'dzags pas 'tshe ba med pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa med par rab tu 'byung ngo // de dang de rab tu byung nas dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba yin te/ de
286b6(mdo sde): dge ba ci yin zhes tshol bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la snyen par byed/ sten par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed do// de dag las chos kyang nyan to// thos nas kyang nan tan du byed/
286b7(mdo sde): nga rgyal gyi zil gyis mnon pa yin te/ de nga rgyal dang bral bas ma log par 'dzin pa yin/ ma log par 'dzin pas lam shin tu rtogs pa thob bo// de lam shin tu rtogs pas chos
287a1(mdo sde): med/ the tsom med de/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gas//
287a2(mdo sde): ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pas ci dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa
287a3(mdo sde): sems la gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur pa ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
287a4(mdo sde): cad dang / sems cad thams cad kyis shes par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag bka' ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin
287a5(mdo sde): pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las shin tu 'das pa/ dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba/ yangs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa/ rtog ge thams cad kyi yul las 'das par thob pa 'di/
287a6(mdo sde): ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med pa yin te/ da ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la
287a7(mdo sde): mngon par dad do/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di byang chub kyi rgyu/
287b1(mdo sde): byang chub kyi gzhi/ byang chub kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon du phyogs dang / sems can gyi bya ba dang / sems can gyi byed pa dang / yongs
287b2(mdo sde): su mi skyo ba dang / mi skrag pa dang / khur chen po khyer ba dang / mthu bstan pa dang / brtul ba brtan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
287b3(mdo sde): rnams mthar gyis yang dag par sgrub pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i blo dang / mtha' yas pa'i blo dang / mi mnyam pa'i blo dang / phal la med pa'i blo dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa
287b4(mdo sde): dang / cho ga brtan pa dang / dam bcos pa las mi g.yo ba dang / dam bcas pa phal la med pa de dag thams cad rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par yongs su rdzogs par
287b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ / 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
287b6(mdo sde): yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dad do/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so//
287b7(mdo sde): gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas/ lha'i mig chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa thob bo// lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang //
288a1(mdo sde): sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / dus gsum pa skad cig gcig pa dang ldan
288a2(mdo sde): pas shes pa/ chags pa med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa thob bo// de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ste/ sems can 'di rnams ni
288a3(mdo sde): lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa/ log par lta ba rnams te/ log
288a4(mdo sde): par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi nges lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag
288a5(mdo sde): tu skye'o/ / sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa
288a6(mdo sde): la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ yang dag par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus zhig nas
288a7(mdo sde): bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha'i nang du skye'o snyam nas de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams la bltas te/ sems can gyi khams de nyid dge ba dang mi dge ba'i
288b1(mdo sde): las rnams la rnam par lta'o/ / de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas/ gzhan yang
288b2(mdo sde): rnam par sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa'i bdag gi smon lam de yongs su rdzogs so/ / bdag gi brnag pa de yongs su rdzogs so zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho
288b3(mdo sde): na'o/ / 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par sangs rgyas pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o// bdag nyid rnam
288b4(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pas des na rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub
288b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di theg pa ni gcig kho na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o zhes thos pa 'di ni ya
288b6(mdo sde): dag pa'o/ / 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// 'di ni de bzhin no// ma nor ba'o// gzhan ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa gzhan rnams kyang 'di las 'byung ngo //
288b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling na gang gling yod pa rnams ming gis tha dad par shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'du'o// 'dzam bu'i gling la rton po//
289a1(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi grangs su 'gro'o// de'i phyir na gling gcig kho na ste/ 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling ngo // de bzhin du theg pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par
289a2(mdo sde): 'du'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ngo // de'i phyir theg pa ni gcig pa kho na ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg
289a3(mdo sde): pa'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul ba kun pa la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na tshul sna tshogs
289a4(mdo sde): bshad pa thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ / 'di na de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can
289a5(mdo sde): rnams la chos ston to snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems
289a6(mdo sde): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo thos pa 'di ni yang
289a7(mdo sde): dag pa'o/ / 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyi dbyangs kyang zab cing snyan pa yin na/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar dge ba'i rtsa
289b1(mdo sde): ba bsgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lta ci smos snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i
289b2(mdo sde): dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad do/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so//
289b3(mdo sde): gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa dang bag la nyal mkhyen te/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang / 'dul ba tha dad pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs gcig brjod pas/ the tsom
289b4(mdo sde): gcod cing yongs su smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul lo/ / sems can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs
289b5(mdo sde): pa bdag la chos ston to snyam byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas
289b6(mdo sde): 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de
289b7(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu da ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba rnams
290a1(mdo sde): yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ rgya che zhing tshad med/
290a2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ bags kyis gzhol ba rnams yin// nyon mongs pa'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug pa rnams yin/ ro gcig pa rnams yin/ chu bo kun bzed pa rnams yin/
290a3(mdo sde): dus las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'byung po mang po'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ mi zad pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i
290a4(mdo sde): 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na mi zad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/
290a5(mdo sde): 'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad kyis rin po che blang bas mi zad do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sems can thams
290a6(mdo sde): cad kyis yon tan rin po che blang bas mi zad do/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
290a7(mdo sde): dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang zab cing sems can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di lta ste/ chu tshad
290b1(mdo sde): med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ blo tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper/
290b2(mdo sde): na rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol/ bags kyis 'bab/ bags kyis bab bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/ thams cad
290b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig tu mi 'dug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
290b4(mdo sde): ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i ro dang mi dge ba'i grogs po rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub
290b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i chos nyid do/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen por chu bo ji snyed 'bab pa de thams cad kyang ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ lan tshwa'i ro'o// de bzhin
290b6(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa'i yang chos dkar po rnams ji snyed sdud pa de thams cad ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya/
290b7(mdo sde): mtsho chen po ni chu bo tshad med pa kun bzed kyang de la bri ba 'am/ gang bar yang mi mngon no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad med pa kun bzed kyang de la bri ba
291a1(mdo sde): 'am/ gang bar mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dus lus mi yol lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dul bar
291a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus las mi yol lo/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'byung po mang po'i gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems
291a3(mdo sde): dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang / chos dkar po thams cad kyi gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can thams cad kyis chu bcus kyang mi zad
291a4(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos ston pa mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa
291a5(mdo sde): nas/ mi zad pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu
291a6(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad brtag pa la mkhas pa
291a7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad yongs su
291b1(mdo sde): shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams yin// /
291b2(mdo sde): smras pa'i don shes pa rnams yin/ don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yin/ de kho na la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
291b3(mdo sde): dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar spyod de/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa
291b4(mdo sde): 'di ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar ro// rab tu 'bar ro// kun tu rab tu 'bar ro// kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang gi du ba
291b5(mdo sde): 'khrigs pa'i du ba 'tshubs pas rnam par rmongs so/ / kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa ni 'di lta ste/ gti mug gi mun pas mun nag tu gyur to snyam mo// de na 'di lta ste/ sems can 'di
291b6(mdo sde): dag ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/ de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su tshol zhing chos thams cad la rtog go// chos thams cad la rtog pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa
291b7(mdo sde): nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos rnam
292a1(mdo sde): sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / chos thams cad yang dag pa'i/
292a2(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems so// de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems pas/ las bsam gyis mi khya
292a3(mdo sde): pa la rnam par rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/ las sna tshogs snang ba ni ngo mtshar to snyam du sems so// de ltar de blo zhib mo dang ldan pas sangs rgyas
292a4(mdo sde): rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsungs pa tsam gyis don shes so// des don shes pas don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs so// don yang dag pa ji
292a5(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas de kho na mthong ngo / / des de kho na mthong bas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i btson ra nas thar par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
292a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba tshol bA la mkhas pa nas/ de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no//
292a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bdag
292b1(mdo sde): med par 'jog go/ / chos thams cad sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa dang //
292b2(mdo sde): shes pa po med pa dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gso ba ste dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dang rkyen las byung bar 'jog ste/
292b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rig pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// chos thams cad sems can med pa/ srog med pa zhes bya ba ni/
292b4(mdo sde): rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po
292b5(mdo sde): med pa dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dang / rkyen las byung ba'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs
292b6(mdo sde): pa'o/ / 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang chos nyid dang 'thun pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid las mi
292b7(mdo sde): 'khrul pa de ni rigs pa'o/ / gang chos nyid la 'bab pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid ston pa de ni rigs pa'o// de yang de dag la spobs pas na de'i phyir rigs pas spobs
293a1(mdo sde): rnams zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i stobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi/
293a2(mdo sde): bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi
293a3(mdo sde): zad pa rnams yin/ spobs pa rgyun chags pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi btabs rnams yin/ spobs pa ma zhum pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi skrag pa rnams yin/
293a4(mdo sde): spobs pa phal la med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa zil gyi ma non pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i spobs pa
293a5(mdo sde): can rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na
293a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dar 'dar po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi 'khrul pa'i spob
293a7(mdo sde): pa can rnams yin/ mi gzhan pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ yang yeng po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ de dag gi spobs pa don dang bral ba ma yin/ tshig 'bru dang bral
293b1(mdo sde): ba ma yin/ sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin/ dus dang bral ba ma yin/ rtsub pa ma yin/ mi gsal ba'i spobs pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs
293b2(mdo sde): pa'angar 'dar po ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor gyi 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin no// de ci'i
293b3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ blo brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi zhan pa rnams yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/
293b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gyi nang du phyin na mi 'jigs mi skrag ste/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi dngang ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams/
293b5(mdo sde): kyi spobs pa yang yang po med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spobs pa ni yang yeng por 'gyur ba
293b6(mdo sde): yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te//
293b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi don dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma
294a1(mdo sde): yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhen/ bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu bsnyun bcos kyi phyogs 'ga' shes pa rnams kyi na nI/
294a2(mdo sde): 'bru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i
294a3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu sbyor ba la mi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa rnams
294a4(mdo sde): kyi ni ma yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni gang phyis smra bar bya ba de ni sngar smra ba 'am/ gang sngar smra bar bya ba de phyis smra ba lta bur dus dang bral ba ma yin no// de
294a5(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dus shes pa yin/ tshod shes pa yin/ dus shes pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong/
294a6(mdo sde): ba mi snyan pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngag gi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi spongs pa ni rtsub pa yin gyi/ gnas
294a7(mdo sde): ngan len dang bral ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu
294b1(mdo sde): dbang po rtul ba rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba yin gyi/ dbang po rnon po rnams kyi ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i
294b2(mdo sde): spobs pa can rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu//
294b3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin/ don du smra ba rnams yin/ chos su smra ba rnams yin/ mtshungs
294b4(mdo sde): par smra ba rnams yin/ mi ngom pa rnams yin/ brnyas pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa rnams yin/ 'khrugs pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs
294b5(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni 'jam par smra ba sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' ni bzhin 'dzum zhing
294b6(mdo sde): khro gnyer med pa yin te/ mdangs bzang pos sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' don du smra ba ni tshig ran pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do//
294b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos su smra ba ni phan par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par smra ba ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par
295a1(mdo sde): chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' mi ngom pa ni nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshungs
295a2(mdo sde): pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa dang bral ba ni ri mor byas shing chos bstan pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems
295a3(mdo sde): dpa' nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa ni/ ngang tshul nges pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med pa ni bzod pa mang bas sems can rnams
295a4(mdo sde): mgu bar byed do/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs can ni dga' ba'i tshig sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/
295a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshig bzung ba
295a6(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos mi ston te/ zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/ klan
295a7(mdo sde): ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/ mu stegs can rnams la ma yin/ ri mo med pa rnams la ma yin/ ma dad pa mang ba rnams la ma yin/ g.yo dang sgyus glags pa rnams la yin/
295b1(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can rnams la ma yin/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / phrag dog dang / ser snas glags pa rnams la ma yin/ sems can glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkug
295b2(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chos mi ston to/ / rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna yang med/ chos la slob dpon 'chab pa yang medado/
295b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la ri mor mi byed pa yang med/ sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa yang med mod kyi/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snod
295b4(mdo sde): du ma gyur pa'o zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems can ci 'dra ba
295b5(mdo sde): rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can dad pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas rnams
295b6(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa rnams dang / snod du gyur pa rnams dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang /
295b7(mdo sde): g.yo med pa rnams dang / sgyu med pa rnams dang / spyod lam mi 'chos pa rnams dang / rnyed pa dang / bikur ste la chags pa dang bral ba rnams dang / bsam pa phun sum
296a1(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa rnams dang / tshul bzang po dang ldan pa rnams dang / legs par ston nus pa
296a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / dbang po rno ba gang bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grub brtsam pa de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin byed par
296a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu dag la/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
296a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshig gzung ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
296a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so// pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos
296a6(mdo sde): ston kyang pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so/ / byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so//
296a7(mdo sde): mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang nyon mongs pa spang ba yang mi dmigs so// skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa'i phyir chos ston kyang skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba/
296b1(mdo sde): dang 'gog pa yang mi dmigs so// rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rgyun du zhugs pa yang mi dmigs
296b2(mdo sde): so/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba yang mi dmigs/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang
296b3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rang sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang mi
296b4(mdo sde): dmigs so/ / bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa yang mi dmigs/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'jog mod kyi/ las dang las
296b5(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa yang mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos gang ming gang gis brjod pa de ming des yod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos
296b6(mdo sde): nyid ni yi ge'i rang bzhin ma yin/ yi ge rnams ni chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ma yin mod kyi/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten/ tha snyad la brten/ brtags pa de la brten te/ ming med pa'i
296b7(mdo sde): chos rnams la ming du 'jog ste/ ming de yang gsob bo// gsog go// gang gsob dang gsog de la don dam pa med do// gang la don dam pa med pade brdzun te/ slu ba'i chos so//
297a1(mdo sde): gang brdzun zhing smra ba'i chos de ni byis pa'i skye bo slu ba'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no//
297a2(mdo sde): / dkon mchog sbyin bam po lnga pa// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no//
297a3(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la/ gzugs las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ tshor ba dang /
297a4(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ 'dod pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la
