297a5(mdo sde): gzugs kyi khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ gzugs med pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ chos las kyang mi 'byung /
297a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ chos las 'das par yang mi 'gyur/ chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ sems can gyi phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ chang par lta ba'i
297a7(mdo sde): phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ lam las kyang mi 'byung ste/ de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldanan/
297b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no//
297b2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab can rnams yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yongs su bzung ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa thams cad
297b3(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ dmigs par lta ba
297b4(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ de kho na mthong ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen
297b5(mdo sde): tshol te/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas dka' zhing rangs te/ de la ston par 'du shes skyed cing de la brten te gnas so// de dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pas nu//
297b6(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtsams pas na sgrib
297b7(mdo sde): pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro/ / sgrib pa med cing lam gyi rgyun ma chad pas shin tu yongs su dag cing lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
298a1(mdo sde): de shin tu yongs su dag pas gdam ga la ri mo dang bcas pa yin no// de gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba yin no// stong pa
298a2(mdo sde): nyid la sgom pa mang bas dmigs pa'i lta bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de dmigs pa'i lta ba dang bral bas lam du 'jug go// de lam du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo // byang chub sems
298a3(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na zhes bgyi ba de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
298a4(mdo sde): de kho na zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dgas so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
298a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gang mi slu ba de ni yang dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi slu ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma
298a6(mdo sde): nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
298a7(mdo sde): kyi bu chos 'di ni so so rang gis rig pa yin/ 'di ni yi ge dag gis gdams par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ smra ba
298b1(mdo sde): thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ tshig gi spyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ ngag gi lam thams cad las dag par 'dus pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/ blang bdang /
298b2(mdo sde): dor ba thams cad dang bral ba/ phye ba dang btsum pa thams cad dang bral ba/ rtog ge thams cad dang bral ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul
298b3(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i yul las 'das pa/ byis pa'i
298b4(mdo sde): spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ bdud thams cad kyi yul las yang drag par 'das pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rnam
298b5(mdo sde): par shes pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas pa ma yin pa/ mi gnas pa/ zhi ba/ 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul te/ de dag nyid kyi so so rang gis
298b6(mdo sde): rig pa/ dri ma med pa mgos pa dang / rnam par dag pa/ gya nom pa/ mchog dam pa/ phul rtag pa dang brtan pa/ ther zug mi 'jig pa'i chos can yin te/ de bzhin
298b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings 'di ni 'dug pa kho na'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid thos nas/ sems can dag
299a1(mdo sde): kyang chos nyid 'di kho na la rab tu dgod do snyam ste/ don gang gi phyir 'bad cing rtsol ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dka' ba brgya dag byed pa/ rigs kyi bu/
299a2(mdo sde): de ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
299a3(mdo sde): dbyings zhes bya'o/ / gnyis su med pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ji ltar
299a4(mdo sde): mngon du bgyi/ ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis mngon du bya'o// rang gis rig
299a5(mdo sde): par khong du chud par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyis mngon du bgyi ba de/ rang gis rig pa
299a6(mdo sde): khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyis ni chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba
299a7(mdo sde): bzhin du mthong ngo / / lus kyis ni mngon du byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang dag
299b1(mdo sde): gis thos pa las byung ba 'am/ bsam pa las byung ba'i shes pas khong du chud bar gyur pa de rang gis rig pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyis
299b2(mdo sde): ma yin te/ thos pa tsam mam/ bsam pa tsam gyis ni rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
299b3(mdo sde): dper na 'brog chen por sos ka'i zla ba tha la mi la la zhig shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'gro la/ de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ong ste/ de yang sos ka'i
299b4(mdo sde): tsha bas yongs su gdungs par gyur nas skom gyis nyen pa de/ shar phyogs nas 'ong ba'i mi de la 'di skad ces smras pa/ kye skyes bu kho bo sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs te
299b5(mdo sde): skom gyis nyen na/ gang na mtsho'am/ lteng ka 'am/ rdzing gang chub sil ba dang rnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba yod de/ gang du bdag tsha ba dang skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
299b6(mdo sde): ba'i lam bdag la ston cig ces zer la/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de yang lam shes pa/ lam la mkhas pa/ lam mthong ba/ lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig
299b7(mdo sde): yin te/ des na chu'i zhes pa dang bral ba'i chu sngan chad mthong la/ sngon myangs shing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te/ des mi de la 'di skad du kye grogs po lam 'di nas la ma kha brag
300a1(mdo sde): mthong gi bar du song la kye skye bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam bor te/ g.yas kyi lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang nags tshal de'i dbus na/ mtsho 'am/ lteng ka 'a
300a2(mdo sde): rdzing chu bsil zhing dang brnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la/ der skyes bu khyod sgom pa dang / tsha ba med par byos shig ces zer na/ rigs kyi bu khyod ji snyam du
300a3(mdo sde): sems/ sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/ skom gyis nyen pa'i mi nges/ chu thos ma thag dang / bsams pa tsam gyis tsha ba med par 'gyur ram/ skom pa dang bral bar 'gyur
300a4(mdo sde): ram/ chu de'i bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das mi de nam der phyin nas/ nges chu der zhugs te 'tshal bar
300a5(mdo sde): gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi de tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro// des bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
300a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du rigs kyi bu thos pa tsam dang / bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so// de la rigs kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba de ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gi tshig bla dgas so//
300a7(mdo sde): mi sos ka'i tshabs yongs su gdungs shing skom gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas yongs su gdungs shing / yul gyi sred pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshig bla
300b1(mdo sde): dgas so/ / lam shes pa'i mi zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam lam bas pa chos myong ba chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// chubs
300b2(mdo sde): zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa/ gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// yang rigs kyi bu dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ gal te de bzhin
300b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/ lha'i bdud rtsi dri zhim pa dang / gtsang ba dang / gya nom pa dang / shin tu zhim pa ba reg na bde ba las
300b4(mdo sde): brtsams te bsngags par brjod na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ TI sems can de dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi de'i bsngags par rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
300b5(mdo sde): ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sngal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam mam/ bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong
300b6(mdo sde): du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu yang dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig shing thog gi rnam par sngon sems can sus kyang ma myangs pa zhig myang
300b7(mdo sde): par gyur la/ des mi gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing thog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta ste/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum tshogs pa dang / dri zhim pa las brtsam
301a1(mdo sde): te brjod na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ ci mi nges shing thog gi ro de rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan
301a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam mam/ bsams pa tsam gyis so so rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par
301a3(mdo sde): rig par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu leg
301a4(mdo sde): par gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi tshul 'di su dag gi rnar thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gi chos 'di khong du chud pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
301a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gi chos 'di thob par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de
301a6(mdo sde): bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob par bya ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings
301a7(mdo sde): la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stobs
301b1(mdo sde): kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid
301b2(mdo sde): kyang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab
301b3(mdo sde): tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ don dam pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes te/
301b4(mdo sde): de'i rgyu dang / de'i rkyen de dang / gzhi des stong pa nyid du dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyidi la gnas pa'ang mi dmigs/ rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi nges med
301b5(mdo sde): par yang mi lhung ngo / / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na
301b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams
301b7(mdo sde): yin/ / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo ba thams cad dang
302a1(mdo sde): bral ba rnams yin/ smra ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa rnams
302a2(mdo sde): yin/ rnam par byang bar bya ba'i dngos po mi dmigs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no//
302a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma ma
302a4(mdo sde): mchis pa la gnas pa yang de 'dra na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ci 'dra bar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam gyi mi khyab bo// /
302a5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su bsam pa na/ sems can thams cad mos par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin
302a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyi pha rol lam tshu rol mthong bar mi 'gyur/ mi dmigs te/ tha mar na dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
302a7(mdo sde): pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' la bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ rtog ge ba thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa/ dmigs pa can
302b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa ste/ de ni brtag pa'am/ bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
302b2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
302b3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes khyod kyis dris shig/ byang chub
302b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bdag stod na ni bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsungs na de ji ltar chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das nyid
302b5(mdo sde): bdag la bstod pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyis dri ba tshul bzhin du dris so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu
302b6(mdo sde): nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ / bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom
302b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag la ci nas kyang phan pa dang / bde ba dang / chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag spong
303a1(mdo sde): pa ma gtogs par/ nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa dang / rnyed pa'i zil gyis non pa dang / bkur sti'i zil gyis non pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / shes kyi khe 'dod
303a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir tshul 'chos pa'am/ kha gsag med cing yang dag pa ma yin par bdag stod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / dad pa
303a3(mdo sde): dang / rangs pa nye bar bzhag pas chos bstan pa skal ba yod par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/ de yang de dag la yun ring por don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro//
303a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sems can 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma 'tshal tam/ bcom ldan
303a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni rgya chung ngu la mos pa/ dman tshegs la mos pa/
303a6(mdo sde): shes rab chung ba/ dad pa chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus brtan pa dag ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi shes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi yon tan
303a7(mdo sde): gyi bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad de/ de'ang nan gyis sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la/ sems can rnams kyang nad kyis nyen par gyur/ sa'i
303b1(mdo sde): phyogs de na'ang sman pa de gcig pur zad de/ gnyis su med la/ de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang mi shes pa dang / de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag/
303b2(mdo sde): ni sdug bsngal ba/ nad kyi nyen pa/ sman la mi mkhas pa gnod pa la sten pa yin gyis/ bdag gis de dag gso bar bya'o snyam nas/ sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du/ kye
303b3(mdo sde): sems can dag bdag ni sman pa ste nad la mkhas pa'o/ / nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa'o// sman la mkhas pa'o zhes bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa dang / sems
303b4(mdo sde): can de dag 'di ni sman pa'o zhes bya bar shes shing / yid ches par gyur nas sman pa de la rten to// de nas sman pa de sems can de dag gso zhing nad de zhi bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu
303b5(mdo sde): de ji snyam du sems/ sman pa de bdag la stod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin
303b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa yang sman pa'i rgyal po chen po bla na med pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i nad la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad gso' la mkhas
303b7(mdo sde): pachos kyi sman pa chen po stobs pa yin kyang / nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis na bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis mi shes te/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems
304a1(mdo sde): can rnams gzigs nas/ de dag gi mdun du bdag gi yon tan dang bsngags pa bdag nyid brjod de/ de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par 'gyur ba'i sems can de
304a2(mdo sde): dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i che ba thos nas yid ches par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rten to// de nas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal
304a3(mdo sde): po chen pos chos kyi sman de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar mdzad de/ chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa dang / byams pa dang / rten
304a4(mdo sde): cing 'brel par 'byung la sogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ bdag la bdag nyid stong pa mdzad do// rigs kyi bu chos
304a5(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa la smon kyang sbyin pa la gnas pa rnams
304a6(mdo sde): yin/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / khams gsum pa dang / byang chub dang / lam dang / mya ngan las
304a7(mdo sde): 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas thams cad dang bral ba ste/ mi gnas par
304b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par spyod do/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba rnams yin no//
304b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyi tshe ba med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/
304b3(mdo sde): tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nges par rtog pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod pa med pa'i byams pa
304b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phan pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i byams pa dang /
304b5(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
304b6(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can
304b7(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dang / skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / rten meng pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dag mthong na//
305a1(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub tu sems bskyed/ chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad rtsol/ brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ dka' bar spyod pa brgya dag kyang
305a2(mdo sde): byed do/ / de dag chos thob nas sems can rnams la phan par byed do// 'di lta ste/ sems can ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la gzhog par byed/ tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams tshul
305a3(mdo sde): khrims la/ gnod sems can rnams bzod pa la/ le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la/ sems 'khrug pa rnams bsam gtan la/ sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams mthong nas/
305a4(mdo sde): shes rab la gzhol bar byed kyang / sems can gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba dag gis nyen cing / byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang /
305a5(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no//
305a6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni 'khor ba'i btson ra rab tu 'bar ba nas byung ba'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gis 'khor ba'i dpyang thag yun ring po nas thogs pa chod do zhes
305a7(mdo sde): dga' ba skyed do/ / bdag ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po'i chu srin gyis dkrug pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gis yun ring po nas bsgreng ba'i nga
305b1(mdo sde): rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bskal lo zhes rab tu dga' bskyed do/ / bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ ji ltar rdul kyang mi snang ba de ltar bcom mo zhes rab tu
305b2(mdo sde): dga' ba skyed do/ / bdag nyid ni dbugs phyin pa yin gyis/ da ni gzhan yang dbugs dbyung bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni 'jig rten gnas pa yun ring po nas gnyi
305b3(mdo sde): la sred pa'i snyom pas yongs su zin pa gti mug gis yongs su bsgribs pa'i nang nas sad pa yin gyi/ da ni gzhan yang rnam par sad par bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid
305b4(mdo sde): ni ngan 'gro dang / dran song dang / log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba yin gyis/ da ni gzhan yang ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par lhung ba thams cad las rnam
305b5(mdo sde): par grol bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ / bdag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par yun ring po nas 'khyam ste/ grogs med cing gnyis su med par yang yang 'khyam zhing /
305b6(mdo sde): lam la mkhas pa/ lam mi shes shing yul mi shes pas lam stor ba rnyed do zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to zhes
305b7(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang
306a1(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams
306a2(mdo sde): la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams kyis smras par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ba rnams dang /
306a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes
306a4(mdo sde): par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams
306a5(mdo sde): kyis smas par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la btang
306a6(mdo sde): snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis smras par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/
306a7(mdo sde): rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ de dag la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa skyed cing de dag 'di
306b1(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bsgral bar bya ba de dag nyid brgal bar gyur te zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/
306b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol
306b3(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shi 'pho 'ang ston/ skye ba'ang ston/ btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na rtse ba'i ston/ mngon par byung ba yang ston/ dka' ba spyod
306b4(mdo sde): pa'ang ston/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang ston/ bdud 'dul ba'ang ston/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ston/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'ang ston/ yongs su mya ngan
306b5(mdo sde): las 'das pa chen po'ang ston to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
306b6(mdo sde): rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas/ shi 'pho ston pa nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston pa 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das
306b7(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas/ sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa yod pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las khyang zhugs pa/
307a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten kun gyi phul du byung ba mi nyams pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis ma gos ma chags pa/ shi 'pho
307a2(mdo sde): bar mthong na rtag pa'i 'du shes ldog cing mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la gnas pas bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pan
307a3(mdo sde): sems can gang dag bag med par spyod pa yod pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba yod/ dad pa yod/ rang ba yod kyang yul la mngon par zhen pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du
307a4(mdo sde): mi 'dod/ mi sten/ bsnyen bkur mi byed cing / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bzhugs la/ bdag cag kyang 'khod de dus kyang ring du yod kyis 'dong bar bya'o snyam
307a5(mdo sde): du sems pa/ de dag gi bag med pa zlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho ston te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho mthong nas/ skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing / de dag
307a6(mdo sde): skyo bar gyur nas bag med pa mi byed de/ bag yod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag skye bas 'dul ba yod pa de dag
307a7(mdo sde): gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa'i mthu mthong na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar 'gyur ste/ de dag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur/
307b1(mdo sde): ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du chos ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang
307b2(mdo sde): na 'dug pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / byis
307b3(mdo sde): pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na 'dug pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag
307b4(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba ston cing rab tu 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
307b5(mdo sde): ma yin la sogs pa spyod pa dman pa la mos pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba'i spyod pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / mu stegs can gzhin
307b6(mdo sde): tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag gis yun ring po nas bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por
307b7(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i tshe/ mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa yod pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston la/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'
308a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba la so so'i tshul bzhin du mchod pa byed do/ / de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
308a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas rlom pa yod de/ de dag de las bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po
308a3(mdo sde): la 'dug cing / bdud btul ba ston to// sems can gang zhi ba la gnas pa de dag las gong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
308a4(mdo sde): ston to/ / gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgra sna tshogs dang / ca co sna tshogs gang yod pa de
308a5(mdo sde): dag thams cad med cing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang zhi bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis mthu de mthong nas bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po la 'khod do// bla na
308a6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs so/ / rigs kyi bu sems can gang ston par bkur ba dang / ston par khas 'che la/
308a7(mdo sde): de dag gis 'byung ba dang / phyi ma'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar gcod pa dang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin cing snod du gyur pa rnams
308b1(mdo sde): la lam bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ ka shi ka'i grong rdal du song nas lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor
308b2(mdo sde): le skor ro/ / rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba yod de/ de dag 'dul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston te/
308b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyu/ 'di ni rkyen te/ des byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas/ shi 'pho ston cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston to// rigs kyi
308b4(mdo sde): bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam pa rol pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
308b5(mdo sde): mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba'i chos las phyir ldog pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las mi
308b6(mdo sde): 'da' ba rnams yin/ ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams yin/ bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa
308b7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub
309a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye zhing / de dag tu skyes nas kyang / tshor ba mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba/
309a2(mdo sde): yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ba'am/ yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la gnos pa'i sems skyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur/
309a3(mdo sde): gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar na de na sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
309a4(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las mi 'da' ba gang gis dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba'am/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar
309a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba med do/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni gang ser sna 'gyur ba rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des yi dgas kyi nang du skye zhing / de dag tu skyes nas kyang yi dgas kyi sdug
309a6(mdo sde): bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa myong bar 'gyur ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du skyes pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa thob pa'i rkyen dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i log par
309a7(mdo sde): lta ba'i rigs su mi skye'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sngon spyad pa ste/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa yin pas de dag yang dag par lta ba'i rig su skye ba
309b1(mdo sde): yin te/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang rkyen phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing / rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / rangs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
309b2(mdo sde): ni dbang po ma tshang ba'i rnam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du mi rung bar 'gyur bar dbang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni
309b3(mdo sde): bsod nams bya ba la brtson zhing bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun la bya ba gang byas shing bsnyen pa dang /
309b4(mdo sde): bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas pas/ dbang po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya ba de dang de dag byed cing / dbang po phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
309b5(mdo sde): snod du 'gyur ba yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na sems can blun po rmongs pa lug ltar lkugs pa'i ngang tshul can/ skal ba med pa/ legs par bshad
309b6(mdo sde): pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par bya ba'i mthu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi
309b7(mdo sde): 'dzin padag gi nang du mi skye'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus kyi yul gang na sems can dbang po rno ba/ dbang po gsal ba/ mkhas pa mkhas par bkur ba/ skal ba yod pa/ leg
310a1(mdo sde): par bshad pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don yongs su shes par bya ba'i mthu yod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa/ mar 'dzin pa/ phar 'an pa
310a2(mdo sde): dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/ bram zer 'dzin pa dag gi nang du skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang
310a3(mdo sde): na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes pa du ma 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i
310a4(mdo sde): khams nyid du gang na sems can gdul bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod pa skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'
310a5(mdo sde): rnams ni gang na sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu mi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni//
310a6(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gan
310a7(mdo sde): de lta bu dag thos kyang skyo ba mi mang ba dang / dmu rgod kyi ngang tshul can ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas 'di lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skyo bar gyur nas mi dge ba'i chos 'di
310b1(mdo sde): dag spang ba'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams/
310b2(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo dang sgyu med de drang zhing
310b3(mdo sde): gya gyu med la sems dang ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / de 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la yid gnyis dang / nem nur dang / the tsom med pa rnams yin/ chos la slob
310b4(mdo sde): dpon gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyi ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi mtha' dang bral ba rnams yin/ ji skad du smras pa de
310b5(mdo sde): lta bur byed de mi slu ba rnams yin/ theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ de yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la chos dang mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis zhes dang ri mo dang
310b6(mdo sde): bcas pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po la gzhol/ theg pa chen po la 'bab/ theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes pa dang /
310b7(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no//
311a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/
311a2(mdo sde): rnams yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med pa rnams yin/ dga' ba mang
311a3(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin/ rdzus te skye ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgya/
311a4(mdo sde): mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dam pa'i chos la rim gro yod cing bkur sti yod pa yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la rim gro yod cing
311a5(mdo sde): bkur sti yod pa yin te/ rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang ngo // klog go/ kun chub par byed do// gzhan
311a6(mdo sde): la yang rgya cher ston to/ / de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pas/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs
311a7(mdo sde): su dag pas 'gyod pa med pa yin te/ de yang rim gro med pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// 'gyod pa med pas sgrib pa med pa yin/ sgra bi pa med pas
311b1(mdo sde): dga' ba mang ba yin/ dga' ba mang bas sgom pa mang ba yin/ sgom pa mang bas sems mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// sems mnyam par bzhag pas 'gro ba yongs su dag/
311b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ 'gro ba yongs su dag pas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ rdzus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa rmongs pa yin no// rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa'i phyir tshe rabs dran pa
311b3(mdo sde): yin te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran no// gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu nas/ tshe rabs brgya
311b4(mdo sde): stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/
311b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dran pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin
311b6(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ dge 'dun mchod cing bsnyen bkur dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par smra ba dang / phyag
311b7(mdo sde): bya ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ mang du thos pa'i gang zag chos smra ba rnams dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa
312a1(mdo sde): mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ / byang chub kyi phyogs chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin
312a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
312a3(mdo sde): dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin ni//
312a4(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o// lta ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs
312a5(mdo sde): pa dang / cho ga nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / le lo
312a6(mdo sde): can gyi gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / khyim pa dang
312a7(mdo sde): sten pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' des gnas
312b1(mdo sde): 'di dag rnam par spangs pa'i tshe/ gang zag de dag la zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o// khong khro ba'i sems dang / brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'i/ des 'di ltar
312b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sems can rnams ni khams so sor ston te/ sten par gyur nas chud za bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal gyis/ de bas na bdag gis ston pa yongs su
312b3(mdo sde): spangs par sems nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no//
312b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa rnams
312b5(mdo sde): yin/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ lus rma med pa rnams yin/ lus legs par sgrub pa rnams yin/ chos kyi lus rnams yin/ lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting
312b6(mdo sde): dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams yin/ lus zhi ba rnams yin/ lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/ ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no//
312b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
313a1(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/
313a2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi mi mnyam pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
313a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ngab mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro// sa gnyis pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir lus yongs su dag pa 'thob bo//
313a4(mdo sde): sa gsum pa la byang chub sems dpa' khro ba dang gnod sems thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir lus rma med pa thob bo// sa bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub
313a5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir lus legs par grub pa thob bo/ / sa lnga pa la byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos kyi lus 'thob bo// sa drug pa la brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing
313a6(mdo sde): gting dpag dka' ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba 'thob bo/ / sa bdun pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa dang / thabs
313a7(mdo sde): mkhas pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob bo/ / sa brgyad pa la spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir lus zhi ba 'thob bo//
313b1(mdo sde): sa dgu pa la lus tshad med pas khyab pa'i phyir lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob bo// sa bcu pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus 'thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes par bya/
313b2(mdo sde): ba thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos
313b3(mdo sde): nyid dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi chos nyid la tha dad du bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lus tha dad pas tha dad du bya ba med de/ yon tan gyi
313b4(mdo sde): mthus ni tha dad du bya ba yod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lus tha dad pas tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis la/ yon tan gyi
313b5(mdo sde): mthus tha dad du bgyi ba mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lus lus zhes bya ba 'di ni tha dad pa med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus lus su brjod pa'i mtshan
313b6(mdo sde): nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/ / yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad par blta'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lha
313b7(mdo sde): bur yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad du blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas ni don 'di nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di
314a1(mdo sde): lta ste/ dper na byi dor ma byas pa'i nor bu rin po che dang / byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che ni 'di lta ste/ nor bu rin po che nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba nor bu rin po che'i grangs su 'gro
314a2(mdo sde): mod kyi/ ji ltar byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che mthu dang yid du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa ltar ni/ byi dor ma byas pa ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che yang de
314a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dang bcas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
314a4(mdo sde): sku nor bu rin po che'i drung du yongs su dag pa zhes mi brjod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che ni sems can gyi khams tshad med ba dang nam mkha'i khams tshad med
314a5(mdo sde): pa'i 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnas so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shin du yongs su dag pa dang dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni/ de
314a6(mdo sde): tsam du khyab par byed pa ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar dri ma'i lhag ma las pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ni zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su
314a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba nas/ zla ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba yang zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ tshes gnyis kyis zla ba ci 'dra ba de lta bur zla ba nye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de ltar chos nyid
314b1(mdo sde): thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bcas te/ lus kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni de
314b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i drung na lham mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba nya da'i drung na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ji lta ba de bzhin du
314b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig mod kyi/ yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid kyis ni ma yin no// rigs kyi/
314b4(mdo sde): bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje lta bur sra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams
314b5(mdo sde): yin/ khro ba dang / gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / dri ma dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang lta ba phyin ci log dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po
314b6(mdo sde): dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi
314b7(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams
315a1(mdo sde): cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la spyod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnam
315a2(mdo sde): yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
315a3(mdo sde): ded dpon chen po rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bkur ba rnams yin/ mchod par 'os pa rnams yin/ phyin par byed pa rnams yin/ brten par bya ba rnams yin/ 1
315a4(mdo sde): bar 'tsho bar bya ba rnams yin/ brgyags shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshogs shin tu bsags pa rnams yin/ mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ thog mar 'gro ba rnams yin/ thams
315a5(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas par bya ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas/ ji ltar na thams cad
315a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag gis bkur ba
315a7(mdo sde): yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bkur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon
315b1(mdo sde): chen po ni bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang slob pa dang /
315b2(mdo sde): mi slob pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod par 'os pa yin/
315b3(mdo sde): no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'brog dgon par 'gron po mang po 'phyan pas gtses pa dag legs par bde zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin no//
315b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po'i nang na/ sems can 'gron po mang po nyon mongs pa'i 'phyan pas gtses pa legs par bde
315b5(mdo sde): zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po la brten na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / 'phongs pa dag 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung
315b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po la brten na/ mu stegs can gzhan spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams 'brog dgon pa chen
315b7(mdo sde): bo nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang / las byed pa'i mi dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan
316a1(mdo sde): rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'aded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba la mngon par dka' ba'i sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no//
316a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni nam phyogs su 'gro bar chas te/ 'gron po mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba'i phyir 'brog dgon par zhugs pa
316a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ grong khyer chen por phyin gyi bar du brgyags phun sum tshogs pas 'brog dgon pa de nas legs par bde zhing yongs su skyo ba med par 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems
316a4(mdo sde): dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam sangs rgyas kyis rten pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod cing / sems can 'gron po mang po ded de/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por 'jug par 'dod la
316a5(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ bsod nams kyi brgyags kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs par 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/
316a6(mdo sde): ded dpon chen po ni 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru la sogs pa mang po bsags shing phyogs su
316a7(mdo sde): 'gro'o/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por mngon par zhugs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshogs shin tu
316b1(mdo sde): bsags shing 'gro'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang chos kyi nor
316b2(mdo sde): bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nor phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtso bo dang / dbang yod pa dang / ngag mnyan pas
316b3(mdo sde): 'gron po mang po thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'di lta ste/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / yongs kyi gtso bo dang /
316b4(mdo sde): chos la dbang ba dang / ma log par smra bas sems can 'gron pa mang po thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni grong khyer chen por phyin
316b5(mdo sde): par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar
316b6(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
316b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
317a1(mdo sde): lam mnyam pa yang rab tu shes/ lam nyam nga ba rab tu shes/ lam bde ba yang rab tu shes/ 'jam pa'i lam yang rab tu shes/ lam chu che ba dang chu med pa yang rab tu/
317a2(mdo sde): shes/ lam gyi dgongs mal dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam gyi tshugs dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'khyog pa dag kyang rab tu shes// lam drang po dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'byung ba yang rab tu
317a3(mdo sde): shes so/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam
317a4(mdo sde): ma log par ston pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa' lam ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi lam mi ston to// nyan
317a5(mdo sde): thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lam ston gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam mi ston to// thams cad mkhyen pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa
317a6(mdo sde): nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mi ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lam ston gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mi ston to//
317a7(mdo sde): bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang / chos su 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa'i lam dang stong pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ bdag nga da/ sems can
317b1(mdo sde): dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag gi lam mi ston to// mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i lam ston gyi/ mtha' gnyis la
317b2(mdo sde): gnas pa mi ston to/ / sems g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam ston gyi/ g.yeng ba'i lam mi ston to// spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams
317b3(mdo sde): la de bzhin nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ byis pa spros pa la dga' ba'i lam mi ston to// 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston gyi/ 'khor ba'i lam mi
317b4(mdo sde): ston to/ / lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la lam srol ma dod pa ma yin pa dang / tsher ma med pa'i lam ston gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i tsher mas gang ba'i lam mi ston to// rigs kyi
317b5(mdo sde): bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
317b6(mdo sde): pabar sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// tshor ba rnams dang / sems rnams dang / chos rnams dang /
317b7(mdo sde): yul rnams dang / dgon pa rnams dang / grong dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang
318a1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa rnams dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams
318a2(mdo sde): cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang
318a3(mdo sde): lus dang ldan pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu brtags shing yongs su spong ngo / / de'i 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas brtsams te yar na klad pa'i bar du lus kyi nyes pa
318a4(mdo sde): la rtog go/ lus la bdag med par yang rtog go// lus mi brtan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / chu rgyus kyis grags pa dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / dri nga ba dang / kha dog mi sdug par rtog ste/ de de ltar
318a5(mdo sde): rtog pa'i tshe/ gang lus la lus su 'dod pa dang / lus la 'dod chags pa dang / lus la dga' ba dang / lus la bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / lus la zhen pa dag mi 'byung ste/ rgyu de dang / rkyen
318a6(mdo sde): de dang / gzhi des lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du na lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams de nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur te/ de ltar na lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar
318a7(mdo sde): gzhag cing gnas pa'o/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ tshor ba gang rje
318b1(mdo sde): snyed pa de thams cad sdug bsngal na/ byis pa phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba rnams ni bde bar 'dzin te/ byis pa rmongs pa rnams sdug bsngal la bde ba zhes bya ba 'dzin gyi/ 'phags/
318b2(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis ni thams cad sdug bsngal bar thugs su chud snyam nas de spang ba'i phyir nan tan du mdzad la/ sems can gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god kyis/ bdag gis kyang de dag gi/
318b3(mdo sde): rjes su bslab par bya'o snyam ste/ de de ltar rtog pas tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// de tshor ba dag la chags pa yang med/ khong khro ba yang med cing de dag spang ba'i phyir rab
318b4(mdo sde): tu zhugs pa yin no/ / gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu
318b5(mdo sde): nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems 'di ni mi rtag pa la rtag par mngon par dga' ba'o// sdug bsngal la bde bar mngon par dga' ba'o// bdag med pa la bdag
318b6(mdo sde): tu mngon par dga' ba'o/ / mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba'o// g.yo zhing mi brtan la myur du 'gyur ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'o// ngan song rnams kyi sgo'o//
318b7(mdo sde): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gzhi'o// bde 'gro rnams chud gson pa'o// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi rkyen du 'gyur ba'o// chos thams cad kyi bdag
319a1(mdo sde): por 'gyur ba'o/ / chos thams cad ni sems thog mar 'gro ste/ sems yongs su shes na/ chos thams cad kyang yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig
319a2(mdo sde): rten sems kyis bris pa ste/ mi ltar sems ni sems kyis mi mthong ngo // dge ba 'am yang na mi dge ba'i las ni sems kyis bsags pa'o// sems ni mgal me bskor ba ltar 'khor/
319a3(mdo sde): sems ni rta ltar rnam par 'khyam/ sems ni nags kyi me ltar rnam par 'tshig/ sems ni chu chen po bzhin du skyed/ de de ltar rtog pas sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas te
319a4(mdo sde): sems kyi dbang du mi 'gro'i/ sems nyid de'i dbang du 'gro ste/ sems de'i dbang du gyur pas/ chos thams cad dbang du gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin
319a5(mdo sde): tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
319a6(mdo sde): gti mug la sogs pa dang / de dag la gnas pa gzhan dag la 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten/ zhe sdang dang
319a7(mdo sde): gti mug gi gnyen po la sten cing de dag spang ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/ / chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes na/ chos de dag la sems gtong zhing dran pa nye bar gzhog ste/ chos de dag kyang
319b1(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs shing gnas so/ / gzhan yang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byas
319b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang /
319b3(mdo sde): ro dang / reg bya la chags par 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro ba'i sems kyang mi skyed de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar bdag dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la chags pa skyed
319b4(mdo sde): pa ni bdag gi mi cha ste/ de ni bdag byis pa dang / rmongs pa dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chags par gyur nas zhen par 'gyur ro//
319b5(mdo sde): zhen nas rmongs par 'gyur ro// rmongs nas dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'i chos rnam par sgom par mi 'gyur te/ de'i rgyus ngan song du 'gro bar gsungs so zhes de 'di snyam du de ltar bdag chos
319b6(mdo sde): gsog rnams khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa ni bdag gi mi cha ste/ / de ni bdag gi mi bzod pa dang / dang du mi len pa dang / khong khro ba kun nas ldang bar 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rnams kyis ni smad par
319b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni dbye bar 'gyur ro zhes de de ltar rtog pas/ yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas te/ yul rnams kyis ni mi smras shing
320a1(mdo sde): mabyung bar mi 'gyur la/ gzhan yang bslab pa bcas pa de nyid yang kod/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji lta
320a2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ de 'di snyam du dgon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa med par rnam par dpyod pa rnams kyi gnas so// zhi
320a3(mdo sde): bar rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/ / dgon pa la ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za gzhan gyi sems mngon par shes pa dag kyang yod de/ de dag bdag gi sems dang sems las
320a4(mdo sde): byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes na/ bdag tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed cing sems pa de ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam ste/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba thams cad dang bral nas/
320a5(mdo sde): tshul bzhin du chos rnams la sems gtong zhing chos de dag la bsgom pa mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang
320a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor nams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sem
320a7(mdo sde): dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod na gnas gang tshul dang mi 'dra zhing yongs
320b1(mdo sde): su spang bar bya ba rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi mthun pa de dag yongs su spong ngo / / de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chang ma'i khyim mam/ smad 'tshong gi khyim mam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ rgyan
320b2(mdo sde): po'i gnas sam/ ra ro ba'i 'khor gyi tshogs sam/ gar mkhan dang glu gar gyi gnas dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi 'dra ba de dag yongs su spong zhing de dag la dra
320b3(mdo sde): pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag la dran pa shin tu
320b4(mdo sde): nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/
320b5(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byed pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dngos po nye bar gzung zhing rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sems gtong ste/ ci nas kyi zhen par mi 'gyur/ sred pa mi skyed/ chags
320b6(mdo sde): pa mi skyed/ bdag gir mi byed/ nor du mi 'dzin/ bdag gir mi 'dzin pa dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la phan par 'gyur
320b7(mdo sde): bde ltar stong ste/ gal te yang rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa zhig byung yang / des khengs par mi 'gyur/ nga rgyal mi skye/ rgyags pa mi skye/
321a1(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems so// ring por mi thogs par grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di gang las byung ba dang / gang gis phyung ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang /
321a2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur na/ de la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig mi rtag cing mi gnas pa'i chos mi brtan pa/ yid brtan du mi rung
321a3(mdo sde): bdag la dga' ba'i sems skyed pa 'am/ khengs par 'gyur ba 'am/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pas dregs par 'gyur snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang /
321a4(mdo sde): grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la
321a5(mdo sde): dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs te//
321a6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// gang ma byon pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing mngon par rdzogs
321a7(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// gang da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// /
321b1(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o zhes de de ltar yid ches pas bslab pa rnams la nan tan du byed pa yin te/ brtson par byed pa dang / legs par bya ba byed cing shin tu rdzogs par byed pa yin te/
321b2(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i
321b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa
321b4(mdo sde): rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ yongs su nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag gang las byung ba dang / rkyen gang gis byung ba'i gzhi yang rab tu shes te/ des de ltar shes
321b5(mdo sde): nas byung ba de dang / rkyen de dag yongs su spong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la
321b6(mdo sde): dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin no//
321b7(mdo sde): / 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin bam po drug pa// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no//
322a1(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/ sems dma' ba rnams yin/ yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/ de la ma zhen pa rnams yin//
322a2(mdo sde): nyes par lta ba dang bral ba rnams ya ni/ yon tan du lta ba rnams yin/ bdag la mi stod pa rnams yin/ gzhan la mi smod pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/
322a3(mdo sde): lha 'du ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na lha 'du ba'i bar du yin zhe na/
322a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dad cing bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad cing yid ches pa yin/ de srog gi phyir yang yang dag par
322a5(mdo sde): blangs pa mi 'jig cing yang dag par blangs pa las mi 'gyur te/ de yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pas/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sems dma' zhing nga rgyal med pa yin//
322a6(mdo sde): de nga rgyal med cing sems dma' bas phyag dar khrod pa ngan ngon yongs su bor te/ skye bo thams cad dang mi mthun pa dag sdud do// de dag bsdus nas 'khru bar byed/ de 'khru ba dang /
322a7(mdo sde): glan pa dang / bcom pa dang / btso bar byed pa na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing yongs su mi skyo ste/ yongs su mi skyo ba rkyen du byas nas/ ji tsam gyis don grub par
322b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ma gtogs par de la zhen par yang mi 'gyur ro/ / kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni zhi gnas pa'o// kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni sdom pa'o// kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa
322b2(mdo sde): 'di dag ni shig mang ba ste/ lus la mi bde zhing rdul 'byin to zhes nyes par lta ba ma yin gyi/ phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni drang srong gis bgos pa'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'thun
322b3(mdo sde): pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i rigs dang 'thun pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas bstod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'o zhes phyag dar khrod pa de dag la yon tan du lta ba yin te/
322b4(mdo sde): rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des bdag la mi stod/ gzhan la mi smod do// de bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa dang bral bas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ tshul khrims phun
322b5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pas lha rnams 'du ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su btsal ba yin/ mi ngang mi ma yin pa
322b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis yongs su bsrung ba yin/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis phyag bya ba yin/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyad pa rnams kyis
322b7(mdo sde): gzengs bstod par bya ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol
323a1(mdo sde): par bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya chen po rnams la spyod pa dman tshegs kyis ci zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems//
323a2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten gyi yid dang sbyor ba yin te/ stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams 'jig rten dang 'thun par spyod kyi/ stobs kyi mthu ma thob pa rnams ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
323a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' stobs kyi mthu ma thob pas ni/ nyon mongs pa ma lags pa'i gnyen po bstan par bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen po la mos sam//
323a4(mdo sde): 'on te dman pa la mos pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de'i lan gsol du bdag gis tshigs mi phyin te/
323a5(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni mos pa las smos pa lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos gzigs pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ni chos gzigs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas
323a6(mdo sde): chos gang la yang mos par bgyi ba ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi'i mi rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
323a7(mdo sde): dang / dri zal mos pa dman pa gzhan dag la spyod pa dman tshegs ston cing de dag mdun du sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa de ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
323b1(mdo sde): rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag de lta bu 'dul ba'i slad du ste/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa lag sar du zhugs pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa skyes pa'i
323b2(mdo sde): gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams kyang 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir phyag/
323b3(mdo sde): dar khrod par 'gyur gyi/ dman pa la mos pa'i phyir ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/
323b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chog shes pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa chung ba rnams yin/ kun tu btsal ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ sogs/
323b5(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ bsags pa chung zos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ bsags pa chud zos pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba rnams yin/ yid mi bde ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'khrug
323b6(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ len pa med pa rnams yin/ zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog shes shing
323b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa chung ba yin/ de 'dod pa chung bas na kun tu tshol ba med pa yin/ kun tu tshol ba med pas na/ sogs pa med pa yin/ sogs pa med pas na/ bsags pa chung za ba med pa yin/ bsags
324a1(mdo sde): pa chung za ba med pas na/ bsags pa chud zos pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal med pa yin/ sdug bsngal ba med pas na/ yid mi bde ba med pa yin/ yid mi bde ba med pas na
324a2(mdo sde): 'khrug pa med pa yin/ 'khrug pa med pa yin pas na/ len pa med pa yin/ len pa med pas na/ zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/
324a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bying pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
324a4(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi bsam pas mi 'gro ste/ de'i phyir phying ba can zhes bya'o// de bzhin du zhe sdang gi bsam pas mi 'gro/ gti mug gi bsam pas mi 'gro// khro ba dang gnod sems kyi bsam
324a5(mdo sde): pas mi 'gro/ phrag dog dang ser sna'i bsam pas mi 'gro/ nga rgyal gyi bsam pas mi 'gro/ grags pa 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro/ shes kyi khe bdog pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro
324a6(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang bkur ste 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro zhing bdud la mi 'dud/ dga' bar bya bas snyems pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir phying pa can zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
324a7(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/
324b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams la phan par zhugs pa rnams yin/ mthar gyis bsod snyoms len pa rnams yin/ yongs su yi chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/ chog shes pa
324b2(mdo sde): rnams yin/ bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin/ ma chags pa rnams yin/ bsod snyoms bza' ba la tshod shes pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa rnams
324b3(mdo sde): yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsdus pa rnams yin/ ril po'i 'du shes med pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la phan par zhugs
324b4(mdo sde): pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na ril po'i 'du shes med pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan la
324b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bdag mthong na/ sems can de dag la phan par bya ba'i phyir bsod snyoms pa'i yid ma 'dzin te/ de nam grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ba de'i
324b6(mdo sde): tshe dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag pa dang / spyod lam mdzes pas dbang po mi g.yo ba dang / dbang po mi rgod pa dang / dbang po dul ba dang / gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams
324b7(mdo sde): la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o/ / de bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro na/ bsod snyoms mthar gyis len pa yin te/ mgo 'phang bstod cing bram ze shing sA la chen po lta
325a1(mdo sde): bu'i grong ngam/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i grong ngam/ khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i grong 'byor pa dag tu mi 'jug gi/ mtha' gcig nas bzung ste
325a2(mdo sde): nam de'i don grub par gyur kyi bar du bsod snyoms spyod de gzhan du gnas gang na khyi za ba 'am/ badrus ma 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa/ rang bzhin gyis ngang tshul dran pa'i
325a3(mdo sde): srog chags sam/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo kyal ka bya ba'i bsam pa can dag yod pa 'am/ smad pa'i gnas thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ de mthar
325a4(mdo sde): gyis bsod snyoms la 'gro na/ yongs su yi mi chad cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med la/ sems can de dag la chags pa yang mi skyed/ khong khro ba yang mi skyed de/ yongs su yi chad pa med
325a5(mdo sde): pas/ so so ci rigs pa'i bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog shes pa yin te/ des bsod snyoms de blangs nas/ bdag gi gnas su 'ongs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag/ rkang lag
325a6(mdo sde): bkrus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la bkur sti dang rim gro byas te/ gnas su song nas bsod snyoms de las cha gcig ni tshangs
325a7(mdo sde): pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir bzhag go/ / gnyis pa ni sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi phyir bzhag go// gsum pa ni sems can log par lhung ba rnams kyi phyir bzhag go// cha bzhi pa ni
325b1(mdo sde): bdag za ste/ de za ba na 'dod chags med par za ste/ chags par ma yin/ brkam par ma yin/ zhen par ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na ji tsam du lus gnas par 'gyur ba dang / 'tsho
325b2(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir za ste/ ji ltar ha cang yang nyam dma' ba dang / ha cang yang lus lci bar yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar za ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ha cang yang nyam dmas na ni dge ba'i phyogs la
325b3(mdo sde): rgyab kyis ltas par 'gyur ro/ / lus ha cang lcin ni gnyid kyis non par 'gyur ro// des bsod snyoms de zos nas dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa
325b4(mdo sde): dang / le lo med pa dang / snyoms pa med pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya'o// de byang chub kyi chos phyogs kyi chos yongs su 'dus pas bdag tu 'dzi/
325b5(mdo sde): pa med pa yin/ bdag tu 'dzin pa med pas/ bdag gi shas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
325b6(mdo sde): dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stan gcig pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdud/
325b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis sdigs kyang byang chub kyi snying po'i stan gcig la mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das
326a1(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ stong pa nyid las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
326a2(mdo sde): cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ lam las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ba rnams yin//
326a3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stan las mi g.yo ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu stan gcig po ni 'di yin te/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stan no// rigs kyi bu stan gcig po ni 'di yin te/
326a4(mdo sde): de ni chos kyi stan no// stan de las byang chub sems dpa' de dag mi g.yo ste/ de bas na stan gcig pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi du chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snyan gcig
326a5(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi brkam pa'i rang bzhin can
326a6(mdo sde): rnams yin/ mi chags pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/ de dag gis nam tshod bzung bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ nye tshod yod dam med kyang rung ste/ de dag gis lus rten pa'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ mar ram//
