355b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i chog shes pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' nges pa rnams yin no//
355b5(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang ba rnams yi ni/ 'jam pa rnams yin/ gya gyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yini/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ dri
355b6(mdo sde): ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ mi brlang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rtsub pa spangs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa
355b7(mdo sde): mang ba rnams yin/ nges pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'anges pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
356a1(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lta ba yongs su dag pas lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshul
356a2(mdo sde): khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ tshul dang cha 'thun pa'i spyod yul du spyod pa rnams yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/
356a3(mdo sde): khong yangs pa rnams yin/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la rjed pa rnams yin/ skal ba mnyam pa rnams yin/ lam gcig tu zhugs pa rnams yin/ ston pa gzhan med pa rnams yin te
356a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos
356a5(mdo sde): po la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud do// bde ba'i sbyin pa dang / mi zad pa'i sbyin pa dang / phan par smra ba dang /
356a6(mdo sde): don du smra ba dang / chos su smra ba dang / rigs par smra ba dang / don du bya ba dang / zang zing gis don 'thun pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do// rigs
356a7(mdo sde): kyi bu phan pa'i sbyin pa ni gang chos kyi sbyin pa'o/ / bde ba'i sbyin pa ni gang zang zing gi sbyin pa'o// mi zad pa'i sbyin pa ni gang lam gyi lung sbyin pa'o// phan par smra ba ni gang dge ba'i rtsa ba bstabs pa'o//
356b1(mdo sde): don du smra ba ni gang yang dag pa'i bstan pa'o// chos su smra ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang 'thun par bstan pa'o// rigs par smra ba ni gang don yang dag par chud mi gson pa'o//
356b2(mdo sde): don bya ba ni gang mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslang ste/ dge ba'i gnas su 'jog pa'o// zang zing gi don 'thun pa ni gang bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / ltung ba dang / gzhib pa dang /
356b3(mdo sde): gos la sogs pa thun mong du yongs su spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi don 'thun pa ni gang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru
356b4(mdo sde): dang sa le sbra ma dang / dngul dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / gzhon pa thun mong du spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
356b5(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngong po la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
356b6(mdo sde): spyod lam rab tu zhi ba rnams yin/ spyod lam sgyu med pa rnams yin/ spyod lam yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ blta na dga' ba rnams yin/ blta na 'jam pa rnams yin/
356b7(mdo sde): blta bas chog mi shes pa rnams yin/ blta na yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad khong khro ba med par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams
357a1(mdo sde): cad sems tshim par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na
357a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' tshul shes pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/
357a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dag las yongs su srung ba yin/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'don pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho/
357a4(mdo sde): las sgrol ba rnams yin/ mgon med pa rnams la gnyen du gyur pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa rnams la sman par gyur pa rnams yin//
357a5(mdo sde): rten med pa dag la rten rnams yin/ gnas med pa dag la gnas rnams yin/ skya ba med pa dag la skyabs rnams yin/ gling med pa dag la gling rnams yin/ dpung gnyen med pa
357a6(mdo sde): dag la dpung gnyen rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang
357a7(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po blta na bzang zhes bya ba de
357b1(mdo sde): ni rtsa bas kyang sems can nad pa rnams nye bar 'tshe'o/ / sdong po dang / yal ga rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / mthong ba dang / bsnams/
357b2(mdo sde): pa dang / reg pas myangs pa dang / reg pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ nyon mongs
357b3(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyi nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
357b4(mdo sde): shes rab dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / yon tan gyi ro myangs pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya bras kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/
357b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba
357b6(mdo sde): la brtson pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum la ci nus su bya ba byed pa dang / sems can nad pa rnams la rtsi sbyor ba dang / sems can
357b7(mdo sde): bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa rnams la zas dang / skom gyi sbyin pa dang / rlung dang / lhags pa dang / nyi mas nyen pa'i sems can rnams la dgab pa sbyin pa dang /
358a1(mdo sde): mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams la gus par rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus par smra/ phyag 'tshal/ ldang / thal mo sbyor/
358a2(mdo sde): zhing 'dud par byed pa dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / skyed mos tshal bya ba dang / dus dus su nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba gtong ba
358a3(mdo sde): dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las mi dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la bgo bshas yongs su skyong ba dang / dus dus su tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze la
358a4(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
358a5(mdo sde): chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas
358a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su 'dri'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
358a7(mdo sde): la chos nyan to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed do// sangs rgyas kyi
358b1(mdo sde): zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
358b2(mdo sde): du mar yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams la rim gro byed/ bkur sti byed/ bsti stang byed/ mchod pa byed pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig
358b3(mdo sde): nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang bdag
358b4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar snang ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
358b5(mdo sde): gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang
358b6(mdo sde): sems can 'dul ba ji snyed kyi sprul pa 'gyed kyang / de dag sprul pa 'gyed pa'i tshe/ rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
358b7(mdo sde): bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bu byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa 'gyid na/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
359a1(mdo sde): de'i phyir dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma dang zla ba ni gling bzhi snang bar byed cing / sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin kyang nyi ma dang zla
359a2(mdo sde): ba ni bdag cag gi snang bar byed do/ / bdag ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon gyi las rnam par smin pa'i mngon par 'du shes pas
359a3(mdo sde): zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis kyi bya ba de lta bu 'byung ngo / / rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sprul pa 'gyed na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ bsgrim pa dang mngon par 'du bya
359a4(mdo sde): ba mi byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi las rnam par smin pas mngon par 'du bya ba rnams mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir te/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i
359a5(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de ci nas kyang rnam par rtog pa med par yang sprul pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar smon lam btab/ de lta de ltar mngon par 'du byas pa'i phyir ro//
359a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur
359a7(mdo sde): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa shin tu grub pas sbyin pa shin tu phun sum
359b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshul khrim shin tu grub cing tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon med pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / sra sre med pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad/
359b2(mdo sde): las 'das pa dang / yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba dang ldan pas tshul khrims shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / brtson
359b3(mdo sde): 'grus shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / bsam gtan shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / shes rab shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnamaswa dang / thabs shin tu
359b4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / smon lam shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / stobs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / ye shes shin tu grub cing thun mong ma
359b5(mdo sde): yin pa'i ye shes nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa/ sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yan chad/ sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems/
359b6(mdo sde): dpa'i bar gyi ye shes las 'das pa dang ldan pas/ ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur
359b7(mdo sde): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par batshang rgya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi
360a1(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'gul te/ rab tu g.yos par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/
360a2(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab dag gam/ ri btang bzung ngam/ ri btang bzung chen po dag gam/ khor yug gi ri 'am/ khor yug gi ri chen po dag gram/ de ma yin pa rin po che'i ri
360a3(mdo sde): dang / ri nag po de dag thams cad kyang / yul ga ya ga la ba dang / ga ya mgo'i ri ga la ba de logs su bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'dud par gyur to// gang stong
360a4(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing ngam/ spos kyi shing ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir ga
360a5(mdo sde): ya mgo'i ri ga la de logs su 'dud par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa 'bul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang na bza' dang rgyan gyi bye brag
360a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi phung po ri rab tsam byas par gyur to/ / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du ma'ang mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ 'dud cing
360a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dag 'thor bar gyur to// lha'i bu brgya stong du ma'ang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ gos g.yob cing ca co dang gzha brgya stong
360b1(mdo sde): byed par gyur to/ / lha'i me tog gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor bar gyur cing / kye ma'o dang ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas gnyis skyes par gyur to// kye ma'o chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis
360b2(mdo sde): pa bskor to/ / sems can gang dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bsod nams dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i las byed pa ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
360b3(mdo sde): rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa yin no/ / gang 'di la dad pa rnyed pa de dag lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes de skad du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// lto 'phye chen po brgya stong du
360b4(mdo sde): ma'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir/ 'brug ltar sgra 'ur 'ur 'byin/ sgrog par byed/ shin tu sgrog par byed cing / spos kyi sprin sna tshogs mngon par sprul te
360b5(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / ga ya mgo'i ri la spos chu'i char mngon par 'bebs kyang / sems can rnams la gnod par mi snang ngo // lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma 'ang
360b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gru'i nga ro'i sgra 'byin par gyur to/ / dri za 'am mi 'am ci brgya stong du ma'ang snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis glu len cing / ga ya mgo'i ri dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen
360b7(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la skor bar byed par gyur to/ / gnod sbyin bye ba brgya stong du ma'ang pad+ma'i char mngon par 'bebs par gyur to// bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang
361a1(mdo sde): grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi brgya stong du ma'ang me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
361a2(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma dag nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dgab par
361a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ so so'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dag nas 'od zer mang po bkye bar gyur to// 'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs/ gzugs sna tshogs snang ba sna tshogs can sha stag
361a4(mdo sde): ste/ de 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog ste/ de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
361a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di la skor bar byed cing / mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bar gyur te// 'khor nas ga ya mgo'i ri la bskor ba byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang bskor ba byas
361a6(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// rlung yang bde bar langs par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba 'byung ba'i
361a7(mdo sde): tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang chos rnams la rdul med cing
361b1(mdo sde): dri ma dang bral ba chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/ / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang sngan chad ma skyed pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas yang
361b2(mdo sde): ga ya mgo'i ri la gnas pa'i lha mo mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te/ 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug 'dug pa las/ de stan las langs
361b3(mdo sde): nas/ bdag gi gnas su song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa blangs nas/ phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas/ btsun par byas
361b4(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ bsti stang byas/ rim gror byas so// bkur sti dang / btsun pa dang / ri mo dang / mchod pa dang / bsti stang dang / rim gror byas nas/ bcom
361b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan de dang de dag la ga ya mgo'i ri 'di nyid du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis
361b6(mdo sde): don 'di nyid dag dang / tshul 'di nyid dag dang / tshig dang yi ge 'di nyid dag gis bstan pa bdag gis mngon par dran no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'chi
361b7(mdo sde): ba de ltar khyod kyis dkon mchog 'byung ba de lta bu thos par gyur pa ni khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo/ / de nas 'khor der tshogs pa'i nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du
362a1(mdo sde): sems par gyur to/ / lha mo 'dis de srid cig nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la/ de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas kyang 'dis bud
362a2(mdo sde): med kyi lus las ma bsgyur snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa
362a3(mdo sde): sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lha mo mi 'chi ba 'dis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba
362a4(mdo sde): thob la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed du mang ba zhig bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ bud med kyi lus ma bsgyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
362a5(mdo sde): pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can gyi don ni rgyu'o// sems can gyi don ni rkyen no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba ni/ rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
362a6(mdo sde): gnas pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba ste/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi bas gang yang dag par len du btsud pa dang / gzengs bstod pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa las
362a7(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni bgreng ba las 'das pa zhig ngas mngon par 'du shes te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na lha mo mi 'chi ba ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba
362b1(mdo sde): ste/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nying du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon
362b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
362b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis/ lha mo mi 'chi ba la bka' stsal pa/ mi 'chi ba khyod kyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston cig/ de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa
362b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur te/ lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe stong
362b5(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil lta bur mnyam zhing / bai DUR+Ya'i gzhir snar bar gyur te/ ri nag po med cing shing tha mal pa med la/ gnas
362b6(mdo sde): gnas dag na'ang dpag bsam gyi shing sha stag snang bar gyur to/ / gnas gnas dag na chu mig dang / mi tshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus
362b7(mdo sde): yongs su gang ba dag snang bar gyur to/ / me phal pa med par snang bar gyur to// de na bud med kyi sgra yang mi grag par gyur to// gnas dang gnas dag na pad+ma shing rta'i 'khor
363a1(mdo sde): lo tsam dag snang bar gyur to/ / pad+ma de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs skyil mo krung ngu 'khod pa sha stag snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
363a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'chi ba de'ang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par snang ste/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
363a3(mdo sde): skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mdun du bdar te/ 'di ltar chos nyid 'di kho na las brtsams na sa chos
363a4(mdo sde): ston par snang bar gyur to/ / de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba'ang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang
363a5(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang /
363a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ kha ton bgyid dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag
363a7(mdo sde): par ston par bgyid na/ de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong
363b1(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin pa lkug par byin te/ de ltar sbyin pas bskal pa brgya stong mang por byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu/
363b2(mdo sde): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris/ legs par zhug te/ sems dad pas sems dad pa la byin na/ de bas kyang 'di bsod nams mang du skyed
363b3(mdo sde): do/ / rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zang ring gi sbyin pa ni phran tshegs te/ chos kyi sbyin pa ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i sems can
363b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis zang zing ni rnam pa du mar myong gi/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ro ni nam yang ma myong ste/ 'jig rten pa ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi
363b5(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lAm rnams la bkod pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/
363b6(mdo sde): 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dge ba bcu'i las
363b7(mdo sde): kyi lam rnams ni 'di las byung ngo / / rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa dang
364a1(mdo sde): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/
364a2(mdo sde): klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston na/ de bas kyang 'di bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'di la rten na/ nyan thos
364a3(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/ / chos nyid 'di la rten na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid 'di la rten na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
364a4(mdo sde): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang / bklags pa dang / spel ba dang / kha ton byas pas/ mdo sde thams cad bzung ba dang /
364a5(mdo sde): spel ba dang / kha ton byas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad kyi ma mo ste/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'di ma thob par chos nyid rgya chen po thob par mi
364a6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dul ba'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad stan las langs te/
364a7(mdo sde): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
364b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos nyid 'di thos pa skye ba'i 'khor ba chen po bas par bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
364b2(mdo sde): slong dag de de bzhin no/ / de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sa phyogs
364b3(mdo sde): gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa'i sa phyogs de byang chub kyi snying por gzung bar bya'o/ / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gzung bar bya'o// mchod rten chen
364b4(mdo sde): por gzung bar bya'o/ / bdag cag gi ston pa gnas 'di na bzhugs so gzung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni byang chub bo// chos nyid 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo
364b5(mdo sde): rab tu bskor ba'o/ / rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste/ rigs kyi bu dag chos mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs gang na chos
364b6(mdo sde): smra ba de gnas pa de la'ang mchod rten du 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ chos smra ba de la'ang bla mar 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//
364b7(mdo sde): lam ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// chos smra ba de mthong na dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa bskyed par bya'o// rim gro byas te stan la bdar bar bya'o// chos smra ba
365a1(mdo sde): de'i bsngags pa bskyed par bya'o/ / legs so zhes brjod pa mang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos smra ba de'i bsngag
365a2(mdo sde): ba brjod kyang / chos smra ba de la cung zad kyang phan par byas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ bkur stir bya ba dang / btsun par bya ba dang bsngags pa
365a3(mdo sde): brjod pa ni gyi na cung zad zad do/ / rigs kyi bu dag gal te chos 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos smra ba de 'ong ba'i lam rang gi khrag gis chag chag byas
365a4(mdo sde): kyang chos smra ba de la phan pa cung zad kyang byas pa med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lnga ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bzung ba 'di ni dka' 'o//
365a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag chos smra ba des kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par ston pa'i tshe/ 'jigs pa med par bya'o// ma zhum pa dang / snga ma gong ba
365a6(mdo sde): dang / zhe ma 'grus pa'i sems dang / gos gtsang ma bgos te dad pa bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis bsngags pa brjod kyang mi snyems pa dang / nga rgyal du mi gzung bar bya ste/ bdag mi
365a7(mdo sde): stong/ gzhan mi smod cing / des pang zing med pa'i sems kyis ri mor byas te chos ston par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// /
365b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dog sa'i phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa 'am/ bstan par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / chos smra ba de la sman par bgyi ba'i
365b2(mdo sde): slad du/ bdag cag dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka legs so legs so// khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig/ ko'u shi ka
365b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs su bsrung bar bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
365b4(mdo sde): 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dkon mchog
365b5(mdo sde): sprin ces bya bar zung zhig/ yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ ye shes sgron ma zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
365b6(mdo sde): zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang
365b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu la sogs
366a1(mdo sde): pa lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag dang / de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / l+h+wa mra yin dang / nam mnga' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
366a2(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po brgyad stong dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog sbyin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
366a3(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta dang / d+harma tA shi las zhus te gtan la phab pa/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos lags so// /
366a4(mdo sde): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dz+nyA na ka sU tA bud+d+ha a ba dA na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
366a5(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gi b+ho pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yum gyi don du lha rnams kyi gnas sum cu rtsa gsum na/ shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung na la ba dkar
366a6(mdo sde): po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs so/ / der lha'i bu zhig la snga ltas ngan pa lnga byung ste/ 'phreng rgyan brnyings pa dang / gos brnyings pa dang / lus dring bar gyur pa dang / mchan khung nas rdul
366a7(mdo sde): 'dzag pa dang / rang gi stan la dga' ba med par gyur to// skye ba'ang mthong ste/ yangs pa'i phag gi mngal du skye ba mthong ngo // des de mthong nas mya ngan gyis thebs/ smre sngags
366b1(mdo sde): 'don/ brang rdung zhing du la/ shin tu mog mog por gyur to// de nas lha'i bu gzhan zhig lha'i bu de ga la ba der song song ste 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas 'jigs
366b2(mdo sde): sam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag 'chi bas 'jigs so// lha'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag lha rnams kyi nang du sum cu rtsa gsum 'dir lha'i bza' ba ni zos/ lha'i btung ba ni 'thungs/
366b3(mdo sde): lha'i bgo ba ni bgos na/ de nas phyir yangs pa'i phag gi mngal du skye ba mthong ste/ der bdag bshad pa za zhing mchi bar gyur te/ lha'i bu de lta bas na bdag 'chi bas 'jigs so//
366b4(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas ma 'jigs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
366b5(mdo sde): de yum gyi don du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas 'di na/ shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung na/ la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/ ci ste lha'i bu khyod kyis
366b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de la phyag tshol dang / bcom ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs te/ des khyod ngan song rnams las grol bar mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom
366b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su ma btang ba yin no/ / de nas lha'i bu de stan la ladra te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
367a1(mdo sde): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ched du brjod pa 'di lan gsum brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
367a2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs su gsol/ bdag ngan song
367a3(mdo sde): du skye ba rnams las grol bar mdzad du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ lha'i bu de dag ga la ba der gshegs te/ gdan
367a4(mdo sde): bshams pa de la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas 'jigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
367a5(mdo sde): 'das bdag 'gum pas 'jigs lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yangs pa'i ngag gi mngal mi sdug par skye ba mthong lags te/ der bdag skyes nas bshang ba 'tshal zhing mtshon gyis
367a6(mdo sde): 'gum par 'gyur lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'gum pas 'jigs lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
367a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas ma 'jigs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams mi 'gro mi 'ong gi/ bdag nyid kyi las kyis 'ong zhing 'gro ste/ lha'i bu khyod tshur shog
367b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la skyabs su song zhig/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhig/ de nas lha'i bu de stan las yangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
367b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo/ / bdag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu de la tshigs su
367b3(mdo sde): bcad de bka' stsal pa/ / gang zhig sangs rgyas la ni skyabs song ba// de ni ngan 'gror 'dir ni mi 'gro ste// lha yi bdag nyid dngos po spangs nas su/ mi yi bdag nyid dngos po len pa
367b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu
367b5(mdo sde): dga' ba'i bar du mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do// bcom ldan 'das bzhud nas ring po ma lon par lha'i bu de 'chi ba'i dus byas so// dus byas nas de ma thag tu
367b6(mdo sde): yangs pa der tshong dpon zhig gi chung ma dam pa'i mngal du skyes so/ / de zla ba dgu 'das nas/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po/
367b7(mdo sde): rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas par gyur to// de btsas ma thag tu tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag
368a1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo zhes brjod do/ / de nas de'i pha dang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ khye'u 'di ni sangs rgyas shes/ chos shes/ dge 'dun shes te/ 'di ni shes
368a2(mdo sde): pa dang ldan no snyam du 'du shes skyes so/ / de nas khye'u shes ldan gang gi tshe/ lo brgyad lon pa lta bur gyur pa de'i tshe/ li tsa byi gzhon nu rab tu mang po rnams kyis lhan cig tu mdun
368a3(mdo sde): du bdar nas/ skyed mos tshal gyi bzhi mdo nas byung ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yangs pa'i tshal chen po na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan
368a4(mdo sde): 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ smad g.yogs dang chos gos gsol// lhung bzed bsnams te/ yangs par bsod snyoms la phyir gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das de mdzes pa nas/
368a5(mdo sde): 'ong dang ldan pa'i bar du gyur pa khye'u shes ldan gyis mthong ngo // mthong nas de bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dga' bar gyur to// sems dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
368a6(mdo sde): der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khye'u
368a7(mdo sde): shes ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag gis sngon gyi tshe dran te// sdug bsngal rnams las rab bkrol zhing // ngan song ltung ba las ni bdag/ 'jig
368b1(mdo sde): rten mgon gyis grol bar mdzad/ / mi mchog thugs ni brtser dgongs te// bsod snyoms 'di ni bzhes par mdzad// bdag gi gdugs tshod 'di dag ni// grol bar mdzad nas deng
368b2(mdo sde): bzhengs la/ / sang ni bdag gi pha ma yi// sdum par 'dren pas brtser dgongs te// dge slong kun dang thabs cig tu// gdugs tshod dag ni gsol bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'das
368b3(mdo sde): cang mi gsung bar gyur pas/ khye'u shes ldan gyis gsol ba ka nang ngo // de nas khye'u shes ldan bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ pha ma ga la ba der song ste/ 5
368b4(mdo sde): ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ / ya ba yum bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul lags te/ sang yang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// de nas khye'u shes ldan gyi pha ma
368b5(mdo sde): mgu zhing dga' la/ yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ de'i mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba ro dang ldan pa zhim pa mang po mngon par bshams nas/ yangs
368b6(mdo sde): pa'i grong khyer chen po thams cad phyag bdar byas te/ dar gyi lda ldi btags/ pog phor nas spos kyis bdugs/ spos chus chag chag btab/ me tog gis mdzes par bkram ste/ de'i
368b7(mdo sde): mtshan mo 'das nas dus la bab pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod la bab ste/ gdugs tshod spur lags so zhes gsol to// de nas
369a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i snga dro smad g.yogs dang chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis mdun du bdar cing / dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs
369a2(mdo sde): su bskor te/ shes ldan gyi pha ma'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so// de nas khye'u shes ldan bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gangan
369a3(mdo sde): la bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang bca' ba ro dang ldan pa zhim zhing mang ba dag legs par brims/ legs par gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol bar rig
369a4(mdo sde): nas/ so so so so la ras bcos bu zung dang / so so la lham zung dag phul lo// bcom ldan 'das la chos gos gsar pa gsum dang / chags gsar pa zung dag gsol to// gser
369a5(mdo sde): gyi me tog dang dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor to/ / gang mngon par gtor ba de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi thad kar khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba/
369a6(mdo sde): blta na sdug pa/ gru bzhi pa/ gnas bzhi dang ldan pa zhig 'dug par gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas te chos 'chad cing bzhugs
369a7(mdo sde): pa des mthong ngo / / de nas khye'u shes ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyad pa de 'dra ba mthong nas/ mgu zhing dga' ba nas//
369b1(mdo sde): yid bde ba skyes pa'i bar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
369b2(mdo sde): tu bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des na/ bdag da ltar gyi bcom ldan 'das bzhin du sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ chos ston par yang gyur cig/ dge 'dun yongs su skyong bar yang gyur cig/
369b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u shes ldan gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud de/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa nas/ spyi gtsug gi nang du nub pa'i bar du mdzad pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
369b4(mdo sde): mthong ste/ don med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do snyam pa'i bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/
369b5(mdo sde): 'di ltar shes ldan gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa nas/ bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu dag tu log par lhung bar mi 'gyur la// de nas de ma thag tu rnam par 'dren par nye bar skye 'gyur te/
369b6(mdo sde): mtshan ni mkhyen gtso rgyal po zhes bya sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi ni rtogs pa brjod pas mkhas rnams yang dag dga' byed cing // mi yi mkhas pa gang
369b7(mdo sde): gis thos nas dge ba mang po byed 'gyur te/ / rgya mtsho mthas gtugs dpag med lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas la// rab tu dang bas yon rnams phul ba'i 'bras bu chung bar
370a1(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ khye'u shes ldan dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi

370a3(mdo sde): kar sing ha dang / sarba dz+nyA de wa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/
370a4(mdo sde): shrI se na a ba dA nAM/ bod skad du/ dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong
370a5(mdo sde): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te ji ltar na ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang shes la/ sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang shes bzhin du sems can rnams kyis
370a6(mdo sde): kyang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang shes la/ sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang shes su zin na ni/ de lta na kham gyi tha ma dang / kham gyi mjug lus pa gang yin pa de las kyang //
370a7(mdo sde): gal te yon gnas len pa po rnyed na/ de la ma byin nam/ bgo bsha' ma byas kyi bar du za bar mi byed la/ de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas dkris shing 'dug par mi 'gyur
370b1(mdo sde): ba zhig na/ ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang shes la/ sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang shes bzhin du sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang mi shes la/ sbyin
370b2(mdo sde): pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang mi shes pas ni/ de'i phyir de dag ni kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ma byin pa 'am bgo bsha' ma byas par za bar byed la/ de dag gi sem
370b3(mdo sde): kyang ser sna skyes pas kun tu dkris shing 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad du gsungs nas/ gzhan yang ston pas 'di
370b4(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bgo bsha' dag gi rnam par smin// ji ltar don chen gyur pa de// drang srong che rnams gsungs pa bzhin// sems can rnams kyis shes na ni//
370b5(mdo sde): ma byin bar du mi za zhing // ser sna can du mi 'gyur la// de dag kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems// nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur na// gang phyir byas pa gti mug gis// bsgribs pa rnams
370b6(mdo sde): kyi mi shes pas/ / de phyir kun tu 'dzin sems kyis// rtag tu ma byin za bar byed// de dag ser sna skyes nas kyang // sems ni kun nas dkris shing 'dug/ gang gi tshe bcom
370b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di bshad pa de'i tshe/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku las 'od zer rnams byung bar gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis
371a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu mthong ban ngo mtshar skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyu
371a2(mdo sde): ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'di lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul ston par mi mdzad na/ btsun pa 'di
371a3(mdo sde): lta bu'i cho 'phrul gyi rgyu gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag cho 'phrul 'di 'byung ba'i rgyu mnyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo// dge slong dag
371a4(mdo sde): de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad par bya'o/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po'i pho brang a ri shwA zhes bya ba 'byor pa
371a5(mdo sde): rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bdun pa/ gru bzhi pa rnam par 'byes pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal
371a6(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rta dngas bsgreng ba byung bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i pho brang der rgyal po dpal gyi sde zhes bya ba stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bltan
371a7(mdo sde): sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/ rang bzhin gyi skye ba dran pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag po byang pa
371b1(mdo sde): zhig byung bar gyur to/ / rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i mthus shing rnams rtag tu me tog dang 'bras bur ldan zhing / lha rnams dus dus su char yang dag par 'bebs la/ lo tog shin tu
371b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ / sems can rnams kyang nad med par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyang phan pa dang byams pa'i sems kyis gnas so// rgyal po de'i btsun mo
371b3(mdo sde): dam pa rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad tshang ba/ yul gyi bzang mo// rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i shin du
371b4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang / sdug pa dang / 'phangs pa zhig byung bar gyur to// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la dpya dang / sho gam dang / gru btsas
371b5(mdo sde): med de/ zhing gi 'byor pa dang ldan pa/ skye bo rnams zhi ba/ khyim bya rnams dang ldan pa'i yul dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang
371b6(mdo sde): byung bar gyur to/ / dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde byang chub sems dpar gyur te/ thams cad ster ba/ thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba
371b7(mdo sde): dang / / gtong ba chen po la zhugs nas tha na rang gi sha'ang gtong ste/ des ma byin pa dang / yongs su ma btang ba ci'ang med do// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rgyal por
372a1(mdo sde): pho brang a ri sh+na'i shar phyogs kyi grong khyer gyi mthar sbyin gtong gi gnas byas te/ sbyin pa ni gtong / bsod nams ni byed do// lho dang / nub dang / byang gi grong khyer gyi sgor sbyin pa ni
372a2(mdo sde): gtong / bsod nams ni byed do// sum mdo'i dbus na'ang sbyin pa ni gtong / bsod nams ni byed do// 'di ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom
372a3(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / mar me dang / 'phreng ba dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / rgyab rten dang / gnas dang / gzugs rnams
372a4(mdo sde): dag shing rta dang / glang po dang / rta dang / rgyan rnams dang / gser gyi snod dngul gyi phye mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang / dngul gyi snod gser gyi phye mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang /
372a5(mdo sde): ba lang gser gyi rwa dang / dngul gyi rmig pa btags pa/ 'khar ba'i bzho snod dang / ras zung gis bkab pa rnams dang / gzhon nu ma rnams dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas
372a6(mdo sde): sbyin pa ni gtong / bsod nams ni byed de/ dge slong dag ji tsam du rgyal po dpal gyi sdes ji tsam gyis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad phyug pa dang / nor mang ba dang / longs spyod che bar
372a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de tsam du sbyin pa rnams sbyin no/ / yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang a ri shA'i grong khyer na bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gi mi rnams gnas te/ rgyal po dpal gyi sde de dag thams cad kyi
372b1(mdo sde): sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar gyur to// gzhan yang 'di skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis mthong ba na/ ngoms par mi 'gyur ba'i dga' ba thob po// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i blon
372b2(mdo sde): po stong phrag bcu gnyis yod de/ blon po de rnams kyi ma rog blo gros chen po zhes bya ba mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ blo dang ldan da / thams cad la dbang byed pa/ rgyal po yongs su skyob
372b3(mdo sde): par byed pa/ rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'phangs par gyur pa zhig byung bar gyur to// des 'di'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbying
372b4(mdo sde): mthong ba na ngoms pa med de/ skad cig kyang 'di dang mi 'bral lo// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sdes 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par sbyar
372b5(mdo sde): te/ shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la rten cig/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di rnams yang dag par zung zhig ces dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
372b6(mdo sde): la yang dag par sbyor te/ dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sdes de lta bu'i gdams ngag rjes su ston par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i dus su gang 'dzam bu'i gling
372b7(mdo sde): pa'i mi gang la la dus byas te/ lus zhig nas de lha'i ris drug tu skyes par gyur to// gang phal cher ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su skyes so// yang de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum
373a1(mdo sde): gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba lha'i tshogs kyis kun tu gang ngo / / de nas der go skabs med par gyur pa dang / blta na sdug gi phyi rol
373a2(mdo sde): yongs 'du dang / shing rta sna tshogs can dang / dga' ba'i tshal la sogs pa'i skyed mos tshal rnams su gnas par gyur to// de nas sngon skyes pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i
373a3(mdo sde): tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i 'byor pa de mthong ste/ rab tu dga' nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang du ri'i rgyal po ri rab de nyid lha'i bu de dag gis gang ste
373a4(mdo sde): lha'i tshogs ni 'phel bar gyur/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs ni 'grib par 'gyur ba'i ngo mtshar 'di dag gzigs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu rnams las thos nas/ ri'i
373a5(mdo sde): rgyal po ri rab thams cad la blta bar bsams pa dang / dza tsam na ri'i rgyal po'i ri rab lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun nas gang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te
373a6(mdo sde): rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis sems can 'di snyed cig 'dir skyes par gyur snyam na/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i mthu yin
373a7(mdo sde): par mthong ngo / / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sems rab tu dga' bas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed rnams nyon cig/ 'dzam gling dbang phyug rgyal
373b1(mdo sde): po yi/ / dpal gyi sde zhes rnam grags pa// rtag tu chos la gzhol ba dang // rgyal po chen po chos la gnas// thog ma bar dang mthar dge zhing // sems can kun la phan par dga'//
373b2(mdo sde): gtso bo mi rnams dge ba la// rtag tu yang dag sbyor bar byed// rtag tu snying rje'i bdag nyid can// phyi rol dngos po rab gtong zhing // de yi sha yang slong ba la// rjes su brtse ba nyid kyis
373b3(mdo sde): ster/ / nang ngam yang na phyi rol la// de ni yongs su 'dzin med par// rjes brtse nyid kyis gtong byed cing // byang chub mthar dbyung ba la brtson// des ni rnam dag gser bzhin du
373b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba thams cad rab bsgrubs pas/ / rgyal po de yi mthu yis ni// thams cad mtho ris la gzhol 'gyur// rgyal po blo gros che de yi// mthu yis su yang dmyal ba dang // yi
373b5(mdo sde): dgas dang ni dud 'gro yi/ / skye gnas rnams su skye mi 'gyur// de yi gzi brjid mthu yis ni// thams cad snang bar 'gro ba dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims dga' 'gyur bar// dga'
373b6(mdo sde): ba'i tshal na dga' bas rtse/ / dpal gyi sde la rjes bsten par// gus dang bcas par gyur pa 'di// lha yi 'jig rten nyams dga' bar// de yang dga' ba rnam par snang // de nas
373b7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha de rnams kyis tshig thos pa dang / yid dga' ba dang / sems rangs par gyur te/ dga' ba'i sems su gyur cing / 'di skad ces kyang smras so// gang rgyal
374a1(mdo sde): po 'di yan lag dang nying lag kyang sbyin par gtong 'dod par rtsol ba ni ngo mtshar che'o/ / 'on kyang 'di ltar yan lag dang nying lag ster ba 'di ni dka' ba ste/ bdag dang
374a2(mdo sde): mnyam par 'phangs pa gzhan med pas/ de ji ltar na bdag nyid chen po 'di rang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal ba la mi sems par yan lag dang nying lag sbyin par gtong bar gyur te/ 'di ni rjes
374a3(mdo sde): su dpag par nus pa ma yin no/ / brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed rnams de skad ma smra zhig/ rgyal po 'di ni mthu che ste/ rdzu 'phrul rno ba/ snying rje che bas tha na rang gi sha'
374a4(mdo sde): gtong ste/ 'di la yongs su ma gtang ba ci'ang med do// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/ btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od sten chen po la nyal ba na/ tho rangs kyi dus su rmi lam bzhi rmis te/
374a5(mdo sde): dpal gyi stan las bdag nyid phab nas slar yang bteg par mthong ba dang / rang gi mig phyung ste/ slar yang skyes par mthong ba dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa 'di bcad de sa la
374a6(mdo sde): lhung ba yang skyes par mthong ba dang / mi ma yin pa dngul gyi rdo bcag pa'i mdog 'dra ba zhig gis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i dpung pa g.yon pa mod la phyung ste/ phrogs nas slar yang skye
374a7(mdo sde): bar rmis so/ / gnyid sad pa dang / 'jigs par gyur/ spu zing zhes byed de/ nga'am lha la sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang zhes bsams nas/ des rgyal po
374b1(mdo sde): dpal gyi sde la smras so/ / de myi ltas la byang ba yin pas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dis rmi lam ji lta bu mthong ba las na/ ring po mi rdzogs par chung ma 'di nyid spong ba 'byung bar 'a
374b2(mdo sde): ro snyam nas/ smras pa/ ma 'jigs shig/ sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam sems ngas ci zhig bya/ dpal gyi snyan pa bdag nyid gnas par khyod kyis mthong ngam/ mig mi nyams par
374b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du 'jug pa dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa de bzhin du yod pa dang / nga'i yang dpung pa g.yon pa gnas bzhin pa nyid ces des dbugs phyung ba dang / cang mi smra bar
374b4(mdo sde): 'dug go/ / ji tsam na mtshan mo gnyis pal blon po'i mchog blo gros chen po zhes bya ba'i rmi lam du rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang bzangs mod la zhig pa
374b5(mdo sde): dang / rin po che de rnams sha za mthong na 'jigs su rung ba rnams kyis phan tshun khyer ba dang / slar yang khang bzangs so sor sbyar bar rmis so// sad pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa
374b6(mdo sde): dang / yi mug ste/ spu bing zhes byed pa dang / bsams pa/ sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa dang / lha dpal gyi sde'i sgra lus slong bar mi 'gyur grang / lha'ang thams
374b7(mdo sde): cad stsol ba/ thams cad yong su gtong ba/ chags pa med par gtong ste/ 'di lta ste/ dman pa dang / long ba dang / bkres pa dang / sdug 'phongs pa rnams la 'di yongs su
375a1(mdo sde): mi gtong ba ci'ang med do/ / rgyal po dpal gyi sde la ni zhu bar mi bya ste/ shin tu spro ba skye bar mi 'gyur grang / de nas des gsang ste mtshan mkhan bos nas/ ngam
375a2(mdo sde): bsgo ste zhes smras pa/ shes ldan ngas 'di lta bu'i rmi lam rmis pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bur gyur pa khyod kyis lung ston cig/ mtshan mkhan gyis smras pa/ rmi lam ci 'dra ba 'di las
375a3(mdo sde): ring po mi thogs par lha'i sku lus slong ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / rmi lam bstan pa 'di lta bu de thos pa dang / blon po chen po blo gros chen po sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs shing // mig
375a4(mdo sde): mchi mas gang ba dang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/ sems khongs su chud pas gnas nas/ dpal gyi sde byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can sems can thams cad la mnyes
375a5(mdo sde): gshin pa/ yon tan du ma dang ldan pa la/ mi rtag pa'i stobs nye bar gnas pa ni ha cang myur ches so// de nas nub gsum pa la blon po stong phrag bcu gnyis la rmi lam rmis te/
375a6(mdo sde): khri yis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i gdugs dang cod pan phrogs te slar yang byin pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi mgo bcad nas slar yang byung ba dang / rgyal po dpal gyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi/
375a7(mdo sde): mi thams cad kyi mig phyung nas slar yang skyes pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi rkang pa dang lag pa rnams bcad nas slar yang skyes pa dang / rgyal po dpal gyi sde seng ge'i
375b1(mdo sde): khri las babs nas slar yang 'jog par rtsom par rmis pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag la yi mug nas/ rgyal po dpal gyi sde sa chen po skyong bar mdzad pa/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje
375b2(mdo sde): che ba/ sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa la mi rtag pa'i stobs nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur grang / bdag cag rnams lha dang lhan cig gnas pa las tha dad par gyur pa dang / so so ba
375b3(mdo sde): dang bral ba dang bye bar mi 'gyur grang / 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen med par mi 'gyur grang / de rnams kyis mtshan mkhan rnams bos nas smras pa dang / de rnams kyis ji
375b4(mdo sde): tsam na thams cad 'di bzhin du 'gyur zhes lung bstan to/ / 'di lta bu'i rmi lam bstan pa thos pa dang / grong khyer a ri shwA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams nyam thag pa'i nga ros du
375b5(mdo sde): bar brtsams so/ / thos pa gcig tu brgyud pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad mya ngan drag po'i sdug bsngal gyis bcom nas/ shin tu smre sngags 'don par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa de
375b6(mdo sde): rgyal po dpa' gyi sdes thos so/ / thos nas kyang yang bsams pa/ nga'i lus slong ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems rab tu dga' ba dang / mgu bar gyur to// shes ldan dag 'dzam
375b7(mdo sde): bu'i gling gi mi khyed rnams bde ba dang / phebs pas dge ba la gzhol bar gyis shig/ khyed rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam la sems pas ci zhig bya zhes 'jam bu gling pa thams cad du dril
376a1(mdo sde): bsgrags so/ / de nas rgyal po dpal gyi sdes dril bsgrags pa de thos pa dang / 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi thams cad dbugs byin par gyur to// yang de'i tshe de'i dus na
376a2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang a ri shA'i byang phyogs rgyang grags tsam gyi phyogs na ri bo zhig yod de/ de na drang srong lnga brgya tsam gnas so// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gyi tshe de rnams kyi don du
376a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa drang srong cig don gyi bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir/ rgyal po'i pho brang a ri shwA ra 'ongs so// yang dus de'i tshe rgyal po dpal gyi sde lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od dang lhan cig tu nang du
376a4(mdo sde): zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ngo / / drang srong des rgyal ba dang tshe ring ba'i brjod pa byas pa dang / drang srong des lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mthong ste/ 'di lta
376a5(mdo sde): de'i skye ba snga ma'i chung mar gyur pa'ang yin pas/ sngon gyi chags pa dang 'brel ba'i dbang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa skyes par gyur te/ de yid la sems shing de
376a6(mdo sde): nas song ste lam de nas 'das pa dang / ji tsam na drang srong de rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer a ri sh+tsar bya ba 'am/ byed pa thams cad byas te/ yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bsti gnas su
376a7(mdo sde): song ngo / / ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe drang srong des bram ze'i khye'u gcig rig byed 'don pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mkhan po'i rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa/ mkhan po la nor
376b1(mdo sde): ji lta bu dbul bar bgyi/ mkhan pos bka' stsol cig/ drang srong gis smras pa/ de bas na bu rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i btsun mo'i mchog btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od slongs la nga'i bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /

376b3(mdo sde): tu yi mug pa dang / bsam pa/ gnas 'di ni 'byung bar dka' ba dang / rnyed par dkar na ji ltar yang bram ze nyon mongs bdag lta bu rgyal po la btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od 'di byin cig ces ji ltar

376b5(mdo sde): srong des de'i bzhin rnam par 'gyur bas nang gi bsam pa rtogs nas smras pa/ bu ma 'jigs shig/ ji ltar na sems 'di ltar khongs su chud/ rgyal po 'di ni bdag nyid che ba
376b6(mdo sde): thams cad ster ba/ thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / chags pa med par gtong bas/ tha na rang gi sha'ang gtong ste/ 'di la yongs su ma btang ba ci'ang med do// bu des
376b7(mdo sde): na rgyal pos btsun mo'i mchog ster bar 'gyur gyis/ yi mug par yi mug par ma byed cig/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te ma song na ni/ gang dmod pa byed pa'i gnas de
377a1(mdo sde): yod pas 'gro snyam nas de dmod pas 'jigs pas smras pa/ mkhan po gal te de ltar na mchi'o zhes nges de'i rkang pa la gtugs nas song ste/ rgyal
377a2(mdo sde): po'i pho brang a ri shwar phyin to/ / de bzhin du shing shun gyi gos gyon zhing dbyig pa dang ril ba lag na thogs la/ sa rdul gyis lus la gos pa dang / rgyal po dpal gyi sdig

377a4(mdo sde): ba 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ram/ 'bras bu med par 'gyur snyam nas/ bdag nyid smod bzhin du rgyal po'i mdun na dman pa'i bzhin gyis ci mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas rgyal po dpal gyi sngas

377b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ / de'i phyir bram ze 'di la dga' bas chung ma 'di sbyin par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ gnyen sdug pa dang bral bas zhum pa'i

380a1(mdo sde): shig/ bram ze nga yin srin po min// sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yis/ gnas skabs 'di 'dra thob par gyur// 'di nyid du ni kun bshad na// dus ni kun tu
380a2(mdo sde): 'da' bar 'gyur/ / 'chi bdag myur du 'ongs nas ni// srog ni 'phrog par 'gyur du 'ong // chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni// 'di dag kun kyang bshad par bya// sngon gyi las kyi mtshan
